anecdotes: Malek once saved a lost child who had wandered into the forest. He found her cowering behind a tree and escorted her back to the village, earning the gratitude of her parents.
Malek once challenged a traveling bard to a duel of wits and won, impressing his friends but also earning the ire of the bard.
Malek once attempted to swim across the river as a dare from his friends, but got caught in the current and had to be rescued by his father.
Malek Brasher.clothes: Leather armor with a red sash
Malek Brasher.description: Malek is an 18-year-old charismatic youth with a thirst for adventure. With his green eyes and short black hair, he stands tall in his leather armor with a red sash. Malek works as an apprentice guard at The Guardian's Pact, a security team that protects the village of Luminia. He is impulsive and energetic and has a fear of drowning. Malek lives with his family in Luminia, where he looks up to his father, Dardan, who is a skilled guard with a quick wit.

family.relationship: looks up to his father

Malek Brasher.habits: Malek is a courageous and charismatic individual who tends to act impulsively. He enjoys exploring the local surroundings, and often spends his free time hiking through the ancient forest, where he feels most at home. Malek has a tendency to take risks without thinking things through, which can sometimes land him in trouble.
Malek Brasher.history: Malek was born and raised in Luminia, a prosperous and protected village located in the midst of an ancient forest, with a river and mountains nearby. Malek's family has lived in Luminia for generations, and his aunt, Kealey, is an expert on the village's history. Malek was always fascinated by the stories she told him about the unique continent they lived on and the forgotten event that shaped Luminia's legacy. As Malek grew older, he became more and more restless, eager to make a name for himself and write his own story. Malek decided to join The Guardian's Pact, hoping to prove his worth and protect his home.

job.description: charismatic and impulsive, with a thirst for adventure
job.quote: "Let's do it!"
job.relations: Looks up to Dardan's skill

Malek Brasher.name: Malek
plot: Malek discovers a hidden entrance to a long-forgotten tomb in the forest. He convinces his friends to accompany him inside, but they soon find themselves trapped and have to fight their way out.
Malek is accused of stealing a valuable artifact from a local scholar. Despite his protestations of innocence, Malek is forced to go on the run to clear his name and find the real thief.
Malek's father, Dardan, is kidnapped by bandits while on patrol. Malek and his colleagues at The Guardian's Pact set out to rescue him and bring the bandits to justice.
Malek Brasher.quote: I will write my own story, a story of courage and discovery

relationship.Dardan Brasher: Malek looks up to his father, Dardan, who is a skilled guard with a quick wit. Malek wants to prove himself to his father and follow in his footsteps.
relationship.Delp Kerrigan: Delp is a boss at The Guardian's Pact and Malek's colleague. He is wise and respected within the community, and often acts as a mentor figure for Malek.
relationship.Delp Scarrow: Delp is a senior guard at The Guardian's Pact and Malek's colleague. He is impulsive and brash, and often clashes with Malek over their different approaches to problem-solving.
relationship.Kealey Brasher: Kealey is Malek's aunt and a member of Malek's living group. She knows everything about Luminia's history and Malek often seeks her out for advice and guidance.
relationship.Lorna Brasher: Lorna is Malek's cousin and a member of his living group. She is a curious girl who loves nature walks. Malek enjoys spending time with her, and often goes on hikes with her into the forest.

Malek Brasher.secret: He has a fear of drowning
Malek Brasher.short_description: A charismatic youth with a thirst for adventure

anecdotes: Malek once lost a hefty sum of money in a game of cards and had to sell some of his family's prized possessions to pay off his debt.
When Malek was still an apprentice weaver, he accidentally spilled dye on the best fabric in the shop, earning him a stern lecture from his boss Stianna Mallory.
Malek Helwick.description: Malek Helwick is a stern and responsible weaver who works at Clothier's Collective in the prosperous village of Luminia. As the eldest son of the Helwick family, Malek tries to be a good leader, but is afraid of disappointing his father Egan. He has a gambling problem that he keeps hidden from his family and colleagues. Malek values family traditions and structure, and is authoritative, practical, and loyal. He has a faint scar on his chin and sports short salt-and-pepper hair. Malek stands tall and has fair skin with grey-green eyes. He typically wears a simple grey tunic.

family.relationship: Tries to be a good leader, but is afraid of disappointing his father Egan

Malek Helwick.habits: Malek has a no-nonsense attitude and can come across as blunt. He likes to keep a tight schedule for himself and for others, and is often seen organizing or delegating tasks. Malek enjoys a good drink after work and will often visit the local tavern to socialize with other villagers and to forget about his problems.
Malek Helwick.history: Malek was born and raised in Luminia, where his family has lived for generations. His mother, Erris Helwick, instilled in him a sense of compassion and generosity, while his father, Egan Helwick, taught him to be resourceful and stubborn. Growing up, Malek felt the weight of his family's legacy on his shoulders and thus took on the role of family head when his father became too old to do so. Malek's love for gambling started in his teenage years and has grown into a problem that he tries to keep hidden from his family. He hopes to redeem himself and overcome his addiction by making his family proud and leaving them a prosperous legacy.

job.quote: "Cutting corners always leads to disaster"
job.relations: Protective of the group, trusts and relies on Canice's guidance

Malek Helwick.name: Malek
plot: Malek's gambling problem gets out of hand and he starts stealing from Clothier's Collective to fund his addiction.

Malek discovers a rare type of fabric that could catapult Clothier's Collective to the top of the trade industry in Luminia, but he must navigate a tricky business deal with another guild to obtain it.

A group of adventurers come to Luminia looking for a guide through the ancient forest, and Malek is recruited due to his knowledge of the local area. However, he discovers that some of the adventurers have ulterior motives and must protect his village.
Malek's father Egan falls ill and Malek must take care of him while continuing to manage Clothier's Collective. The stress of these responsibilities causes Malek's addiction to resurface.

relationship.Canice Ironside: Malek greatly values Canice's wisdom and knowledge of family traditions, often seeking his advice.
relationship.Egan Helwick: Malek's relationship with his father is strained, as he feels the pressure of living up to his expectations. However, Malek still respects Egan's resourcefulness and wisdom.
relationship.Elspeth Helwick: Malek thinks of his cousin Elspeth as energetic and fun-loving, but often finds her lack of structure and responsibility frustrating.
relationship.Erris Helwick: As his mother, Erris holds a special place in Malek's heart. He turns to her for emotional support and guidance whenever he feels overwhelmed.
relationship.Evelyn Helwick: Malek takes pride in his daughter Evelyn's intelligence and curiosity, and tries to encourage her love for books whenever he can.
relationship.Stianna Mallory: Malek sees his boss as grumpy and judgmental, but respects her position and expertise.

anecdotes: Marba once saved a horse from a terrible case of hoof rot by using a traditional dwarven remedy. The horse's owner was so grateful that they gifted Marba a rare book on horse care.
Marba is famous in the village for her delicious cookies. Whenever there is a special event or celebration, people always ask Marba to bring her cookies.
Marba Hardwick.clothes: simple cotton dress in earth tones
Marba Hardwick.description: Marba Hardwick is a 75-year-old dwarf who has lived in Luminia all her life. Her family has been living in the village for generations and she is very proud of her heritage. Marba works as a farrier at the Iron Hoof Guild, where she has been the boss for many years. She is known for her kindness and caring nature, always baking something delicious for her colleagues. Despite her age, Marba is still very active and enjoys working with horses. Her eyesight is not as strong as it used to be, but she compensates with her other senses. Marba lives with her family in a small house near the river, where she spends most of her free time gardening and reading.

family.relationship: loves her family, especially her grandchildren

Marba Hardwick.habits: Marba wakes up every day at sunrise and starts her morning by preparing breakfast for her family. She then heads to the Iron Hoof Guild, where she spends most of her day working with horses. In the evenings, Marba cooks dinner for her family and spends some time tending to her garden or reading. She likes to keep busy and enjoys being productive.
Marba Hardwick.history: Marba's family has lived in Luminia for generations and has always been involved in trade and commerce. Her ancestors were successful merchants who traded goods with other villages and towns across the land. Marba grew up hearing stories about her family's history and the importance of maintaining their legacy. As a young girl, Marba was particularly interested in learning about the scholarly traditions of Luminia and spent many hours reading books on history and culture. After completing her education, Marba joined the Iron Hoof Guild, where she discovered her love for working with horses. She quickly rose through the ranks and became the boss of the guild, using her knowledge of trade and commerce to make it prosperous.

job.description: A wise and nurturing dwarf who loves baking
job.quote: "I have the perfect shoe for your horse."
job.relations: Has a motherly relationship with apprentices, respected by other guild members.

Marba Hardwick.name: Marba
plot: Marba's family has been having some financial troubles lately due to the increasing competition from other traders. Marba is trying to come up with new ways to expand their business and ensure that their legacy continues.

Marba is worried about the Iron Hoof Guild's future as fewer and fewer young people are interested in becoming farriers. She is considering starting an apprenticeship program to train the next generation of farriers.

Recently, Marba has been having some health issues which have made it difficult for her to work as much as she used to. She is worried about how this may affect her family's income and is trying to find alternative solutions.

Marba's family has just received news that a distant relative has passed away, leaving them a significant inheritance. However, there are rumors that the inheritance may not be as straightforward as it seems and Marba is worried about the potential consequences.
Marba Hardwick.quote: "Oh dear, come sit down and have some cookies"

relationship.Erris Voyle: Erris is Marba's daughter and they have a very close relationship. Marba is very proud of Erris and her accomplishments as a mother and a businesswoman.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Garrett is Marba's father-in-law and they have a mutual respect for each other. Garrett doesn't talk much, but Marba knows that he always has valuable advice to offer when he does.
relationship.Thershaele Coralaeth: Marba is very fond of Thershaele, her young apprentice at the Iron Hoof Guild. She sees a lot of potential in her and enjoys teaching her everything she knows about working with horses.

anecdotes: One time, Morna healed a fellow hunter's broken leg using only some herbs and a few incantations. The hunter was amazed by her skill and dubbed her 'the miracle worker'
Morna once took her grandchildren on a camping trip in the forest, where she taught them how to forage for food and build a fire from scratch. They still talk about that trip to this day

During a particularly harsh winter, Morna spent weeks traveling through the snow-covered forests, bringing food and supplies to families who were struggling to survive. Many people credit her with saving their lives.
Morna Atwood.clothes: Plain blue dress and white apron
Morna Atwood.description: Morna Atwood is a caring and wise woman who has lived in Luminia her entire life. She works as a hunter and healer for The Bison Runners, a company that specializes in hunting bison for their pelts. Despite her age, Morna is still extremely active and enjoys spending her days out in the wilderness. She is deeply respected by her colleagues and is known for her kind and nurturing nature, which has earned her the nickname 'Mother' among her co-workers. Morna is also a devoted grandmother and loves nothing more than spending time with her grandchildren.

family.relationship: Loving and supportive towards her grandchildren

Morna Atwood.habits: Morna has a very structured routine and begins each day with a cup of tea and a few minutes of quiet meditation. She then spends several hours in the forest hunting and gathering herbs for her healing practice. In the afternoons, Morna returns to the village to tend to her family and spend time with her grandchildren. She ends her day with a warm meal and a good book before heading to bed.
Morna Atwood.history: Morna comes from a long line of hunters and healers who have lived in Luminia for generations. Her family is deeply connected to the land and its ancient forests, and they take great pride in preserving and protecting the natural beauty of their home. Morna's mother, Enda Voyle, is one of the oldest members of the family and has passed down many of her teachings and practices to Morna. Despite her family's long history in Luminia, Morna is always eager to learn more about the world around her and often spends her evenings reading books on history, magic, and healing practices.

job.quote: "Take care of your body and it will take care of you"
job.relations: motherly towards everyone, especially Ennis
job.working_clothes: simple hunting clothes with medicinal pouches

Morna Atwood.name: Morna
plot: Morna has been secretly practicing forbidden magic for years, using it to heal some of the more difficult cases. However, the local authorities have recently caught wind of her practices and are threatening to arrest her.

Morna has been approached by a group of scholars who are interested in her healing techniques. They offer to pay her for her knowledge and even suggest that they could help her protect her secret from the authorities. However, Morna is hesitant to share her practices with outsiders and fears the repercussions of being associated with the scholars.

One of Morna's grandchildren has fallen ill with a mysterious ailment that no one in the village seems to be able to cure. Morna is determined to help her grandchild and sets out on a quest to find a rare herb that she believes holds the key to the cure.
Morna Atwood.quote: A mother's love knows no bounds

relationship.Bixler Voyle: Bixler is Morna's eldest grandson and is known for his adventurous spirit. Morna admires Bixler's courage but worries about his safety. She often gives him lectures on the importance of caution and preparation before heading out into the wilderness.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Enda is Morna's mother and is one of the oldest members of the family. Morna has a deep respect for her mother and often turns to her for guidance and advice. Enda has also passed down many of her healing practices to Morna.
relationship.Ennis Atwood: Ennis is Morna's grandson and also works as a hunter for The Bison Runners. Morna has always been extremely close to Ennis and sees a lot of herself in him. She enjoys spending time with him and often shares stories of her adventures in the wilderness.
relationship.Henna Mallory: Henna is also a senior hunter at The Bison Runners and is one of Morna's closest friends. They often go on hunting trips together and share a deep love for the wilderness and its mysteries.
relationship.Regan Rhinehart: Regan is a senior hunter at The Bison Runners and has worked alongside Morna for many years. They have a deep respect for each other and often share stories and advice about hunting and healing practices.

Morna Denby.description: Cheerful and imaginative, always looking for new friends and stories.

Morna Denby.name: Morna
Morna Denby.secret: She has a secret friend who is an imaginary dragon.
Morna Denby.short_description: Cheerful and imaginative, always looking for new friends and stories.

anecdotes: Morna once fought a giant bear in the ancient forest and emerged victorious, earning her the respect of her fellow huntresses.
Morna befriended an old scholar from Luminia who taught her about the history of the region and the legends of the Old One.
Morna is known to sing songs around the campfire during long nights on the road, lifting the spirits of her team members.
Morna Halstead.clothes: brown leather hunting boots and green tunic with a brown belt
Morna Halstead.description: Morna Halstead is a daring and adventurous huntress who lives in the prosperous village of Luminia. She is one of the ten members of the Wandering Wayfarers, a group of nomads who travel around the region. Morna is known for her exceptional hunting skills and is responsible for providing food to her group for weeks. She cares deeply about her family and is a cousin in the Voyle family that resides in Luminia. Morna is an independent and resourceful young woman with short and spiky hair, green eyes, and a tanned skin complexion.

family.relationship: cares deeply about her family

Morna Halstead.habits: Morna is a skilled hunter and spends most of her time in the forests or mountains surrounding Luminia. She has a disciplined work ethic and is always looking for ways to improve her hunting skills. Morna is also a fan of adventure and enjoys exploring unknown areas. Her bubbly and talkative personality makes her a natural leader and organizer, helping her team to survive on the road.
Morna Halstead.history: Morna's family, the Voyle family, has been living in Luminia for generations. They are a proud native family who have seen the village grow and prosper over time. As a young girl, Morna learned how to hunt from her grandfather, Garrett Voyle, who was the family member she admired the most. Morna quickly became skilled at hunting, thanks to her exceptional abilities, agility, and knowledge of the terrain. Morna always dreamed of traveling around the world, exploring new territories, and finding new prey. When she was old enough, Morna joined the Wandering Wayfarers, a team of travelers who share her passion for adventure and exploration.

job.quote: "I never miss my target"
job.relations: sees Cammy as a close friend

Morna Halstead.name: Morna
plot: Morna's family is being threatened by a group of bandits who are planning to raid their village. Morna must find a way to protect her family and drive out the bandits.
While on a hunting trip, Morna discovers an ancient artifact that unlocks a mystery related to the forgotten event in local beliefs. Morna must solve the mystery before it falls into the wrong hands.
The Wandering Wayfarers come across a mysterious cult that worships a non-gendered God and is planning to perform a dangerous ritual. Morna must stop the cult and save her team from danger.
Morna Halstead.quote: "I can bring us food for weeks"

relationship.Alvy Kerrigan: An apprentice farmer who respects Morna's skills as a hunter but is sometimes intimidated by her daring nature.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Morna's uncle and a respected father figure to her. Morna looks up to Boren and admires his charisma and wisdom.
relationship.Cacey Mallory: A senior thief who is envious of Morna's skills and often tries to one-up her. Morna dislikes Cacey's deceitful nature and tries to avoid her whenever possible.
relationship.Cammy Grayden: An apprentice cook who is bubbly and talkative, like Morna. The two share a love for adventure and often trade stories around the campfire.
relationship.Durwin Hitch: A veteran blacksmith who is stern and no-nonsense but has a deep respect for Morna's skills. He often provides her with weapons and tools for hunting.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Morna's aunt and a caring and protective mother figure to her. Morna often turns to Erris for advice and guidance.
relationship.Fargas Mallory: An optimistic apprentice blacksmith who looks up to Morna and hopes to join her on one of her adventures someday.
relationship.Kelsey Mallory: A senior guard and adventurer who shares Morna's love for exploration. Morna and Kelsey often go on hunting trips together and have become close friends.

family.relationship: Close to her parents and grandparents

anecdotes: Nally once helped a lost adventurer find their way out of the ancient forest, using her deep connection to the spirits to guide them.
During a particularly harsh winter, Nally organized a community effort to keep everyone fed and warm. She made sure that no one went without food or shelter during the cold months.
When one of her grandchildren expressed interest in becoming a scholar, Nally took it upon herself to teach them everything she knew about the local history and traditions.
Nally Norwick.clothes: Long dress and shawl - purple and white
Nally Norwick.description: Nally Norwick is a 75-year-old woman who has lived in Luminia for her entire life. She is the family matriarch of Norwick's Farmstead and a beloved member of the community. Nally is known for her kind and wise nature, always willing to lend an ear and give advice. Her connection to the spirits of the forest is well-known among the locals and many seek her out for spiritual guidance. Nally's purple and white dress and shawl reflect her status as a respected elder. Despite her age, Nally remains active and engaged with the world around her.

family.relationship: Beloved by all, respected for her wisdom and experience.

Nally Norwick.habits: Nally is a creature of habit and can often be found tending to the crops on Norwick's Farmstead or sitting outside her home, enjoying the fresh air and sunshine. She starts every morning with a cup of tea and usually spends her evenings telling stories to her grandchildren. Nally is also an avid reader and can often be found with her nose buried in a book.
Nally Norwick.history: Nally was born and raised in Luminia, where her family has lived for generations. She grew up listening to stories of the Old One and the unique continent on which they live. As a young girl, Nally learned about the empire and its impact on their local beliefs. She also discovered the non-gendered God worshipped by her ancestors and continues to embrace this aspect of her heritage. Nally married and had children of her own, raising them on Norwick's Farmstead and instilling in them a love for the land and the importance of preserving their legacy. After her husband passed away, Nally took over as family matriarch and has kept the farmstead running ever since.

job.description: Kind and wise, with a twinkle in her eye
job.quote: "With every harvest comes new hope"
job.relations: loved and admired by all as the village's grandmother

Nally Norwick.name: Nally
plot: Nally begins to worry about the encroaching civilization threatening the natural beauty of Luminia. She begins to rally the community to take action and protect their land from outside forces.
When a group of adventurers arrives in Luminia seeking information about the Old One, Nally takes it upon herself to share her knowledge and guide them through the ancient forest.
Nally's connection to the spirits becomes stronger, revealing a new path for her to explore. She must decide whether to embrace this new destiny or continue on her current path as family matriarch.

relationship.Cammy Norwick: Nally respects Cammy for her responsible nature and sharp wit. She enjoys their conversations and sees Cammy as a vital member of the Norwick's Farmstead team.
relationship.Caylan Norwick: Nally recognizes Caylan's headstrong nature and can see a bit of herself in the young apprentice. She tries to keep an eye on Caylan and guide them in the right direction.
relationship.Devlin Norwick: Nally sees Devlin as a hardworking and dedicated member of the Norwick's Farmstead team. She appreciates his quiet nature and sharp mind.
relationship.Kiltey Norwick: Nally has a close relationship with Kiltey and values her practical approach to life. The two often work together in the fields and share stories of their experiences.
relationship.Matilda Norwick: Nally recognizes Matilda's curiosity and adventurous spirit, and tries to encourage these traits whenever she can.

anecdotes: Nash once saved a child who had fallen into the river while out on a morning walk. He dove in and pulled the child to safety, earning the gratitude of the entire village.
Nash has a reputation for being able to diffuse tense situations with his calming presence and wise words.
Nash is an excellent storyteller and often entertains children and adults alike with tales of Luminia's rich history and folklore.
Nash Barrington.clothes: long brown coat with a fur trim, black trousers
Nash Barrington.description: Nash Barrington is a well-respected leader and family chief in Luminia, known for his wisdom, fairness, and charisma. He has lived in the village his entire life and has always been an integral part of the community. Nash is married and has several children and grandchildren, all of whom he loves and supports deeply. As the head of The Devout of the Non-Gendered God, Nash is responsible for overseeing the religious practices of the village and ensuring that everyone's spiritual needs are met. Despite his busy schedule, Nash is always willing to lend an ear to anyone who needs it and is highly regarded for his kind and compassionate nature.

family.relationship: Loving husband, supportive father and grandfather.

Nash Barrington.habits: Nash is a disciplined individual who has developed several habits over the course of his life. He wakes up early every morning to meditate and reflect on his goals for the day. He also makes it a point to exercise regularly and eat a healthy diet. Nash is deeply committed to his work at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God and spends much of his time organizing ceremonies and counseling members of the community. When he's not working, Nash enjoys spending time with his family and exploring the natural beauty of the surrounding area.
Nash Barrington.history: Nash was born and raised in Luminia and has always been deeply connected to the village and its people. He grew up in a loving and supportive family and was instilled with a strong sense of community and duty from a young age. After completing his education, Nash joined The Devout of the Non-Gendered God and quickly rose through the ranks due to his natural leadership ability and unwavering dedication. Over the years, he has become a trusted advisor to many in the village and is highly respected for his ability to mediate disputes and find peaceful solutions to conflicts.

job.quote: \"The village always comes first\"
job.relations: father figure to other members
job.workplace: The Devout of the Non-Gendered God

Nash Barrington.name: Nash
plot: Nash begins to suspect that the kingdom is planning to attack Luminia and must convince his fellow villagers to take action to defend themselves.
Nash discovers a hidden cache of artifacts related to the Old One, a mysterious deity worshipped by the village's ancestors, and must decide how to best preserve them for future generations.
Nash is unexpectedly thrust into a leadership role when his son, Barlowe, falls ill and must navigate the challenges of keeping the village running smoothly while also caring for his family.

relationship.Alexia Barrington: Nash is impressed by his granddaughter Alexia's musical talents and enjoys attending her performances. He also admires her compassionate nature and sees a lot of potential in her.
relationship.Ashley Barrington: Nash cherishes his wife Ashley and credits her with being his rock and source of support through all of life's challenges. He admires her kindness and nurturing nature and feels grateful to have her by his side.
relationship.Barlowe Barrington: Nash has a close relationship with his eldest son, Barlowe, and is grateful for his diplomatic skills and ability to handle difficult situations. He often relies on Barlowe to assist him in his duties at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God.
relationship.Creel Barrington: Nash loves his son Creel deeply but struggles to understand his brusque and independent nature. He worries that Creel may be too closed off and is always looking for ways to try and connect with him on a deeper level.
relationship.Griffon Barrington: Nash is incredibly proud of his grandson, Griffon, and enjoys spending time with him whenever he can. He sees a lot of potential in Griffon and is always willing to offer advice or guidance when needed.
relationship.Kearey Barrington: Nash is proud of his daughter Kearey's artistic talent and enjoys attending her gallery showings. He also appreciates her sophistication and quick wit and often seeks her out for advice on matters of diplomacy.
relationship.Nally Barrington: Nash has a deep respect and affection for his mother and values her wisdom and wit. He often seeks her advice when faced with difficult decisions and enjoys hearing stories from her youth.
relationship.Wren Barrington: Nash loves his youngest daughter, Wren, dearly but worries that her impulsive nature may lead her into danger one day. He tries to encourage her adventurous spirit while also emphasizing the importance of caution and common sense.

Nash Barrington.secret: He worries that the village will be attacked by the kingdom.
Nash Barrington.short_description: Smart, fair and kind leader, respected by everyone

anecdotes: Nash once saved his cousin Dara from drowning in the river when she fell in while trying to catch fish for dinner.
Nash is known for his stubbornness, which often leads to heated arguments with his wife Ashley. Despite their differences, they have a deep and loving relationship.
Nash is a fierce protector of his family, and he once chased off a group of bandits who tried to steal from their farm.
Nash has a hidden talent for painting, which he rarely shows to others.
Nash Gilroy.description: Nash Gilroy is a wise and authoritative elder who is the family chief of the Gilroy family in the prosperous village of Luminia. He is a well-respected member of the non-gendered God's cooperative, The Devout, where he serves as a boss alongside Nash Barrington. Nash is known for his stern and no-nonsense attitude, but he is also compassionate and caring towards his family and those in need. He is a tall man with a tan complexion and blue eyes, and he is always seen wearing a simple tunic in brown.

family.relationship: protective of his family, respected by the other members of the group

Nash Gilroy.habits: Nash Gilroy is a disciplined man who keeps to a strict routine. He wakes up early to tend to his family's chores before heading to The Devout for his duties. He spends most of his day working with the cooperatives or helping out his family. In his free time, Nash enjoys reading up on local beliefs and forgotten events that shaped the history of Luminia. He doesn't have much patience for small talk or idle gossip.
Nash Gilroy.history: Nash comes from a long line of natives who have lived in Luminia since the village was founded. His family has always been deeply rooted in the community, and they have played a vital role in its growth and prosperity. Nash learned the value of hard work and dedication from his parents, who instilled in him a sense of responsibility to his family and community. As he grew older, Nash took on more responsibilities within The Devout, and he quickly gained a reputation for being a wise and respected leader. He has always been protective of his family, and he has worked hard to ensure their legacy continues to thrive.

job.quote: \"I've seen things you wouldn't believe\"
job.relations: father figure to other members
job.workplace: The Devout of the Non-Gendered God

Nash Gilroy.name: Nash
plot: Nash's secret betrayal of a friend comes back to haunt him when the friend returns to Luminia seeking revenge. Nash must confront his past mistakes and make amends before it's too late.
A group of outsiders threatens the peaceful way of life in Luminia, and Nash must use his diplomacy skills to prevent violence and find a peaceful resolution.

Nash discovers a forgotten artifact that unlocks ancient mysteries about the founding of Luminia. However, his discovery attracts the attention of a powerful wizard who seeks to claim the artifact for himself.

The Devout's prosperity is threatened when a rival cooperative tries to sabotage their trade deals. Nash must use all his wisdom and authority to protect The Devout's interests and preserve its legacy.

relationship.Alanna Gilroy: Alanna is Nash's youngest daughter, and he loves her cheerful and playful personality. Nash enjoys spending time with Alanna and teaching her about the history and traditions of their family and village. He knows that Alanna has a bright future ahead of her and wants to do everything he can to help her achieve her dreams.
relationship.Alley Talbot: Alley is a compassionate and sharp-minded elder at The Devout, and Nash often seeks her advice on important matters. He admires Alley's wisdom and knowledge and enjoys spending time discussing the history of their village with her.
relationship.Anson Gilroy: Nash is close to his eldest son Anson, who shares his outgoing and adventurous personality. Nash admires Anson's charisma and optimism and enjoys spending time with him whenever he can. He sees a lot of himself in Anson and wants to make sure that he doesn't make the same mistakes he did when he was younger.
relationship.Ashley Barrington: Ashley is a supportive and nurturing cook at The Devout, and Nash enjoys her company. He knows that he can always count on Ashley to provide nourishing meals for their cooperative and appreciates her dedication to her work.
relationship.Ashley Gilroy: Ashley is Nash's wife and provides a nurturing and caring presence in his life. Nash values her opinions and knows that she will always be there for him and their family. He admires Ashley's patience and empathy and loves her deeply.
relationship.Boren Gilroy: Boren is Nash's uncle and serves as a wise and compassionate elder in their family. Nash looks up to Boren for guidance and wisdom and values his opinions on important matters. Despite Boren's gruff exterior, Nash knows that he has a heart of gold and cares deeply for him.
relationship.Brona Gilroy: Brona is Nash's aunt and provides a creative and curious outlook on life. Nash appreciates her eccentricity and enjoys her company. He often goes to her for advice and inspiration when he needs it. He knows that Brona will always be there to support him and his family.
relationship.Creel Barrington: Creel is an apprentice blacksmith at The Devout, and Nash often works with him. He appreciates Creel's hardworking and brusque personality and knows that he can always count on him to get the job done. Nash enjoys mentoring Creel and providing guidance when he needs it.
relationship.Dara Gilroy: Dara is Nash's cousin, and they have a close relationship. Nash saved Dara's life when she fell in the river as a child, and they have been inseparable ever since. Nash admires Dara's mischievous and daring personality and enjoys her company. He knows that he can always count on her in times of need.
relationship.Derry Gilroy: Nash is proud of his eldest daughter Derry and her diligence and reliability. He encourages her to pursue her dreams and provides guidance when she needs it. Nash understands that Derry is shy and cautious, but he knows that she has the potential to achieve great things.
relationship.Gunner Mosley: Gunner is a senior guard at The Devout, and Nash trusts him to protect their cooperative. Nash admires Gunner's vigilance and commitment to his duty and enjoys chatting with him whenever they have the chance.
relationship.Nash Barrington: Nash works alongside Nash Barrington at The Devout, and they have a mutual respect for each other. Nash admires Nash Barrington's wisdom and diplomatic skills and enjoys working with him towards the common good of their cooperative.
relationship.Nolan Fullet: Nolan is an outsider ambassador who often visits Luminia to trade with their cooperatives. Nash is wary of Nolan's charming and cunning personality but acknowledges his importance in maintaining Luminia's trade relationships. He knows that he must approach Nolan with caution and diplomacy to prevent any harm from coming to their village.
relationship.Tara Talbot: Tara is an efficient and ambitious administrator at The Devout, and Nash respects her work ethic and dedication. He enjoys discussing important matters with her and values her opinions on matters related to their cooperative.

anecdotes: Niall once brewed a love potion for a young man in the village who was smitten with her daughter Mara. The potion worked too well, and the young man became obsessed with Mara, causing Niall to regret ever making it.
Niall once baked a cake for the annual village fair and won first prize. Her secret ingredient was a pinch of magic, which added an extra layer of flavor to the cake.
Niall once saved a group of adventurers who were lost in the ancient forest near Luminia. She used her knowledge of local herbs and magic to guide them back to safety.
Niall Vain.clothes: long skirt with white blouse and red shawl
Niall Vain.description: Niall Vain is a caring and nurturing halfling woman who works as an apprentice enchanter at The Circle of Mystic Women in Luminia. She lives with her family, which includes her husband Quinn, their children Kirwin, Mara, Durgan, and Ryleigh, as well as her grandfather Hogan. Niall is known for her kind-hearted nature and her love for baking. She dreams of one day opening a small bakery in Luminia where she can sell her delicious pastries and cakes.

family.relationship: loving mother and grandmother

Niall Vain.habits: Niall has a daily routine that includes waking up early to tend to her garden and prepare breakfast for her family. She spends most of her day at The Circle of Mystic Women, where she assists the other members with their magical practices and learns from their expertise. When she is not working, Niall enjoys reading books about the local beliefs and non-gendered God or spending time with her grandchildren.
Niall Vain.hair: long and curly, silver and black
Niall Vain.history: Niall was born and raised in Luminia, where her family has lived for generations. She learned the art of enchanting from her mother and grandmother, who were both members of The Circle of Mystic Women. Niall married Quinn, a wise and respected herbalist, at a young age and together they raised their children in the village. Over the years, Niall has become an integral part of the community, known for her kindness and generosity.

job.quote: "A kind heart makes even the darkest days bright"
job.relations: younger sister of Quinn Vain

Niall Vain.name: Niall
plot: Niall's dream of opening a bakery is threatened when a rival baker opens up shop in Luminia. Niall must decide whether to compete with the rival baker or give up on her dream.
The Circle of Mystic Women is targeted by an anti-magic group, and Niall must use her enchanting skills to protect her fellow members and their practices.

Niall discovers a long-forgotten event in Luminia's history that could change the way the villagers see their non-gendered God. She must decide whether to share this information with the community or keep it to herself.

relationship.Durgan Vain: Durgan is Niall's son and a charismatic and adventurous member of the family. He often brings home interesting artifacts from his travels and shares them with Niall and the rest of the family.
relationship.Hogan Vain: Hogan is Niall's grandfather and a wise and experienced member of the family. He often shares stories about Luminia's history and provides guidance to Niall and the rest of the family.
relationship.Kirwin Vain: Kirwin is Niall's eldest son and a loyal and protective member of the family. He often helps Niall with her baking and shares her love for creating new recipes.
relationship.Mara Vain: Mara is Niall's eldest daughter and an independent and ambitious member of the family. She often seeks Niall's advice and guidance when it comes to magical practices.
relationship.Quinn Vain: Niall's husband Quinn is a wise and respected herbalist in Luminia. Niall and Quinn have been married for many years and have raised their family together.
relationship.Ryleigh Vain: Ryleigh is Niall's youngest son and a fun-loving and carefree member of the family. He often helps Niall in the garden and enjoys spending time with his grandmother Hogan.

Niall Vain.secret: dreams of opening a small bakery

anecdotes: Nolan once single-handedly stopped a group of bandits from attacking the village by using his charisma and cunning to talk them down.
There are rumors that Nolan has a secret underground network of spies who report back to him with information on the goings-on in the village.
Nolan Fullet.description: Nolan Fullet is a charismatic and cunning leader who is feared by some and respected by others in the village of Luminia. He is known for being ambitious and intimidating, but also for his strong loyalty to the group he belongs to - The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. Nolan works as an outsider ambassador for the group and is seen as a boss by those who work with him. He is often seen wearing a miner's outfit and has short, black hair with blue eyes. Nolan is of average height and weight, but has a physical detail that sets him apart from others - missing fingers on his left hand.

family.relationship: loyal to the group

Nolan Fullet.habits: Nolan is a man of structure and order. He likes to keep things organized and efficient, especially in his workplace at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. He has a habit of speaking in a commanding tone and is not afraid to assert his authority when needed. However, he also has a soft spot for those who show loyalty to him and can be quite generous to them.
Nolan Fullet.history: Nolan is an outsider who was welcomed into the group of The Devout of the Non-Gendered God due to his charisma and cunning. He quickly rose up the ranks to become a leader of the group and has since then been instrumental in expanding their influence in the surrounding areas. Some say that Nolan has a dark past, but no one really knows for sure. What they do know is that he is fiercely loyal to the group and will do anything to protect it, even if it means resorting to less than savory methods.

job.quote: \"A new perspective can be refreshing\"
job.relations: honest relations with key figures
job.workplace: The Devout of the Non-Gendered God

Nolan Fullet.name: Nolan
Nolan Fullet.physical detail: missing fingers on the left hand
plot: Nolan is worried that a rival group may be trying to encroach on their territory and wants the players to investigate.
One of Nolan's trusted lieutenants has gone rogue and is causing trouble in the village. Nolan wants the players to bring them back to face justice.
Nolan Fullet.quote: "We don't ask questions, we take what we can."

relationship.Cammy Talbot: Cammy Talbot, the senior nurse, has a somewhat contentious relationship with Nolan due to their differing views on how to run things. Cammy is more caring and curious, while Nolan is more ambitious and intimidating. However, they both ultimately have the same goal of keeping the village healthy and safe.
relationship.Derry Talbot: Nolan has a good working relationship with Derry Talbot, the boss herbalist at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. They both share a love for order and structure and work well together to keep things running smoothly.
relationship.Nash Barrington: Nolan and Nash Barrington, the village leader, have a mutual respect for each other even though they come from different backgrounds. Nolan sees Nash as a wise and respected leader who can help advance the goals of his group, while Nash sees Nolan as a valuable ally in keeping the village prosperous and protected.

anecdotes: Nolan once crafted a beautiful sword for local adventurer, Fiona Nightingale, who used it to slay a dragon and become a legend among the people of Luminia.

When Nolan was younger, he and his cousin Brock snuck into the forest to hunt for deer. They ended up getting lost and had to spend the night in the woods, surviving only on berries and mushrooms they found.

One time, Nolan got into a heated argument with his aunt Canice over family traditions and values. Despite their disagreement, Canice still trusts Nolan to lead the family and make the right decisions.
Nolan Ironside.clothes: thick leather apron with a red shirt
Nolan Ironside.description: Nolan Ironside is a charismatic blacksmith who runs his own forge in Luminia. He is well-known and respected in the village, and often receives commissions from local scholars and adventurers. Despite his success, Nolan struggles with a drinking problem that he keeps hidden from most people. He is the eldest son of Cam Ironside, a respected blacksmith and head of the Ironside family. Nolan has a complicated relationship with some members of his family - while he is respected as the family head, he keeps his distance from some of his relatives.

family.relationship: respected, but distant with some members of the family

Nolan Ironside.habits: Nolan has a habit of working late into the night at his forge, often fueled by his love for his craft and the alcohol he drinks to help him relax. He can be found most days at his forge, wearing a thick leather apron and a red shirt, working on metal objects of all kinds. Nolan also has a habit of keeping to himself and distancing himself from others at times, which can be attributed to his drinking problem.
Nolan Ironside.history: Nolan was born and raised in Luminia, and grew up learning the art of blacksmithing from his father, Cam Ironside. He quickly developed a passion for it and became known for his skill and talent with metalwork. However, as he got older, Nolan's drinking problem began to take a toll on his life. Despite struggling with addiction, Nolan has managed to run a successful forge and build a reputation for himself as one of the best blacksmiths in the village. His relationship with his family has been strained at times due to his behavior, but they still respect him as their leader.

job.quote: "The forge is my sanctuary."
job.relations: mentor to Elatha, friendly with other group members

Nolan Ironside.name: Nolan
plot: One potential plot involving Nolan could be centered around his struggle with addiction. Perhaps a concerned family member or friend tries to intervene and help him overcome his problem, leading to some difficult conversations and confrontations. Alternatively, Nolan's addiction could lead to some serious consequences, causing him to lose everything he has worked for.

Another plot involving Nolan could be related to his desire to make a name for himself in the larger world. Perhaps he receives an exciting opportunity to craft a special item for an important figure, putting his skills to the test and forcing him to confront his own limitations and insecurities.

A third potential plot could involve Nolan's family dynamics and relationships. Perhaps tensions boil over and someone challenges his leadership, forcing him to defend his position and make difficult decisions that affect both himself and his loved ones.
Nolan Ironside.quote: "You want the best? Come to me!"

relationship.Bixler Ironside: Nolan's young grandson Bixler is a curious and energetic child who he loves to dote on. He sees a lot of himself in Bixler and hopes to help guide him on his own path in life.
relationship.Brock Ironside: Nolan's cousin Brock is a reckless troublemaker who he has had a complicated relationship with in the past. While they have had their differences, Nolan still cares about Brock and wants to help him find his place in the world.
relationship.Cam Ironside: Nolan's father Cam is a respected blacksmith and head of the Ironside family. While they share a close bond, they also have had their disagreements in the past over family matters and Nolan's addiction.
relationship.Canice Ironside: Nolan has a complicated relationship with his aunt Canice, who serves as the family elder and keeper of family traditions. While she respects his leadership, she often disagrees with his decisions and has challenged him on multiple occasions. Despite this, they still share a strong bond and Canice trusts Nolan to do what is best for the family.
relationship.Dowd Ironside: Nolan's grandfather Dowd is an old hunter who Nolan admires greatly. Despite their age difference, they share a special bond over their love for the outdoors and hunting. Dowd has served as a mentor to Nolan in the past, teaching him valuable lessons about life and survival.
relationship.Elspeth Ironside: Nolan's mother Elspeth is a kind-hearted healer who he loves and respects deeply. While they do not always see eye-to-eye on everything, they share a close-knit bond and Nolan knows that he can always count on his mother for support and guidance.
relationship.Evelyn Ironside: Nolan's granddaughter Evelyn is a studious bookworm who he finds fascinating. He enjoys talking with her about books and learning, and hopes to encourage her love of knowledge in any way he can.
relationship.Gwen Ironside: Nolan's grandmother Gwen is a fierce warrior and expert seamstress who he looks up to greatly. He often seeks her out for advice and enjoys hearing stories of her past adventures and triumphs.
relationship.Henna Ironside: Nolan's sister Henna is a confident and ambitious trader who he admires greatly. While they have had their disagreements, Nolan respects Henna's drive and determination to succeed in the world.
relationship.Muriel Ironside: Nolan's youngest sister Muriel is a shy and dreamy artist who he worries about often. He hopes to help her pursue her dreams and find success in her own right, but also worries about her ability to handle herself in the world.
relationship.Una Ironside: Nolan's cousin Una is a gentle and empathetic gardener who he gets along well with. They often bond over their shared love of nature, and Nolan enjoys hearing about her latest projects and plans.

Nuila Azadul.description: Very disfigured by a curse, but friendly and loyal

family.relationship: she is very close to her mother

job.description: Very disfigured by a curse, but friendly and loyal
job.quote: "I like shiny things"
job.relations: She is deeply envious of Mara and her position within the group, often trying to outdo her but being unsuccessful. She admires Delaney for his faith, but finds his special status to be unfair. She is closest to Ashlan, who treats her normally, and thinks Jurg's gruff exterior is comforting.
job.working_clothes: long hooded cloak, with fingerless gloves

Nuila Azadul.name: Nuila
Nuila Azadul.quote: "I don't care about my looks, I just want to be loved"
Nuila Azadul.secret: She has a secret crush on a boy from the adventurers' guild
Nuila Azadul.short_description: Very disfigured by a curse, but friendly and loyal

anecdotes: Once, during a particularly harsh winter, Odger single-handedly saved The Harvest Guild's crops from freezing by spending countless hours tending to each one with care and attention.
Odger once helped a group of scholars from a nearby city decipher an ancient text that had long been thought indecipherable, earning him the respect and admiration of academics in the region.

There is a legend in Luminia that tells of a powerful artifact hidden deep within the ancient forest. Many have searched for it over the years, but none have succeeded. Odger claims to have seen it once, but refuses to reveal its location.
Odger Kerswell.clothes: Long white robe with a hood covering his head
Odger Kerswell.description: Odger Kerswell is a wise and experienced man who has lived his entire life in Luminia. As a family head, he is highly respected by all members of his group and is known for his stories about the history and lore of the village. He worked for many years at The Harvest Guild as a farmer before retiring. Even now in his old age, he continues to be an active member of the community, always willing to lend a hand or share his wisdom.

family.relationship: Highly respected by family members

Odger Kerswell.habits: Odger enjoys spending his days walking through the ancient forest surrounding Luminia. He also has a habit of sitting by the river, watching the water flow by, lost in thought. In the evenings, he can often be found at the local tavern, regaling anyone who will listen with tales of the village's history and the adventures of its residents.
Odger Kerswell.history: Odger was born and raised in Luminia, inheriting the position of family head from his father. He spent most of his life working as a farmer at The Harvest Guild, where he developed a deep love and appreciation for the land. He is incredibly proud of the village's prosperous and protected status, and has made it his life's work to preserve its legacy and reveal its mysteries. He has a great-grandchild from his forbidden relationship with a nomad girl, a secret that he keeps close to his heart, fearing the repercussions if it were to ever be uncovered. He has also been known to reference a forgotten event that occurred in the village long ago, hinting at a deeper mystery that still remains unsolved.

job.description: Wise and experienced man who loves to tell stories
job.quote: “I’ve been around long enough to have an interesting story for every situation.”
job.relations: father of Baen and Amery, grandfather of Eckert
job.working_clothes: simple woolen robe, walking stick, hat

Odger Kerswell.name: Odger
plot: Odger's great-grandchild has recently returned to Luminia, causing Odger to fear that his secret might come to light. He must decide whether to reveal the truth to the family or continue to keep it hidden at all costs.

Rumors have been circulating that The Harvest Guild's crops have been failing due to an unknown disease. Odger takes it upon himself to investigate, revealing a sinister plot by a rival village to sabotage Luminia's prosperity.

Odger discovers a long-forgotten journal written by one of Luminia's founders, detailing a dark secret about the village's origins. As he delves deeper into the mystery, he realizes that some will stop at nothing to keep the truth hidden.
Odger Kerswell.quote: As I have seen the world, there is nothing more beautiful than this village

relationship.Amery Kerswell: Odger is fond of his carefree and friendly youngest son, Amery, but worries that he doesn't take life seriously enough.
relationship.Baen Kerswell: Odger has a close relationship with his eldest son, Baen. They share a deep love for the land and a desire to preserve Luminia's legacy.
relationship.Dara Kerswell: Odger dotes on his curious and adventurous granddaughter, often taking her on walks through the forest and telling her stories about the village's past.
relationship.Dexer Kerswell: Odger's uncle Dexer is a thorn in his side, constantly complaining about everything and never satisfied. Despite this, Odger still loves him as family.
relationship.Eckert Kerswell: As his confident and hardworking grandson, Eckert is someone that Odger sees a lot of himself in. He takes it upon himself to mentor and guide the young man.
relationship.Godwin Kerswell: Odger's relationship with his grandfather Godwin is one of mutual respect and admiration. They share a deep love for Luminia and its people.
relationship.Sorley Kerswell: As a cousin who shares Odger's sense of adventure, Sorley is someone that Odger looks up to and respects as a fellow explorer.

Odger Kerswell.secret: He has a great-grandchild from his forbidden relationship with a nomad girl
Odger Kerswell.short_description: Wise and experienced man who loves to tell stories

Orla Alkott.clothes: Simple white dress, with a shawl
Orla Alkott.description: Aging but still sharp, with a gentle and nurturing personality.

family.relationship: Loving towards all her family members

job.description: Aging but still sharp, with a gentle and nurturing personality.
job.quote: "Patience is the key to business success."
job.relations: Highly respected and admired by everyone in the group. Known for her wise words and generous heart.

Orla Alkott.name: Orla

job.quote: "Can I swing the axe?"

family.relationship: adores his grandmother Elatha

job.quote: "I never met a paint that didn't love a canvas"

Phineas Darkmantle.name: Phineas

Phineas Darkmantle.short_description: a mischievous child with a talent for art and a love for his family

Phineas Versh.description: A man who loves to laugh and tell stories.

family.relationship: The life of the party, sometimes too much for his family.

job.description: A man with a natural talent for gardening
job.quote: "All you need is a little water and love"
job.relations: Respected by the group for his expertise in the field, but not particularly close to any individual member.

Phineas Versh.name: Phineas
Phineas Versh.quote: "You can't help who you fall for."
Phineas Versh.secret: He's secretly in love with his best friend's wife.
Phineas Versh.short_description: A man who loves to laugh and tell stories.

anecdotes: Quinn once brewed a remedy that cured the local lord's headache, earning him a place of honor at the lord's court.

During a thunderstorm, Quinn used his knowledge of divination to predict that a fallen tree would cause flooding in the village. His warning allowed the villagers to take precautions and prevent any damage.
Quinn Vain.clothes: long robe with purple and gold stripes
Quinn Vain.description: Quinn Vain, also known as Papa Quinn, is a 70-year-old halfling with soft, wrinkled skin. Despite his short stature, he commands respect in the village of Luminia due to his wisdom, knowledge, and compassionate nature. He works at The Circle of Mystic Women as a senior herbalist, dedicating his life to the coven and their magical practices. Quinn is a loving father and grandfather, and a family head of the Vain family, where he is surrounded by other strong-willed and ambitious members. He is also a key figure in the coven, admired for his insight and expertise.

family.relationship: loving father and grandfather

goals: maintain peace and harmony in the village
pass on his knowledge to the next generation
Quinn Vain.habits: Quinn has a habit of speaking in a calm and measured tone, dispensing advice and knowledge to those around him. He is often found walking in the ancient forest that surrounds the village, seeking out rare herbs and ingredients for his magical potions and remedies. In his free time, Quinn enjoys reading and studying old scrolls and books in search of new magical knowledge.
Quinn Vain.history: Quinn was born and raised in Luminia as part of the Vain family, who are all dedicated to the coven. He learned the ways of herbalism and magic from his mother, Niall Vain, who was also a member of the coven. Quinn's commitment to the coven led him to complete an apprenticeship and become a full-fledged herbalist. Over the years, he has become one of the most respected and knowledgeable members of the coven, and has even attracted the attention of scholars and adventurers from neighboring villages who seek out his expertise. Throughout his life, he has witnessed many changes in Luminia, including the rise and fall of empires, forgotten beliefs and events, and the passing of generations.

job.quote: "The earth is our pharmacy if we know where to look"
job.relations: older brother of Niall Vain, close friend of Gamack Domack

Quinn Vain.name: Quinn
plot: Quinn is approached by a group from a neighboring village who seek his help in deciphering an ancient scroll. However, the scroll contains dangerous magic that could unleash a powerful curse on the village if not handled carefully.

Quinn is tasked with finding a rare herb deep in the mountains that is said to have powerful magical properties. However, the herb is guarded by a fearsome beast that has already claimed the lives of several adventurers.
Quinn discovers a dark secret about the coven's past that threatens to tear the group apart, and must decide whether to keep the secret hidden or confront the other members.

relationship.Durgan Vain: Quinn is proud of his son's adventurous nature, but worries that he may get himself into danger. He often gives Durgan advice on how to stay safe while exploring.
relationship.Hogan Vain: Quinn looks up to his father, who is the oldest member of the coven and has seen many changes in Luminia. He often seeks his advice on matters of history and tradition.
relationship.Kirwin Vain: Quinn has a deep respect for his eldest son's loyalty and hard work, and often relies on him to take charge of family matters in his absence.
relationship.Mara Vain: Quinn admires his daughter's independence and determination, and often seeks her out for advice on coven matters. He also worries that her ambition may lead her down a dangerous path.
relationship.Ryleigh Vain: Quinn enjoys spending time with his youngest son, who reminds him of his own carefree youth. He often shares stories of his adventures with Ryleigh to inspire him.

Quinn Vain.secret: dedicated his life to the coven

Regan Rhinehart.description: Regan Rhinehart is a young and impulsive adventurer from the hunting company The Bison Runners. He is tall with pale skin, short curly hair, and brown eyes. He wears leather armor and a green cloak. Regan is not originally from Luminia and his origins seem to be unknown. He is a close friend of other members of his solo-type group but doesn't trust magic-users. Regan is always eager for action and up for a challenge.

family.relationship: Close friend of other members of the group, ambitious

Regan Rhinehart.habits: Regan is quite restless and likes to keep himself busy. He spends most of his time training and going on adventures with his group. He is also known to enjoy a good drink at the local tavern from time to time.
Regan Rhinehart.history: Regan is not originally from Luminia and his past remains a mystery. He seems to have joined The Bison Runners as an outsider and worked his way up to become a senior hunter. Regan's true motivations for joining his current group are unknown but he seems to be ambitious and looking for a sense of purpose. His origin as an outsider may have contributed to his distrust for magic-users.

job.description: Excitable and always ready for action
job.quote: There's no better feeling than a good hunt
job.relations: energetic, competitive with Henna

Regan Rhinehart.name: Regan
plot: Regan discovers a hidden artifact in the Old Forest that could give him and his group incredible power but at what cost?
The Bison Runners run into trouble with a rival hunting company and Regan must use all his skills to protect his colleagues.
Regan's group comes across a strange creature that seems to be connected to his past.

relationship.Bartan Rothrock: Regan respects Bartan's leadership and authority over the group. He sees him as a father figure and often seeks his approval.
relationship.Betilda Rusling: Regan respects Betilda's skills as a trapper and sees her as a valuable member of their group. They do not have much of a relationship beyond working together on hunts.
relationship.Conor Roane: Regan gets along well with Conor and sees him as a valuable asset to their group. They often work together on gathering missions.
relationship.Ennis Atwood: Regan gets along well with Ennis and sees him as a valuable asset to their group. They often train together and share tips on hunting techniques.
relationship.Garrett Kerrigan: Regan finds Garrett's shyness somewhat annoying but recognizes his intelligence. They do not have much of a relationship beyond working together on hunts.
relationship.Henna Mallory: Regan is attracted to Henna's independence and intelligence. He likes to flirt with her but has not made any serious advances.
relationship.Morna Atwood: Regan respects Morna for her wisdom and caring nature. He looks up to her as a mentor and often seeks her advice.

Regan Rhinehart.short_description: Excitable and always ready for action

Renny Raelthorne.description: Strict and bitter grandmother. Retired seamstress.

family.relationship: dismissive towards everyone

job.description: Strict and bitter grandmother. Retired seamstress.
job.quote: "Being productive is the only way to stay young."
job.relations: Tough and stern, often butting heads with others in the group, but respected for her knowledge of fabrics and tailoring.

Renny Raelthorne.name: Renny
Renny Raelthorne.quote: "Back in my day we didn't have such luxuries"
Renny Raelthorne.short_description: Strict and bitter grandmother. Retired seamstress.

anecdotes: Renny once saved a swarm of bees that had taken up residence in the local tavern. She carefully captured the swarm and relocated them to one of her own hives.
Renny is known for her delicious honey cakes, which she bakes for special occasions in the village.
Renny once helped a young couple overcome their fertility problems using a traditional herbal remedy.
Renny Skarholt.clothes: Shawl and long skirt in muted colors
Renny Skarholt.description: Renny is a wise elder and beekeeper who has lived in Luminia for her entire life. She is frequently sought for advice by people of all ages and backgrounds, and is known throughout the village for her compassion, calmness, and empathetic nature. Renny is a member of a close-knit family with strong traditions and beliefs, and is beloved by her family members and friends alike.

family.relationship: Beloved matriarch of the family

Renny Skarholt.habits: Renny wakes up early every morning to tend to her bees before the sun becomes too hot. She spends most of her day outside amongst the hives, carefully nurturing her colonies and collecting honey and beeswax. In the evenings, she enjoys reading by the fire and sharing stories with her family. Renny also practices meditation and yoga to stay centered and calm.
Renny Skarholt.history: Renny was born and raised in Luminia, and has lived there her entire life. Her family has a long history in the village, and they are proud of their roots and traditions. Renny's parents instilled in her a love of nature and a deep spirituality that has guided her throughout her life. She learned beekeeping from her grandfather and has always felt a special connection to the bees. Over the years, Renny has become known as one of the most knowledgeable and respected beekeepers in the region.

job.description: A wise elder frequently sought for advice
job.quote: "The bees will tell you all you need to know."
job.relations: Patient with the apprentices, respected by all members of the group, seen as a matriarchal figure by the group.

Renny Skarholt.name: Renny
plot: Renny has recently been having vivid dreams that seem to be connected to a forgotten event from the village's past. She is determined to uncover the truth and discover what it means for the present.

Renny fears that the increasing demand for honey and beeswax could lead to over-harvesting and harm to the bee colonies. She is considering leading a campaign to raise awareness of sustainable beekeeping practices.

Renny's granddaughter Nally has been showing signs of an interest in beekeeping, but her mother Elatha is against the idea. Renny must navigate this family conflict and find a way to pass on her knowledge to the next generation.
Renny Skarholt.quote: “Life is short, so make it sweet”

relationship.Aria Hawksmoor: Renny has been grateful for Aria's knowledge and expertise as a healer, and has sought her out for advice on many occasions. Renny sees the natural world and its remedies as closely linked to her own beekeeping practices.
relationship.Arthur Farnsworth: Renny admires Arthur's precision and skill as a carpenter, and has commissioned him to create several pieces of custom furniture for her family over the years.
relationship.Dextrel Skarholt: Renny has always had a deep respect for her wise and perceptive husband Dextrel, who has been her partner in life for many years. Though they have their disagreements, they share a deep love and understanding of each other.
relationship.Elatha Skarholt: Renny has a close and loving relationship with her daughter Elatha, who shares her spiritual beliefs and values family above all else. Renny often seeks Elatha's advice when faced with difficult decisions.
relationship.Fenris Grimsson: Renny sees potential in Fenris's eagerness to learn to hunt and track, and hopes that he will develop a respect for the natural world and its balance. She worries that his impulsive nature could put himself or others in danger.
relationship.Gryan Oakley: Renny has little interaction with Gryan, but respects his reliable and skilled work as a stonemason. She hopes that he will continue to provide quality building materials for the village.
relationship.Gum Rhinehart: Renny respects Gum's confidence and energy as a leader of the Honey Keepers, though she sometimes worries that he may be too eager to take risks. She appreciates his support of her beekeeping skills.
relationship.Jarek Ironsides: Renny finds Jarek's enthusiasm for learning the craft of beekeeping infectious, and enjoys teaching him about the bees. She hopes that he will continue to grow in his knowledge and love for the hives.
relationship.Julian Rhinehart: Renny has a strong bond of respect and friendship with Julian, who shares her love of bees and appreciation for the natural world. Renny values Julian's wisdom and patience, and looks to him as a mentor.
relationship.Kaelin Blackthorn: Renny does not know Kaelin well, but respects his skill as a blacksmith and appreciates the weapons he has crafted for her family over the years.
relationship.Keavey Skarholt: Renny loves her impulsive and energetic granddaughter Keavey, but worries that the young girl will not take her studies seriously enough. Renny tries to balance her concern with her desire to encourage Keavey's creativity and curiosity.
relationship.Leif Magnusson: Renny has known Leif for many years, and appreciates his skill as a hunter and his deep knowledge of the forest. She sometimes worries that he takes too many risks in his adventures, but respects his love and appreciation for nature.
relationship.Morna Denby: Renny enjoys working with Morna at the Honey Keepers, and is impressed by the young woman's imagination and positivity. Renny sees great potential in Morna as a beekeeper.
relationship.Nally Skarholt: Renny is proud of her adventurous granddaughter Nally, and enjoys sharing stories of her own travels and experiences with the young woman. Nally has shown an interest in beekeeping, which pleases Renny greatly.
relationship.Sadie Muldoon: Renny has been impressed by Sadie's quiet but observant nature, and sees great potential in her as a future beekeeper. Renny tries to instill in Sadie a respect for the bees and a passion for sustainable practices.

Renny Skarholt.short_description: Wise elder frequently sought for advice

anecdotes: When Sumil was a young woman, she ventured into the ancient forest beyond Luminia's borders. She stumbled upon a mysterious cave that was said to contain the secrets of the Old One. Sumil spent days exploring the cave and learning its secrets. When she emerged, she was transformed by the knowledge she had gained.

Sumil is known for her ability to heal even the most severe injuries. Once, when a young adventurer was gravely injured by a pack of wolves, Sumil was able to bring him back from the brink of death with a powerful poultice.
Sumil is a skilled storyteller and often regales her grandchildren with tales of her adventures. Her stories are filled with magic, mystery, and wisdom.
Sumil Coralaeth.description: Sumil Coralaeth is a respected elder of Luminia. She has lived for more than two centuries and has seen numerous events that have shaped the village and its inhabitants. Sumil is known for her wisdom, kindness, and nurturing personality. She is the head of the Coralaeth family, a group of natives who have lived in Luminia for generations. Sumil is also a member of The Caretakers' Society, a guild of healers that provides medical care to the village. She is highly respected by her colleagues and is viewed as a mentor to the younger members of the guild. Sumil's life in Luminia has been centered around her family and her work with the guild.

family.relationship: Beloved by her family, respected by the village.

Sumil Coralaeth.habits: Sumil is an early riser and often spends her mornings tending to her garden. She is an avid reader and can often be found with her nose buried in a book. Sumil enjoys spending time with her family and is often seen chatting with her grandchildren or sharing stories with her cousins. She is a dedicated healer and spends many hours at The Caretakers' Society, caring for those in need.
Sumil Coralaeth.history: Sumil was born into the Coralaeth family, a group of natives who have lived in Luminia for generations. Her parents were both healers and taught her the art of medicine from a young age. Sumil quickly developed a passion for healing and went on to join The Caretakers' Society, where she has worked for most of her life. Sumil's long life has been filled with both joy and sorrow. She has witnessed the rise and fall of empires, the birth of new religions, and the passing of loved ones. Through it all, Sumil has remained steadfast in her commitment to her family and her work with the guild.

job.description: A wise elder who is respected by everyone
job.quote: "Nature has all the remedies, we just need to know where to find them"
job.relations: mentor and friend to Biagio
job.working_clothes: long white robe with a green shawl

Sumil Coralaeth.name: Sumil
plot: Sumil's long life has given her a unique perspective on the world around her. She may be approached by adventurers seeking guidance or knowledge that only she can provide.

Sumil's work with The Caretakers' Society may lead her into conflict with other factions in Luminia. She may have to navigate tricky political situations to ensure that her guild can continue to provide medical care to those in need.
Sumil may be approached by younger members of the Coralaeth family seeking advice or guidance. She must balance her desire to protect her family with their need to live their own lives.

Sumil's long life has also made her a witness to many secrets and mysteries. She may be approached by those seeking information about forgotten events or ancient artifacts that she has encountered in her travels.
Sumil Coralaeth.quote: "I've seen many things in my time."

relationship.Angihar Coralaeth: Sumil dotes on her granddaughter and enjoys spending time with her, often telling her stories and teaching her about the plants and animals in the ancient forest.
relationship.Nimestidar Coralaeth: Sumil has a deep admiration for her grandmother's wisdom, but has always sensed that there were secrets that Nimestidar kept hidden.
relationship.Ruibrarii Coralaeth: Sumil sees a lot of herself in her adventurous cousin and is often happy to share stories with her.
relationship.Tahlumillean Coralaeth: Sumil has a deep respect for her father and often seeks his advice on matters related to the family.
relationship.Thershaele Coralaeth: Sumil loves her youngest son dearly, but sometimes struggles to connect with his rebellious nature.
relationship.wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth: Sumil is proud of her eldest daughter's beauty and intelligence, but sometimes worries that she may be too focused on appearances.

Sumil Coralaeth.short_description: A wise elder who is respected by everyone.
