Tara Helstrom.name: Tara
Tara Helstrom.quote: The world is too big to stay in one place
Tara Helstrom.secret: She once got lost in the forest for a day

anecdotes: Once, during a village festival, Tara saved an old woman who had collapsed due to heat stroke by carrying her to the nearest shade and providing her with water and fruit.
Tara once organized a charity event to help poor families in Luminia by collecting donations from the villagers and distributing them equally among the families in need.
Tara's favorite hobby is gardening, and she loves to spend her free time nurturing flowers and plants in her family's farm.
Tara Talbot.description: Tara Talbot, the eldest daughter of the Talbot family, is a practical, efficient, and goal-oriented leader who works as an administrator at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God in Luminia. She is a pretty woman with long and blonde hair, brown eyes, and fair skin. Tara is well-respected by everyone in Luminia due to her strong leadership qualities and ambitious nature. She always wears a grey tunic with brown pants which allows her to move easily while managing the busy activities of the cooperative.

family.relationship: respected leader by everyone

Tara Talbot.habits: Tara is known for her disciplined lifestyle and punctuality. She wakes up early in the morning, takes a quick bath, and then spends some time reading books before starting her day. She always makes sure to finish her tasks on time and also finds time to exercise regularly in the evening.
Tara Talbot.history: Tara was born and raised in Luminia, where she learned the values of hard work and discipline from her parents and grandparents. She received her education from the local scholars and later joined The Devout of the Non-Gendered God as an administrator. She quickly rose through the ranks due to her efficiency and ambitious nature. She dreams of making the cooperative prosper and bring innovation in the worship services.

job.quote: \"Order is the key to success\"
job.relations: distant from other members
job.workplace: The Devout of the Non-Gendered God

Tara Talbot.name: Tara
plot: Tara discovers a unique herb in the ancient forest that has healing properties and decides to use it for the benefit of the cooperative. However, she faces challenges from rival factions who want to use the herb for their own gains.

The Devout of the Non-Gendered God faces financial difficulties due to a decrease in the number of worshippers. Tara comes up with a plan to attract more people to the worship services by introducing innovative rituals and spreading awareness about the unique beliefs of the cooperative.

Tara's ambitious nature leads her to clash with her parents and grandparents, who have more traditional views on farming and religion. She must find a way to balance her personal goals with the expectations of her family and the community.

A mysterious illness spreads in Luminia, affecting both humans and animals. Tara takes charge of the situation and collaborates with local scholars and healers to find a cure. However, they soon realize that the source of the illness is not natural but magical, and they must find a way to deal with its origins.
Tara Talbot.quote: ''We don't have to be rich and famous. We just have to be awesome.''

relationship.Alley Talbot: Tara's grandmother Alley is a compassionate and sharp-minded elder who often advises Tara on matters of the heart and the mind. Alley is one of Tara's biggest supporters and always encourages her to pursue her dreams.
relationship.Artis Talbot: Tara's father Artis is a traditional farmer who has more conservative views on religion and farming than Tara. However, he loves his daughter and respects her choices, even if he does not always agree with them.
relationship.Brona Gilroy: Tara respects Brona's creative talents as a baker and often collaborates with her on various projects related to The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. Brona, in turn, admires Tara's leadership qualities and seeks her guidance on personal matters.
relationship.Cammy Talbot: Tara is very close to her younger sister Cammy, whom she often mentors and advises on life decisions. Cammy looks up to Tara and seeks to emulate her strong leadership qualities.
relationship.Derry Gilroy: Tara's distant relative Derry is a shy but diligent student at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God and a member of the Gilroy family. Tara often gives her advice and helps her with her studies, as she sees potential in her as a future healer.
relationship.Derry Talbot: Tara's mother Derry is a wise and experienced herbalist whom Tara respects and seeks advice from when it comes to matters of health and medicine. Derry is proud of her daughter's achievements and supports her in her endeavors.
relationship.Nash Barrington: As the village leader and a senior member of The Devout of the Non-Gendered God, Nash is one of Tara's trusted colleagues and advisors. She often consults with Nash on important matters related to the cooperative and its future.
relationship.Stianna Talbot: Although they have different personalities, Tara and her sister Stianna share a deep bond over their love of baking and their passion for the cooperative. Tara often helps Stianna with her baking business and supports her in her other endeavors.

anecdotes: When Torey was still an apprentice, she accidentally caught a giant octopus. Her colleagues were impressed with her bravery and skill in wrestling the creature into submission.
Torey once challenged Conor Roane to a fishing competition. The two spent all day on the river trying to catch the largest fish. In the end, Torey won by catching a 20-pound trout.
Torey Ironside.description: Torey Ironside is a 25-year-old female human who works as a fisherman apprentice at The Lucky Catchers. She is known for her practicality and efficiency, which makes her an invaluable asset to the guild. Torey is also ambitious and disciplined, traits that have helped her rise up in the ranks to become the second-in-command. Despite being an outsider, Torey has managed to gain the respect of her colleagues and the people of Luminia. She lives with her fellow guild members, including the family head Juliana Durst and underlings Conor Roane, Elspeth Halstead, Waldron Ellsworth, and Icabod Denisson.

family.relationship: respects Juliana, guides Conor, occasionally clashes with Elspeth and Waldron

Torey Ironside.habits: Torey is a morning person and wakes up early to start her day. She enjoys fishing and spends most of her time working on the boats or repairing nets. Torey is also a disciplined individual who values punctuality and hard work. She spends her free time reading books about fishing techniques and exploring the nearby mountains and forest.
Torey Ironside.history: Torey was born outside of Luminia and joined The Lucky Catchers as an apprentice when she was 20 years old. She quickly proved herself to be a reliable and skilled fisherman, which earned her the respect of her colleagues. Torey's ambition and discipline helped her rise up in the ranks to become the vice-chief of the guild. She looks up to Juliana Durst and hopes to one day lead the guild herself. Torey is also fascinated by the local beliefs in Luminia, particularly the non-gendered God. She enjoys discussing these topics with the scholars and adventurers who visit the village.

job.quote: "Let's get this catch in!"
job.relations: works very well with Juliana and wants to learn as much as possible from her mentor

Torey Ironside.name: Torey
plot: Torey's ambition may cause her to clash with Juliana Durst, who may not be ready to hand over leadership of the guild just yet. This could create tension and conflict within the group.

Torey's curiosity about the Old One and the forgotten event could lead her down a dangerous path. She may uncover secrets that were meant to stay buried, which could put her and her colleagues in danger.

relationship.Conor Roane: Torey enjoys spending time with Conor and sees him as a friend. They share a passion for fishing and often compete against each other to see who can catch the biggest fish.
relationship.Elspeth Halstead: Torey occasionally clashes with Elspeth, who is shy and reserved. Torey sometimes finds Elspeth's timidity frustrating, but tries to be patient with her.
relationship.Icabod Denisson: Torey respects Icabod's hardworking attitude and takes pride in working alongside him. They don't have a particularly close relationship, but get along well.
relationship.Juliana Durst: Torey respects Juliana and looks up to her as a mentor. Juliana relies on Torey's practicality and efficiency to keep the guild running smoothly.
relationship.Waldron Ellsworth: Torey does not have a close relationship with Waldron. He can be sullen and defensive, which makes it difficult for Torey to connect with him.

Torey Ironside.short_description: Practical and efficient, she supports Juliana with her skills

family.relationship: loves her family

job.relations: respected by all and often takes care of newer sailors

anecdotes: Vidor once led a successful expedition into the ancient forest surrounding Luminia, discovering a new trade route that greatly benefited the village.
Despite his busy schedule, Vidor always finds time to share a story or two with his youngest daughter Derry.
Vidor Fenwick.clothes: sturdy leather armor and a cloak, adorned with trophies and relics
Vidor Fenwick.description: Vidor Fenwick is a 48-year-old native of Luminia. He is a natural leader who is fiercely dedicated to the safety and success of his family. Vidor works as a banker and boss at The Prosperity League, where he uses his determination and resourcefulness to ensure financial safety. Despite his competence, Vidor secretly struggles with alcoholism. He is a tall and muscular man, with light brown eyes and short and wild hair, usually kept in a ponytail. He wears sturdy leather armor and a cloak adorned with trophies and relics. Vidor has a long scar across his left cheek. He is respected by all in Luminia but is especially relied upon by his wife and children.

family.relationship: respected by all, but especially relied upon by his wife and children

Vidor Fenwick.habits: Vidor is a disciplined leader who follows a routine every day. He wakes up early, exercises, and begins his work at The Prosperity League. He highly values order and planning, and he is constantly thinking of ways to improve the financial safety of his family. Despite his alcoholism, Vidor attempts to keep it under control by limiting his intake when necessary.
Vidor Fenwick.hair: short and wild, usually kept in a ponytail
Vidor Fenwick.history: Vidor's family, which includes his grandfather Arland, his grandmother Lorna, his mother Devlin, and his youngest daughter Derry, have lived in Luminia for generations. The group is well-respected within the village and holds a strong belief in their non-gendered God. Vidor has always been a natural leader, and throughout his life, he has matured into a fierce protector of his kin. His work at The Prosperity League has provided his family with financial prosperity, which they have used to invest in the future of Luminia.

job.description: A natural leader who is fiercely dedicated to financial safety
job.quote: "Gold is a cruel master."
job.relations: Respected and admired by all members of the guild, seen as the backbone of the organization

Vidor Fenwick.name: Vidor
Vidor Fenwick.physical detail: a long scar across his left cheek
plot: Given Vidor's struggles with alcoholism, it is possible that this could eventually become an issue for his leadership and family. It is up to the other members of the living group to help him overcome this personal struggle before it causes any serious problems.
As a respected and wealthy member of Luminia, Vidor may be targeted by individuals seeking to steal from him. It is up to Vidor to ensure that his security measures are top-notch.

Vidor may be called upon to lead an important diplomatic mission on behalf of The Prosperity League. It is up to him to navigate the political intricacies while protecting the interests of his family and colleagues.

relationship.Arland Fenwick: Vidor has a deep respect for his wise and experienced grandfather Arland, who he turns to for guidance in times of uncertainty.
relationship.Derry Fenwick: Vidor loves his curious and adventurous youngest daughter Derry dearly, and often takes time out of his busy schedule to share stories with her.
relationship.Devlin Fenwick: Vidor's fiercely intelligent and driven mother Devlin supports his leadership and helps him manage the finances of The Prosperity League.
relationship.Lorna Fenwick: Vidor's relationship with his compassionate and nurturing grandmother Lorna is one based on mutual affection and support.

Vidor Fenwick.short_description: a natural leader who is fiercely dedicated to the safety and success of the group

anecdotes: Vinter once helped a group of adventurers navigate the treacherous mountain pass outside of Luminia. His knowledge of the area and his ability to read the natural signs saved the group from disaster.

Vinter was once approached by a wealthy merchant who offered him a large sum of money to reveal the location of a rare and valuable herb that only grows in the forest surrounding Luminia. Vinter politely declined, preferring to keep the knowledge of the herb within his family and his community.
Vinter Helstrom.description: Vinter Helstrom is an elderly man of 80 years old with a kind face and a gentle smile. He is well-known in the village of Luminia for his wise words and caring attitude towards others. Vinter was born and raised in the village and has lived there his whole life. He has never been interested in leaving, preferring the comfort and familiarity of his home. Vinter's days are spent tending bar at Helstrom's Hearth, a popular inn and gathering place in the village. He knows all the regulars by name and enjoys listening to their stories and sharing his own. In his free time, Vinter can often be found sitting by the river, lost in thought or spending time with his family.

family.relationship: Loves spending time with his family

Vinter Helstrom.habits: Vinter has a daily routine that he rarely deviates from. He wakes up early each morning and goes for a walk in the forest to clear his mind and get some exercise. He then spends the rest of the day working at Helstrom's Hearth, where he takes great care in preparing drinks and engaging in friendly conversation with the patrons. In the evenings, Vinter enjoys spending time with his family, telling stories of the past and imparting his wisdom to his grandchildren.
Vinter Helstrom.hair: Long white beard and balding head
Vinter Helstrom.history: Vinter comes from a long line of natives who have lived in the Luminia area for generations. His ancestors were some of the first settlers in the village and helped establish it as a prosperous center of trade and commerce. Vinter has always been proud of his heritage and has made it his life's work to preserve the traditions and beliefs of his people. He is deeply connected to the land and the forest that surrounds the village, and often reflects on the role his ancestors played in shaping the community. Vinter has seen many changes in Luminia over the years, including the rise and fall of empires and the arrival of outsiders who have brought with them new beliefs and customs. Through it all, he has remained true to his roots and his commitment to his family and his village.

job.description: Wise and caring patriarch who knows all the regulars
job.quote: "A good drink and good company are all you need."
job.relations: Bailey's father; Muriel's grandfather; mentor to Alain; Derry's great-grandfather

Vinter Helstrom.name: Vinter
plot: Vinter discovers a forgotten artifact in the forest that sheds new light on the history of his people. He must decide whether to share this knowledge with the outside world or keep it a secret.
A group of outsiders arrive in Luminia and begin to challenge the beliefs and customs of the natives. Vinter must decide whether to stand up for his traditions or embrace the new ways.

One of Vinter's children becomes involved in a dangerous plot that threatens the safety of the village. Vinter must navigate the delicate balance between loyalty to his family and his duty to his community.
Vinter Helstrom.quote: You cannot buy respect, you must earn it

relationship.Alain Helstrom: Vinter appreciates Alain's creative approach to cooking and often asks him to prepare special dishes for his family.
relationship.Arias Voyle: Vinter sees a bit of himself in Arias and admires his energy and thirst for adventure.
relationship.Bailey Helstrom: Vinter has a close working relationship with Bailey, who manages Helstrom's Hearth. He trusts her implicitly and relies on her to keep the business running smoothly.
relationship.Bixler Voyle: Vinter admires Bixler's adventurous spirit and enjoys hearing about his travels and experiences.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Vinter considers Boren a close friend and confidant and values his advice on matters concerning the village.
relationship.Derry Helstrom: Vinter sees a bit of himself in Derry and enjoys talking to him about his own experiences growing up in Luminia.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Vinter has a deep love and respect for his grandmother and seeks her advice on matters of family and tradition.
relationship.Erris Voyle: As an elder himself, Vinter has a deep respect for Erris and enjoys listening to her stories and wisdom.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Vinter enjoys spending time with his grandfather and learning from his years of experience and wisdom.
relationship.Jordan Raelthorne: Although Vinter doesn't interact with Jordan often, he respects her position as one of the leaders of the caravaneers and values the work they do for the village.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Although Vinter is sometimes frustrated by Kearey's rebellious streak, he recognizes her potential as a scholar and encourages her to pursue her dreams.
relationship.Muriel Helstrom: Vinter enjoys teaching Muriel about the art of bartending and takes pride in watching her develop her skills.

Vinter Helstrom.secret: He is secretly writing his memoirs

anecdotes: Vora once saved the life of a fellow guild member who was being attacked by a rival gang. She managed to take down three of them on her own before the rest of their group retreated.

Vora is known for her impeccable memory and attention to detail, and she once uncovered a significant security breach in the guild's operations by recalling a conversation she had overheard weeks prior.
Vora Murdoch.description: Vora Murdoch is a 40-year-old female human who lives in Luminia and works as a strategist for the Cloaks of Coercion, a guild of bandits. She is a natural leader and the head of her family group, which is made up of several other long-time members of the town. Vora is level-headed and practical, and she takes her role in the guild and her family seriously. She is respected by fellow members and typically makes decisions that prioritize the safety and success of the group. Despite their criminal activities, Vora and her group are quite invested in Luminia's wellbeing and protection.

family.relationship: motherly towards the other members, protective of her family members

Vora Murdoch.habits: Vora has developed a habit of carrying a small notebook with her at all times, where she documents everything she observes and hears, especially during meetings with other guild leaders or potential clients. She also makes a point to check on the rest of her family group regularly, both to ensure they are safe and to keep tabs on their morale and any personal issues they may be facing.
Vora Murdoch.history: Vora grew up as an outsider in Luminia, but she quickly found a place among those who accepted her into their fold. Over time, she became more invested in the town's prosperity and safety, and eventually joined the Cloaks of Coercion to help protect it from the inside out. Vora quickly worked her way up the ranks, impressing those around her with her strategic mind and levelheadedness. Today, she is one of the most respected members of the guild and one of the longest-standing members of her family group.

job.description: Level-headed and practical, a natural leader
job.quote: "We need to strike hard and fast if we want to succeed."
job.relations: As the boss, she keeps the others in line and always has a plan in case things go wrong. Kind but firm with her subordinates. Considers Ansel a little brother and appreciates Tahlumillean's knowledge of the river.

Vora Murdoch.name: Vora
plot: Vora finds out that a senior member of the Cloaks of Coercion is secretly plotting against her and her family group. She must decide whether to confront them head-on or try to find a more diplomatic solution.

Vora discovers information about a potentially lucrative heist that could greatly benefit the guild. However, the job poses a significant risk, and Vora must weigh the potential rewards against the chance of getting caught.

A new member joins Vora's family group, but they struggle to assimilate into the dynamic. Vora must act as a mediator and try to bring the new member up to speed while keeping the group's morale high.

Vora's past as an outsider comes back to haunt her when a group of local bullies target her and her family group. Vora must find a way to protect both her physical safety and her reputation within the guild.

relationship.Ansel Atwood: As an apprentice lookout, Ansel is one of the newer members of the Cloaks of Coercion. Vora has taken him under her wing, recognizing his potential as a talented and disciplined member of the group. Vora sees a lot of herself in Ansel and hopes to help him develop into a leader like herself.
relationship.Bryson Bannister: As one of the grumpier members of Vora's family group, Bryson often clashes with Vora over issues related to guild operations. Despite their disagreements, Vora respects Bryson's dedication to the group and his strong work ethic. She admires his honesty and integrity, and she sees him as a valuable voice of reason in many discussions and decisions related to the Cloaks of Coercion.
relationship.Cammy Grayden: Cammy and Vora have known each other for years, having grown up together in Luminia. While Cammy is not a member of the Cloaks of Coercion, she is deeply invested in the success and wellbeing of Vora's family group. Vora sees Cammy as a source of moral support and often confides in her about personal matters that affect the guild and her family group.
relationship.Delp Scarrow: Vora has mixed feelings about Delp, who is known for his rash impulsiveness and quick temper. While she recognizes his value as a fierce defender of the group, Vora often finds herself at odds with Delp over issues related to safety and strategy. Vora worries that Delp's hot-headedness could put the group in danger, but she also sees his loyalty as a valuable asset to the guild.
relationship.Dunla Baskin: Vora looks up to Dunla as a source of knowledge and expertise on a wide range of topics. Dunla's encyclopedic knowledge of Luminia's history and local beliefs has often proved invaluable to the Cloaks of Coercion, and Vora often consults with her when planning strategic moves for the guild.
relationship.Durwin Hitch: As the leader of Vora's family group, Durwin and Vora have a close working relationship. Vora often seeks Durwin's counsel and advice in strategic matters, and the two share a deep understanding of the inner workings of the Cloaks of Coercion. Vora greatly admires Durwin's experience and discipline, and she looks up to him as a father figure in many ways.
relationship.Gamack Domack: As the oldest member of the Cloaks of Coercion, Gamack is revered for his wisdom and his extensive knowledge of the town's history and local beliefs. Vora greatly respects Gamack and often seeks his advice on matters related to the guild's legacy and reputation. Gamack sees a lot of potential in Vora and has taken on a mentorship role in her life, encouraging her to continue developing her leadership skills.
relationship.Stephan Silverwood: Vora has a tense and often contentious relationship with Stephan, who is known for his ruthless and violent tendencies. While Vora recognizes the value of having an enforcer on the team, she often finds herself at odds with Stephan over issues related to the safety and wellbeing of their fellow members. Despite their disagreements, the two harbor a grudging respect for one another's skills and dedication to the guild.
relationship.Tahlumillean Coralaeth: Vora has worked with Tahlumillean on several river raids in the past, and the two have developed a mutually respectful working relationship. Vora appreciates his expertise and experience on the water and often seeks his advice on tactical matters related to river-based missions.

anecdotes: Once, a young apprentice at The Timbermen Guild challenged Wolfe to a wood-chopping contest. Needless to say, Wolfe won by a landslide.
Wolfe once caught his oldest son sneaking out of the house late at night. Instead of scolding him, Wolfe took him out to the forest and taught him survival skills.
Wolfe Atwood.description: Wolfe Atwood is a 51 year old lumberjack living in the village of Luminia. He is a native of the village and has worked for The Timbermen Guild for most of his life. Wolfe is protective and stern, particularly when it comes to his family. He has a thick beard and short, grey hair. Wolfe's scar on his right forearm is a constant reminder of a past event that he prefers not to talk about. Despite his gruff exterior, Wolfe is loved and respected by his children.

family.relationship: Loved and respected by his children

Wolfe Atwood.habits: Wolfe is a creature of habit. He wakes up early every day to chop wood and does not stop until the job is done. In the evenings, he spends time with his family and enjoys a glass of ale. On weekends, Wolfe likes to explore the nearby ancient forest and river. He is not one for frivolous activities and believes in hard work and responsibility.
Wolfe Atwood.hair: Short and grey hair with a thick beard
Wolfe Atwood.history: Wolfe comes from a long line of lumberjacks and it is a profession that runs in the family. His father and grandfather were both members of The Timbermen Guild. Wolfe married his childhood sweetheart and together they have four children. Wolfe's secret is that he killed a man in self-defense when he was younger, an event that continues to haunt him to this day. However, he uses his experiences to teach his children about responsibility and the importance of protecting their loved ones.

job.quote: "Stay focused or you'll lose a limb"
job.relations: close friend to Brone

Wolfe Atwood.name: Wolfe
plot: Wolfe's past may come back to haunt him when a stranger comes to Luminia looking for revenge.
Wolfe's eldest child goes missing in the ancient forest and he must rally the village to find them.
The Timbermen Guild is struggling and Wolfe must decide whether to stay loyal to the guild or join a new cooperative that offers better pay and benefits.
Wolfe discovers a family secret that shakes the foundation of his beliefs and must confront his own biases and prejudices.
Wolfe Atwood.quote: I'd lay down my life for my family

relationship.Ansel Atwood: Wolfe is proud of his son and respects his dutiful and strict nature. They have a good father-son relationship.
relationship.Bailey Atwood: Wolfe's great-grandmother is sharp-tongued and witty, and they share a love of storytelling.
relationship.Brone Langworth: Wolfe respects Brone's quiet determination and follows his lead at The Timbermen Guild.
relationship.Bryson Villius: Wolfe admires Bryson's wisdom and reliability, and looks up to him as a mentor.
relationship.Cecily Atwood: Wolfe's youngest daughter is kind-hearted and sensitive, and he is fiercely protective of her.
relationship.Dowd Langworth: Wolfe has a professional relationship with Dowd and respects his ambition and hard work.
relationship.Dunla Villius: Wolfe appreciates Dunla's gentle and wise nature and often seeks her advice.
relationship.Gale Atwood: Wolfe's sister is sassy and confident, and they have a playful sibling dynamic.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Wolfe sees potential in Kearey's rebellious nature and encourages her to pursue her dreams of becoming a scholar.
relationship.Kelsey Atwood: Wolfe's cousin is resourceful and independent, and they have a respectful professional relationship at The Timbermen Guild.
relationship.Malek Langworth: Wolfe worries about Malek's impulsiveness but sees potential in the young boy.
relationship.Morna Atwood: Wolfe loves and respects his grandmother, who is wise and caring. She is a constant source of comfort for him.
relationship.Orla Atwood: Wolfe's daughter is artistic and dreamy, traits that he admires but sometimes struggles to understand.
relationship.Orla Langworth: Wolfe finds Orla's curiosity and playfulness refreshing, and enjoys teaching her new skills at The Timbermen Guild.
relationship.Shay Langworth: Wolfe respects Shay's hard work and nurturing nature, and they have a good working relationship.
relationship.Stianna Atwood: Wolfe's great-granddaughter is mischievous and energetic, and he enjoys spending time with her.
relationship.Wyatt Langworth: Wolfe finds Wyatt's bashfulness endearing and enjoys teaching him new skills at The Timbermen Guild.

Wolfe Atwood.secret: He killed a man in self-defense when he was younger

anecdotes: Wynnie once settled a dispute between two rival guilds with her diplomatic skills.
She once discovered an ancient artifact while exploring the forest and donated it to the local scholars.
Wyn'Talyththi is known for her exquisite taste in fashion and often designs her own dresses.
wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.description: wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth is a respected and admired member of the Shoemakers Guild in Luminia. She is a beautiful and intelligent elf woman with good taste who runs The Sole Savers, a small but prosperous shoemaking business in the village. Wynnie, as she is affectionately called by her friends and family, is known for her diplomatic skills and is often called upon to settle disputes within the village. She has a close relationship with her family, particularly her mother Erris Voyle who she looks up to as a role model. In her free time, wyn'Talyththi enjoys exploring the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia and studying the local beliefs and mythology.

family.relationship: Respected by her family, admired by the village.

wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.habits: Wyn'Talyththi is a disciplined individual who values punctuality and organization. She starts her day early by taking a walk in the forest to clear her mind before heading to work at The Sole Savers. She takes pride in her appearance and always dresses elegantly in flowy blue dresses and silver jewelry. Wynnie also enjoys cooking and often invites her colleagues and friends over for dinner parties.
wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.history: Wyn'Talyththi was born and raised in Luminia as the eldest daughter of the Voyle family. Growing up, she was always fascinated by the stories of the Old One and the unique continent they lived on. As a child, she spent hours listening to her grandmother Enda's tales of the Forgotten Event and dreaming of one day uncovering the mysteries that surrounded their village. When she turned 18, wyn'Talyththi joined The Sole Savers as an apprentice and quickly rose through the ranks to become the boss of the shoemaking business. She has since expanded the business and is constantly looking for new opportunities to learn and grow as a prominent member of Luminia's community.

job.description: A beautiful and intelligent woman with good taste.
job.quote: "Good shoes should be worn with pride."
job.relations: Mentors Durgan, appreciates his enthusiasm
job.working_clothes: elegant dress with an embroidered leather apron

wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.name: wyn'Talyththi
plot: Wyn'Talyththi's business has been flourishing, but she wants to expand it even further. She is considering opening up a second shop in a neighboring village, but she needs to convince her colleagues and family that it's a good idea.

While exploring the forest, wyn'Talyththi stumbles upon a hidden cave that contains a clue to the village's forgotten past. She sets out on a quest to uncover the truth behind the mysteries that surround their community.
One of her colleagues at The Sole Savers is secretly sabotaging the business. Wyn'Talyththi must figure out who it is before it's too late and their livelihood is destroyed.

relationship.Bixler Voyle: As the eldest son of the family, Bixler is protective of his sister wyn'Talyththi and often helps her out at The Sole Savers. They share a love for adventure and often go on hikes in the forest together.
relationship.Boren Voyle: wyn'Talyththi's father Boren is a respected figure in the village, and she values his opinion greatly. He is always there to offer advice and support when needed.
relationship.Durgan Vain: As an apprentice at The Sole Savers, Durgan looks up to wyn'Talyththi as a boss and mentor. She often goes out of her way to provide him with opportunities to learn and grow as a shoemaker.
relationship.Enda Voyle: wyn'Talyththi's grandmother Enda is a wise old woman with vast life experience. She has taught wyn'Talyththi much about the history and mythology of Luminia, and she continues to be a source of inspiration for her.
relationship.Erris Voyle: wyn'Talyththi has a close relationship with her mother Erris, who she looks up to as a role model. They often have long conversations about the history and mythology of Luminia.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: wyn'Talyththi's grandfather Garrett is a quiet and reserved man, but she has always respected his wisdom and observations. He provides a different perspective on the world that she finds valuable.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: wyn'Talyththi's younger sister Kearey is rebellious and headstrong, but they share a close bond. Despite their differences, wyn'Talyththi supports Kearey's dreams of becoming a scholar.

wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.short_description: A beautiful and intelligent woman with good taste.

anecdotes: Once, Alley helped a group of adventurers in finding a lost artifact in the mountains surrounding Luminia.
Alley has a secret collection of rare books that she inherited from her grandfather.
During a festival, Alley danced with the village leader, Nash Barrington, and surprised everyone with her energy and moves.
Alley Mosley.description: Alley Mosley is an elder of Luminia who has lived her whole life in the village. She is a historian who knows everything about her home and its past. She works at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God as a senior member, where she is respected by all. Her wise and caring personality makes her a beloved member of the group. She has no children but is very close to her family members.

family.relationship: respected by all

Alley Mosley.habits: Alley Mosley is a traditional person who values respect and honesty above all else. She wakes up early every day to start her work at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. When she is not working, she spends her time reading books and memorizing historical events. She loves taking long walks in the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia.
Alley Mosley.history: Alley Mosley was born and raised in Luminia. She comes from a family of farmers who have been living in the village for generations. She never married nor had any children, but she dedicated her life to learning and preserving the history of Luminia. She has witnessed the growth and prosperity of the village and has seen it endure hard times. Her wisdom and knowledge are respected by everyone in the village.

job.quote: \"The past holds many secrets, but I have the key\"
job.relations: mentor to younger historians
job.workplace: The Devout of the Non-Gendered God

Alley Mosley.name: Alley
plot: Alley has uncovered a mystery about the Old One, an ancient deity worshipped by the natives of Luminia. She needs help in decoding a message left by the Old One.
Alley has found an old map that could lead to a hidden treasure. She needs adventurers to help her find it.
A group of scholars has arrived at Luminia, and they are interested in learning about the beliefs and customs of the natives. Alley is excited to teach them about her home.
A new group of settlers has arrived in Luminia, and they seem to have different values and beliefs than the natives. Alley is worried about the impact they might have on the village.
Alley Mosley.quote: In my time, people had more respect for their elders.

relationship.Creel Barrington: Creel is an apprentice blacksmith at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. Alley finds him a bit brusque but admires his hardworking attitude.
relationship.Derry Talbot: Derry is Alley's boss at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. They get along very well and often discuss their work together.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Garrett is a member of the family where Alley also resides. They have a mutual respect for each other, and Garrett sometimes comes to Alley for advice on family matters.
relationship.Nash Barrington: Alley and Nash have known each other for decades. They share a mutual respect and admiration for each other's work. Nash often seeks advice from Alley before making decisions.

Alley Mosley.short_description: Wise and caring, knows everything about the village's history

anecdotes: Alley once helped a group of adventurers find their way through the ancient forest using her knowledge of the region's history and landmarks.
Alley is known for her sharp wit and often tells jokes to lighten the mood during tense situations.
Despite her age, Alley continues to be an active member of the community and often helps those in need.
Alley once found an old relic in the river near Luminia that was believed to be lost for centuries. Her discovery shed new light on the history of the region.
Alley Talbot.clothes: purple shawl over a white dress
Alley Talbot.description: Alley Talbot is an 80-year-old female elder who is known for her compassionate and sharp mind. Born with the name Vain, she has aged gracefully and still maintains her very pretty appearance despite her age. She stands short with fair skin, hazel eyes, and grey wavy hair. Alley is often seen wearing a purple shawl over a white dress. She is a loved grandmother and storyteller in her living group, the Voyle family. Alley works at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God as a historian. Her expertise in history and lore makes her highly respected and knowledgeable among her colleagues.

family.relationship: loved grandmother and storyteller of the group

Alley Talbot.habits: Alley is a creature of habit. She wakes up early every day to tend to her small garden outside of her home in Luminia. She spends most of her day reading and writing about the history and lore of the region. In the evenings, she can be found sharing her knowledge with her family and friends. Alley is also known for her love of tea, which she enjoys throughout the day.
Alley Talbot.history: Alley Talbot was born and raised in Luminia. She grew up in the Voyle family, where she learned the importance of family and community. As she grew older, Alley developed a love for history and storytelling. She spent much of her youth exploring the ancient forest and mountains that surround Luminia, always seeking to understand the mysteries of the region. As she got older, Alley became more involved in the community. She worked hard to preserve the stories and beliefs of her people, and eventually became a historian at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. To this day, Alley continues to share her knowledge and understanding of the region with those around her.

job.quote: \"Age gives you wisdom, but it doesn't cure foolishness\"
job.relations: mentor to younger members
job.workplace: The Devout of the Non-Gendered God

Alley Talbot.name: Alley
plot: Alley has been tasked with preserving the history of Luminia, but there are some who seek to erase certain parts of the region's past. She may find herself in danger as she tries to protect the legacy of her people.
A group of outsiders has arrived in Luminia with their own ideologies and beliefs. Alley may be caught between her loyalty to her people and her desire to learn and understand new ways of thinking.

Alley has uncovered a long-forgotten event in the history of the region that could change everything people know about their past. She must navigate political intrigue and danger as she tries to have the truth revealed.

Alley has become increasingly concerned about the impact of humans on the ancient forest and mountains that surround Luminia. She may start a movement to promote conservation and preservation of the environment.
Alley Talbot.quote: ''Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.''

relationship.Bixler Voyle: Alley sees a lot of herself in Bixler and enjoys discussing history and adventure with him. She hopes he will one day become a historian like her.
relationship.Boren Voyle: As the head of the Voyle family, Boren respects Alley's wisdom and knowledge. The two often share conversations about history and the region's legacy.
relationship.Enda Voyle: As the elder of the Voyle family, Enda and Alley share a special bond. The two often have quiet conversations about life and the mysteries of the world.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Alley has a close relationship with Erris and often serves as a mentor to her. The two share a love for storytelling and history.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Alley has known Garrett for many years and respects his wisdom and insight. The two often have deep conversations about the world around them.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Alley admires Kearey's curiosity and ambition. She hopes to inspire her to pursue her dreams, even if they take her outside of Luminia.

Alley Talbot.short_description: compassionate elder with a sharp mind

anecdotes: Ansel once saved his daughter Orla from drowning in the river when she was younger, an event that cemented their strong bond
Ansel and his cousin Ennis used to sneak out of the village at night to explore the surrounding forests when they were teenagers
Ansel Atwood.description: Ansel Atwood is a 35-year old dutiful and strict father who works as an apprentice lookout at Cloaks of Coercion, a guild involved in banditry and robbery. He lives in Luminia with his extended family, including his wise and caring grandmother Morna, his artistic and dreamy daughter Orla, his sassy and confident aunt Gale, his great-grandmother Bailey who is known for her sharp-tongue, his kind-hearted and shy youngest daughter Cecily, his mischievous and energetic great-granddaughter Stianna and his protective and stern father Wolfe. Despite his involvement in banditry, Ansel prioritizes the well-being of his family above all else. However, he secretly harbors a crush on the village healer.

family.relationship: Respected and feared by his children

Ansel Atwood.habits: Ansel is a very organized and efficient person who values integrity and discipline. He wakes up early every morning to exercise and prepare breakfast for his family before heading out to work at Cloaks of Coercion. He has a tendency to be strict with his children and can come across as intimidating to those who don't know him well.
Ansel Atwood.history: Ansel comes from a long line of natives in Luminia and his family has lived there for generations. They have seen the village grow and prosper, thanks to its strategic location between an ancient forest, a river and mountains that make it an ideal spot for trade. Ansel's commitment to providing for his family led him to join the Cloaks of Coercion, a decision he sometimes regrets but knows he cannot leave. He often dreams of a life without the dangers of banditry, where he can provide for his family through honest means.

job.quote: "No one will get past me on my watch."
job.relations: Always eager to follow orders from his superiors, but can be a bit nervous at times. Has a crush on Vora.

Ansel Atwood.name: Ansel
plot: Ansel's involvement with the Cloaks of Coercion may put his family in danger, leading him to question his loyalty to the guild and consider leaving
Ansel's crush on the village healer may lead to a difficult decision between his duty to his family and his own desires
Ansel may discover a dark secret about his family's past that threatens the reputation and legacy they have built in Luminia

Ashlan was once approached by a group of young adventurers looking for guidance on a quest. Ashlan listened intently to their stories and offered sage advice, which they found invaluable on their journey.
Ashlan once organized a community gathering to commemorate a forgotten event in Luminian history. The event was a great success and brought together members of the community who had never before met.
Ashlan Pendrake.clothes: Long and dark dress with a shawl
Ashlan Pendrake.description: Ashlan is a wise and knowledgeable elder who has dedicated her life to serving her community. She works at The Council of Wisdom alongside other respected elders and skilled craftsmen such as Orion Swiftfoot, the blacksmith, and Vespera Nightshade, the herbalist. Ashlan is a beloved member of her family group, which consists of her granddaughter Kearey, her grandson Arias, and her extended family members Erris, Boren, Garret, and Enda. Ashlan is known throughout Luminia for her perceptive nature and compassionate demeanor. She takes great pride in her position on the council and enjoys helping young apprentices learn the skills necessary to further themselves and their community. Her knowledge of local beliefs and forgotten events make her an invaluable resource to the people of Luminia.

family.relationship: Loving towards her grandchildren

Ashlan Pendrake.habits: Ashlan can often be found tending to her garden or spending time with her grandchildren. She has a penchant for collecting rare books and artifacts, which she keeps carefully stored in her home. She is an early riser and enjoys taking long walks through the forest before beginning her work day.
Ashlan Pendrake.hair: gray and tied in a bun
Ashlan Pendrake.history: Ashlan was born Talbot, to the Voyle family, native to Luminia and deeply entrenched in the traditions of the region. She married young and had a family, but tragedy struck when her husband passed away from an illness, leaving Ashlan to raise their children alone. Despite the hardships, Ashlan remained resilient and continued to work hard to provide for her family. Eventually, her dedication and knowledge caught the attention of the council, who appointed her to her current position. Ashlan has been a trusted and respected leader in Luminia ever since.

job.quote: Knowledge is power, use it wisely
job.relations: mentor to Kelsey Darkmantle
job.working_clothes: flowy green robe with golden embroidery

Ashlan Pendrake.name: Ashlan
plot: Ashlan discovers a previously unknown relic that holds great historical significance to Luminia. Her efforts to uncover the artifact's true purpose and history lead her down a dangerous path, as others become aware of its existence and potential value.

Ashlan's granddaughter Kearey uncovers a shocking secret about Luminia's past that threatens to uproot the tradition and beliefs of the entire community. Ashlan is faced with a difficult decision: protect tradition and risk stunting the growth of the younger generation or embrace change at the expense of the old ways.

When a newcomer arrives in Luminia, claiming to be the reincarnation of the Old One, Ashlan is skeptical. However, as the newcomer gains more and more followers, Ashlan begins to question whether there is any truth to their claims. She must navigate a delicate political landscape as tension between the traditionalists and the newcomers reaches a boiling point.

Ashlan's secret love for the village blacksmith is discovered by her family. To complicate matters, the blacksmith himself may have feelings for Ashlan. As the two navigate their feelings for each other, they must also contend with disapproving family members and the potential consequences of a relationship between a council member and a common craftsman.

relationship.Arias Voyle: Ashlan is very fond of her grandson, Arias. She enjoys spending time with him and hearing about his adventures.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Ashlan has a close relationship with her granddaughter, Kearey. She is proud of Kearey's ambitions to become a scholar and encourages her to pursue her goals.

Ashlan Pendrake.secret: She was secretly in love with the village blacksmith

anecdotes: Bartan once tracked a pack of wolves for three days straight, living off of nothing but dried meat and berries.
Bartan has a fondness for playing practical jokes on his employees, like hiding their tools or making them search for imaginary animals.
Bartan's missing finger is the source of many rumors in Luminia, with some people saying he lost it in a duel and others claiming it was cursed by the Old One.
Bartan Rothrock.description: Bartan Rothrock is a gruff, old dwarf who has lived in Luminia for many years. He is the leader of The Bison Runners, a hunting company that operates in the surrounding wilderness. Despite his tough exterior, Bartan has a soft heart and cares deeply for his employees and the people of Luminia. He is known to be stubborn and loyal, always sticking to his beliefs and protecting those he cares for. Bartan lost his right index finger after he stole an ancient dwarven artifact, which is a secret he keeps close to his chest.
Bartan Rothrock.eyes: leather vest and pants with metal studs, brown

family.relationship: Listen to me, I know what's best for us

Bartan Rothrock.habits: Bartan is a creature of habit, waking up early every morning to check on the state of the wilderness and the animals his company hunts. He has a strict routine that he follows religiously, including eating the same breakfast every morning and drinking ale at the same tavern every night. Bartan is also known to smoke a pipe and play chess in his free time.
Bartan Rothrock.history: Bartan came to Luminia as an outsider, but quickly became a respected member of the community. He joined The Bison Runners when it was just a small group of hunters and trappers, and over time he turned it into a prosperous company with many employees. Bartan has always been fascinated by the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia and the mysteries that lie within it. He has spent many years studying the local beliefs and the forgotten event that shaped the village's history. Bartan is a key figure in the cult that worships the non-gendered God and has dedicated his life to protecting Luminia from any threats.

job.description: leader of the hunting company, gruff exterior hides a soft heart
job.quote: "We've got bison to hunt and traps to set"
job.relations: fatherly towards everyone, especially Betilda
job.working_clothes: simple hunting clothes, but with a striking fur hat

Bartan uncovers a dark secret in Luminia's past that threatens to destroy the village's peace and prosperity.
Bartan's past comes back to haunt him when an old enemy from his youth shows up in Luminia seeking revenge.

anecdotes: Once, Brona spent an entire week carving a wooden statue of a deer that she saw in the forest. When she finally finished it, her grandfather Phineas was so impressed that he gave her one of his old woodworking tools as a gift.
Brona once participated in a woodworking competition in a nearby town and won first prize for her beautiful chair design that was inspired by the river that flows through Luminia.
Brona Darkmantle.description: Brona is a young woman of 18 years who lives in Luminia. She is an apprentice at the Gardeners Guild where she learned to love nature and gardening. However, her real passion lies with woodworking, which she learned from her grandfather Phineas. Brona spends most of her free time carving intricate designs into wood and dreaming of one day becoming a master woodworker. She is known for her strong will and stubbornness but also for her creativity and love for the outdoors.

family.relationship: is closest to her grandfather Phineas

Brona Darkmantle.habits: Brona has a habit of carrying a small notebook with her everywhere she goes, where she sketches designs and writes down ideas for future woodworking projects. She is also an early riser, often waking up before dawn to take a walk in the nearby ancient forest to find inspiration for her work.
Brona Darkmantle.history: Brona was born and raised in Luminia, in a family of natives. She was always fascinated by nature and spent most of her childhood exploring the surrounding forests and mountains. Her interest in woodworking came from her grandfather Phineas, who taught her the basics of the trade. As she grew up, she became more and more passionate about creating beautiful pieces of furniture that were inspired by the natural world around her. Despite her parents' wishes for her to become a scholar, she decided to follow her heart and pursue a career in woodworking.

job.quote: "If it's made of wood, I can make it better"
job.relations: Highly regarded by the group due to her status as a key figure, but often stubborn when it comes to new ideas or methods. Has taken Muriel under her wing as an apprentice.

Brona Darkmantle.name: Brona
plot: Brona's dream is to become a master woodworker and create furniture that will be recognized and appreciated all over the kingdom. This could lead her to take on challenging projects that will test her skills and creativity.

Brona's love for nature might lead her to discover some hidden mysteries about the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia. This could potentially lead to a dangerous adventure that will put her woodworking skills to the test.

Brona might fall in love with one of her colleagues at the Gardeners Guild, but this could create some tension between her and her grandfather Phineas who believes she should focus solely on her woodworking career.
Brona Darkmantle.quote: "I will make the most beautiful chair you have ever seen!"

relationship.Bixler Voyle: Brona is proud of her elder brother Bixler, who is ambitious and adventurous. Although they have different interests, they support each other in pursuing their dreams.

relationship.Kearey Voyle: Brona's youngest sister Kearey is rebellious and headstrong, but also curious and ambitious. Although they sometimes clash due to their different personalities, they share a bond over their love for learning and exploring.
relationship.Kirwin Vain: Brona has great respect for Kirwin, the groundskeeper at the Gardeners Guild, who is responsible and diligent. She has learned a lot from him about how to maintain a garden and keep it healthy.

anecdotes: Brone once saved a fellow lumberjack from being swept away by a river during a storm. His quick actions and strength saved the man's life.
Brone's scar on his forehead is from a freak accident when he was an apprentice. He was hit in the head by a falling branch and had to be rushed to the healer.
Once, during a hunting trip, Brone and his sons came across an injured deer. Brone insisted that they bring it back to the healer in Luminia to be nursed back to health.
Brone Langworth.description: Brone Langworth is a quiet but determined man who works as the boss at The Timbermen Guild. He is married to Shay Langworth and together they have four children. His family is part of a native group in Luminia that is led by his father-in-law, Boren Voyle. Brone is a respected member of both his family and his workplace, and is loyal to both. He is known for his courage, industriousness, thoughtfulness, and loyalty. While he may not be the most talkative person in the village, his actions speak louder than words.

family.relationship: respected by all family members

goals: gain more respect from his colleagues
ensure the safety of his village
Brone Langworth.habits: Brone wakes up early every morning to start his work at The Timbermen Guild. He is always the first one there and the last one to leave. He is meticulous in his work and takes great care with each tree that he cuts down. When he is not working, he enjoys spending time with his family and going on hunting trips with his sons.
Brone Langworth.history: Brone Langworth was born and raised in Luminia. His family has lived in the village for generations and has always been involved in the timber industry. Brone started working at The Timbermen Guild as an apprentice when he was just a teenager. Over the years, he worked hard and eventually became the boss of the guild. He married Shay Langworth when they were both in their early twenties and they have been happily married ever since. Brone is proud of his heritage and remains close with his family in the native group in Luminia.

job.quote: "Measure twice, cut once"
job.relations: father to Dowd and grandfather to Orla

Brone Langworth.name: Brone
plot: If Brone's family is ever threatened, he will do everything in his power to protect them.
Brone is determined to become the most respected lumberjack in Luminia and will stop at nothing to achieve this goal.
There are rumors of a dangerous creature living in the ancient forest near Luminia. If Brone were to encounter this creature, it could have dire consequences for him and the village.
Brone has always been curious about the mystery surrounding the Old One and the forgotten event. If he were to uncover any information about these topics, it could change his life forever.
Brone Langworth.quote: slow and steady wins the race

relationship.Wyatt Langworth: Wyatt is Brone's youngest son and is eager to please his father. Brone takes pride in teaching Wyatt everything he knows about lumberjacking.

Bryson Raelthorne.description: Bryson Raelthorne, the responsible, honest and diligent eldest son of the Raelthorne family, was born and raised in Luminia. He grew up helping his father Eckert manage the affairs of the Caravaneers, a successful business that deals in trading goods. Despite being busy with the family business, Bryson also works as a senior herb gatherer at Nature's Serenity, a guild that specializes in herb gathering, healing and medicine. Bryson is well-known in Luminia for his hardworking attitude and loyalty towards his family.

family.relationship: loyal to family

Bryson Raelthorne.habits: Bryson wakes up early every morning, often before the sun rises, to start his day at the Caravaneers. He spends most of his time managing inventory, overseeing shipments and coordinating with his colleagues. On his free time, he heads to the forest to collect herbs for the guild. Bryson is also a regular at the local tavern, where he often engages in friendly conversations with the locals.
Bryson Raelthorne.history: Bryson comes from a long line of traders and merchants, and has inherited the family business from his father Eckert. The Raelthornes have always been respected members of the Luminia community, known for their fair dealings and impeccable reputation. Bryson himself has been living in Luminia his entire life, and has always felt a strong connection to the village and its people. Growing up, he was taught the importance of hard work, responsibility and loyalty, and these values continue to shape his life today.

job.description: Responsible, honest and diligent eldest son
job.quote: "Nature holds the key to our health."
job.relations: Respected by all for his knowledge and experience.

Bryson Raelthorne.name: Bryson

Bryson's thirst for adventure and discovery may lead him to take on risky missions for Nature's Serenity, which could potentially threaten his safety and the stability of the guild.

relationship.Caylan Raelthorne: Bryson is close with his cousin Caylan, who shares his adventurous spirit and often accompanies him on herb gathering trips.

relationship.Jordan Raelthorne: Bryson loves his mother Jordan dearly, and often seeks her advice and guidance in matters concerning the Caravaneers.

anecdotes: Cammy once pulled a prank on Caylan by convincing her that there was a ghost in the barn. Caylan spent the whole night hiding under her covers, while Cammy laughed herself silly.
When she was younger, Cammy snuck into the local library after hours to read books about history and mythology. She's still embarrassed about getting caught by the librarian.
Cammy once had to chase down a runaway cow through the streets of Luminia. It took her several hours, but she eventually succeeded in capturing it.
Cammy Norwick.clothes: Simple dress and boots - grey and black
Cammy Norwick.description: Cammy Norwick is the eldest daughter of the Norwick family, who own and run Norwick's Farmstead in Luminia. She is a hardworking and responsible young woman, who takes her role as a senior farmer seriously. Cammy is known for her sharp wit and quick tongue, often using sarcasm to diffuse tense situations. She is fiercely independent and decisive, but also deeply loyal to her family. Despite her competitive relationship with her younger sister Caylan, the two sisters share a strong bond and deep affection for each other. Cammy's secret ambition is to take over more of the family business than her father realizes.

family.relationship: Competitive with her younger sister Caylan, but deeply loyal to her family.

Cammy Norwick.habits: Cammy has a routine that she follows religiously, waking up at dawn to tend to the farm animals and crops. She enjoys taking long walks in the ancient forest surrounding Luminia, where she finds peace and solitude. She has a habit of biting her lip when she's deep in thought or feeling particularly stressed out.
Cammy Norwick.history: Cammy was born and raised in Luminia, in a family that has lived there for generations. She learned the basics of farming from her mother and grandmother, and quickly showed a talent for it. As she grew older, Cammy took on more responsibilities at Norwick's Farmstead, eventually becoming a senior farmer. Her sharp mind and practical approach to life have been crucial in keeping the farm running smoothly, despite its poor prosperity. Cammy is determined to make the family business a success, and dreams of expanding it in the future. She is also deeply committed to protecting the natural beauty of Luminia, and is wary of outsiders who might exploit it.

job.description: Responsible and practical, with a sharp wit and a quick tongue
job.quote: "Laughter makes the hard work easier"
job.relations: always ready with a joke or a funny story to lighten the mood

Cammy Norwick.name: Cammy
plot: Cammy's secret ambition to take over more of the family business could lead to conflict with her father and other family members. This plotline could explore themes of loyalty, ambition, and succession.

Cammy's love for Luminia's natural beauty could put her at odds with a group of outsiders who want to exploit the resources in the area. This plotline could involve Cammy taking a stand to protect her home and community.

Cammy's competitive relationship with Caylan could come to a head when they both develop romantic feelings for the same person. This plotline could explore themes of jealousy, family dynamics, and self-discovery.

relationship.Caylan Norwick: Cammy's relationship with her younger sister Caylan is complicated. The two are fiercely competitive with each other, but also deeply loyal and affectionate.
relationship.Devlin Norwick: Cammy has a cordial but distant relationship with her aunt Devlin. The two share a sharp intellect, but Cammy finds Devlin's reserved nature and tendency towards secrecy frustrating.
relationship.Kiltey Norwick: Cammy has a close relationship with her mother, who taught her everything she knows about farming. Kiltey is proud of Cammy's accomplishments and supports her ambitions to take over the family business.
relationship.Matilda Norwick: Cammy shares a special bond with her youngest niece, Matilda. She finds the teenager's curiosity and sense of adventure refreshing, and often takes her along on walks in the forest.
relationship.Nally Norwick: Cammy has a great deal of respect and admiration for her grandmother, Nally. She values the older woman's wisdom and storytelling abilities, and often seeks her out for advice.

Cammy Norwick.secret: She has secretly taken over more of the family business than her father realizes.
Cammy Norwick.short_description: Responsible and practical, with a sharp wit and a quick tongue

anecdotes: Once, during a particularly harsh winter, Canice used her magic to conjure up a warm breeze that saved the village's crops from freezing.
Canice once caught a group of children stealing fabric from the Clothier's Collective. Instead of punishing them, she taught them how to weave and helped them make their own clothes.
Canice Ironside.description: Canice Ironside is a stern and wise weaver who works at the Clothier's Collective in Luminia. As a senior member of the guild, she is responsible for passing down family traditions and ensuring the quality of the fabrics produced by the guild. She is respected by all, but feared by the children for her strict demeanor. Despite her tough exterior, Canice has a secret - she knows magic. Her scar above her lip serves as a reminder of her past, which she rarely speaks about. In her free time, Canice enjoys exploring the ancient forest surrounding Luminia and learning more about the local beliefs and legends.

family.relationship: respected by all, but feared by the children

Canice Ironside.habits: Canice is a creature of habit. She wakes up early every morning, performs a series of stretching exercises, and starts her day with a cup of herbal tea. She spends most of her day at the Clothier's Collective, weaving fabrics and ensuring that the guild's standards are met. During her breaks, she likes to take short walks around Luminia to clear her mind. In the evenings, she retreats to her small cottage on the outskirts of Luminia, where she spends time reading and practicing her magic.
Canice Ironside.history: Canice belongs to the Voyle family, a group of natives who have lived in Luminia for generations. Her grandmother, Enda Voyle, was a wise old woman who taught Canice everything she knows about magic. Although Canice doesn't talk about it often, she learned how to use magic at a young age and has been practicing ever since. When Canice was 21, she joined the Clothier's Collective as an apprentice weaver. She quickly rose through the ranks and became a senior member of the guild. Canice is fiercely loyal to her family and will do anything to protect them and their legacy.

job.description: Stern and wise, keeper of family traditions
job.quote: "When in doubt, go back to basics"
job.relations: Treats everyone as if they were family, especially fond of Erris
job.working_clothes: Long skirt and apron, earthy tones

Canice Ironside.name: Canice
plot: Canice discovers a dark secret about the Clothier's Collective and must decide whether to speak out or keep quiet to protect her family.

A mysterious illness sweeps through Luminia, and the only cure involves a rare magical herb that can only be found deep within the ancient forest. Canice is reluctantly forced to team up with an unlikely ally to find the herb and save the village.

Canice's granddaughter, Kearey, is on the verge of discovering the truth about Canice's magical abilities. Canice must decide whether to come clean about her past or risk exposing her family to danger.

A group of scholars arrives in Luminia to study the ancient forest, and they uncover a long-forgotten legend about a magical artifact hidden within. Canice must race against time to retrieve the artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.
Canice Ironside.quote: "Be patient, child. Everything is a process."

relationship.Boren Voyle: Canice has a great deal of respect for her uncle, Boren Voyle. As the family chief, Boren is responsible for overseeing the family's affairs and ensuring that their legacy is preserved.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Canice has a close relationship with her cousin, Erris Voyle. As the family head and mother of three, Erris often seeks out Canice's counsel and advice.
relationship.Evelyn Helwick: Canice has taken Evelyn under her wing as an apprentice weaver. As a fellow bookworm, the two often bond over literature and stories from Luminia's past.
relationship.Malek Helwick: Canice respects Malek's responsibility as one of the guild's bosses, but often finds him too stern and rigid for her taste.
relationship.Stianna Mallory: Canice has a contentious relationship with her boss, Stianna Mallory. Stianna is grumpy and judgmental, which often clashes with Canice's more patient and nurturing approach.

Canice Ironside.short_description: stern and wise, keeper of family traditions

anecdotes: Casner once saved a Caravaneer's horse from a wild boar attack, earning the gratitude of the merchant.
During a raid by bandits, Casner stood his ground and fought bravely to protect the merchandise. He sustained a small scar on the nose during the fight, but it only adds to his rugged charm.
Casner Raelthorne.description: Casner is a sturdy and straightforward guard who works at Arrow's Defense. He is known for his loyalty, honesty, and bravery, and is respected by his colleagues Bryson and Eckert. Casner is a mid-generation cousin living in Luminia with his family, the Voyle family. He is an average looking young adult with short blonde hair and green eyes, and wears leather armor and carries a steel sword.

family.relationship: respectful towards Bryson and Eckert

Casner Raelthorne.habits: Casner is a disciplined and focused guard who spends most of his time protecting the Caravaneers' merchandise. When he is not working, he enjoys spending time with his family and going on nature walks. He also practices sword fighting regularly to keep his skills sharp.
Casner Raelthorne.history: Casner comes from a family of natives in Luminia, the Voyle family. His parents, Erris and Boren, raised him to be honorable, wise, and charismatic. Casner always had a love for adventure, which led him to join Arrow's Defense. He quickly gained a reputation for being a dependable and loyal guard. Despite his love for adventure, Casner remains committed to his duty to protect the Caravaneers' merchandise. He is a respected member of his community and is known for his honesty and bravery.

job.description: Sturdy and straightforward cousin. Guarding the Caravaneers' merchandise.
job.quote: "No one gets through unless I say so."
job.relations: Respectful towards all members of the group

Casner Raelthorne.name: Casner
plot: Casner's sense of loyalty and honor may be tested if he is offered a large sum of money to steal the Caravaneers' merchandise.
Casner may discover a plot by a rival defense team to sabotage Arrow's Defense and will need to protect his colleagues and the merchandise.

A member of Casner's family, possibly his ambitious older brother Bixler, may get involved in an illegal activity that puts Arrow's Defense in danger. Casner will need to choose between family loyalty and his duty to protect the Caravaneers' merchandise.

Casner may uncover a mystery surrounding Luminia's ancient forest that threatens the safety of the village. He will need to work with his colleagues and his family to solve the mystery and protect Luminia from harm.
Casner Raelthorne.quote: "I'll let my sword do the talking"

relationship.Bixler Voyle: Casner has a close relationship with his older brother Bixler, but sometimes finds himself at odds with Bixler's love for adventure.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Casner looks up to his father Boren and often seeks his advice on important matters.
relationship.Bryson: Casner respects Bryson and often confides in him about his worries and concerns.
relationship.Eckert: Casner has a good working relationship with Eckert and enjoys swapping stories with him during their breaks.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Casner loves and respects his mother Erris, who has always been there to support him and his siblings.

anecdotes: Caylan once saved a lost child from the forest and brought him back to his parents.
Caylan's silver hair always gives her grandchildren the impression that she is a wise wizard.
Caylan has a secret stash of honey that she keeps hidden in her cottage.
Caylan is known for her amazing storytelling skills, and people often gather around her to listen to her tales.
Caylan has a rare talent for healing, and many people come to her seeking her help.
Caylan Halstead.clothes: long white dress with a green scarf
Caylan Halstead.description: Caylan Halstead is a wise and caring woman who has lived in Luminia village for all her life. Her silver, long hair and green eyes are the trademarks of her beauty, and she is known for her compassionate, patient, nurturing, and wise personality traits. She works as the boss at Ancestral Sanctuary, a cooperative that focuses on spirituality and religion, where she is loved by all. Caylan is a loving mother and grandmother who cares deeply about her family and the people around her. Her favorite quote is "The forest keeps us safe."

family.relationship: loving to her children and grandchildren

Caylan Halstead.habits: Caylan is a spiritual person who spends most of her time praying and meditating at the Ancestral Sanctuary. She is also an avid reader and loves to read books that talk about spirituality and the gods. When she is not working, she likes to spend her time with her family, cooking meals, and telling stories near the fireplace.
Caylan Halstead.history: Caylan was born in Luminia village and belongs to a family of natives who have lived there for generations. She grew up hearing stories about the Old One and the unique continent they live in. Her family has always been faithful to the non-gendered God and has their own local beliefs. Caylan married young and had children, whom she raised with love and care. As she grew older, she became interested in spirituality and started working at the Ancestral Sanctuary, where she found her calling. She now leads the cooperative as the elder matriarch and is loved and respected by all the employees.

job.description: Wise and caring elder who is loved by all
job.quote: "The spirits guide me to your path"
job.relations: Seen as the leader and the mother figure of the group. Highly respected by all members.
job.working_clothes: green wool shawl, skirt and blouse

Caylan Halstead.name: Caylan
plot: Caylan's family has a long-standing feud with another family in the village. Caylan needs to resolve the issue before it escalates into something more serious.

A group of adventurers is passing by Luminia village and seeks a wise elder who could guide them through the mountains. They ask for Caylan's help, but she's hesitant to leave the village and her duties. Will she help the adventurers or stay behind?

The Old One has been appearing to Caylan in her dreams, asking her to uncover the mystery behind a forgotten event that happened in Luminia centuries ago. Will Caylan unravel the mystery, or will it remain a secret forever?

Caylan's daughter has fallen in love with an outsider who has come to Luminia. The outsider's family is not native, and they do not share Caylan's beliefs. Caylan must decide whether to accept her daughter's choice or disapprove of it.
There is a dangerous illness spreading throughout the village, and people are dying every day. Caylan must find a way to heal the sick and protect the healthy from this deadly disease.

relationship.Arias Voyle: Caylan is the grandmother of Arias Voyle, and they have an energetic and curious relationship. Caylan often shares her knowledge of spirituality with Arias and encourages him to explore the mysteries of the world.
relationship.Bixler Voyle: Caylan is the grandmother of Bixler Voyle, and they have a fun and adventurous relationship. Caylan often tells Bixler stories about her youth and encourages him to explore the world and follow his dreams.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Caylan is the mother of Boren Voyle, and they have a respectful and caring relationship. Caylan often seeks Boren's advice on spiritual matters and looks up to him as a wise father figure.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Enda Voyle is Caylan's mother, and they have a loving and respectful relationship. Caylan often seeks Enda's wisdom and guidance on spiritual matters and looks up to her as a wise elder.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Caylan is the mother of Erris Voyle, and they have a close and loving relationship. Caylan often shares her wisdom with Erris and advises her on matters related to the family and the village.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Garrett Voyle is Caylan's father-in-law, and they have a distant but respectful relationship. Caylan often seeks Garrett's wisdom on matters related to the family's history and traditions.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Caylan is the grandmother of Kearey Voyle, and they have a rebellious and curious relationship. Caylan often encourages Kearey to follow her dreams and explore new ideas, even if they challenge the traditions of their family.
