anecdotes: Once, during a hunting trip, Colm stumbled upon an abandoned cabin in the woods. He decided to investigate and found a hidden room filled with ancient books and artifacts. He took some of them back with him to Luminia to study.
At a village festival, Colm challenged the archery champion and won. He surprised everyone with his accuracy and precision with a bow and arrow.
Colm Dromore.description: Colm Dromore is a middle-aged, short, and average looking halfling who lives in the village of Luminia. He has short grey hair, brown eyes, and a tan skin tone. Colm is the family head of his small family group that consists of him and his daughter Alanna Halstead. His group is an outsider group, which means he and his daughter are not originally from Luminia. Colm is a trapper by trade and works for Arrow's Defense, a team that protects the village from threats such as wild animals and bandits. He is known among his peers as clever and meticulous, which makes him a valuable asset to his team.

family.relationship: Loving towards family

goals: Discovering the mystery of the Old One
Colm Dromore.habits: Colm is a responsible and cautious individual who always thinks before acting. He likes to plan ahead and prepare for any situation that might arise. He enjoys spending time in nature and often goes on hunting trips in the nearby forest to provide for his family. In his free time, he can be found reading books about local beliefs, the history of Luminia, and the unique continent it belongs to.
Colm Dromore.history: Colm Dromore arrived in Luminia with his wife and daughter about 20 years ago. However, tragedy struck when his wife fell ill and passed away shortly after their arrival. Despite his loss, Colm decided to stay in Luminia and raise his daughter on his own. He worked hard to provide for her and was eventually recruited by Arrow's Defense where he has been working ever since. He is proud of his daughter who has grown up to be outgoing, brave, curious, and kind. Colm is intrigued by the mystery surrounding the Old One, a legendary figure that is said to have once protected Luminia from harm. He hopes to one day uncover the truth behind this forgotten event.

job.quote: "Just because you can't see it, doesn't mean it's not there"
job.relations: Trusts and relies on Cara's scouting abilities
job.working_clothes: Brown shirt and pants with various pockets

Colm Dromore.name: Colm

The village of Luminia is attacked by a group of bandits and Colm has to use all his trapper skills to protect his family and the village.
Colm's daughter Alanna gets kidnapped and he must use all his resources to rescue her.
An old family member from his outsider group appears in Luminia and reveals a long-held secret that changes Colm's life forever.

relationship.Alanna Halstead: Colm is a loving parent to Alanna and is proud of her adventurous and outgoing personality. He enjoys spending time with her and teaching her essential survival skills.

anecdotes: Crowle once single-handedly fended off a group of bandits who attempted to rob his caravan. He earned the nickname 'Old Crow' after that incident for his quick thinking and bravery.
Crowle often tells his family stories of the time he traded exotic spices from a far-off land with an eccentric merchant who rode on the backs of giant turtles.

During a particularly difficult winter, Crowle risked his life to venture into the nearby mountains to trade with a tribe of isolated villagers who had a surplus of food. His actions saved many lives in Luminia.
Crowle Raelthorne.description: Crowle Raelthorne is a wise and gentle grandfather who spent most of his life as a trader in Raelthorne Trading Company. In his 71 years, he has seen and experienced many things both in Luminia and beyond. He is well-respected in the village for his knowledge, fairness, and patience. Crowle is a retired trader now but still holds a lot of influence in the trading community. He is content with his life, surrounded by his loving family and contributing to the prosperity of his village.

family.relationship: loving towards family members

Crowle Raelthorne.habits: Crowle is a creature of habit, waking up early every morning to tend to his small garden outside of his house and meditate. He spends most of his day reading books on history and lore, often accompanied by his granddaughter Emma. In the evenings, he enjoys sipping on a cup of tea while reminiscing about his younger days as a trader.
Crowle Raelthorne.history: Crowle has lived his entire life in Luminia and witnessed many changes in the village. He was born into a native family that has been in the village for generations. His parents were farmers, and he learned how to work the land at a young age. However, Crowle was always more interested in trading and learning about the world beyond Luminia. He joined the Raelthorne Trading Company at a young age and became one of their most successful traders. Crowle married his childhood sweetheart, and they had four children together. Crowle's eldest daughter, Muriel, inherited his passion for trading and now works alongside him. Crowle is proud of his family's legacy and hopes to pass on his knowledge and wisdom to the next generation.

job.description: Wise and gentle grandfather. Retired trader.
job.quote: "Patience and understanding are the keys to success."
job.relations: Highly respected and considered as the go-to person in the group for advice and guidance.

Crowle Raelthorne.name: Crowle
plot: An old friend of Crowle's from the Raelthorne Trading Company has fallen on hard times and needs a loan. However, the friend has a shady past, and giving him the money could put Crowle's reputation at risk.
The village of Luminia is threatened by a group of raiders, and Crowle must use his knowledge of trading to negotiate a peace treaty with them before they attack.

A wealthy scholar from a foreign land approaches Crowle with a rare ancient artifact that he wants to sell to the Raelthorne Trading Company. However, the artifact is cursed, and whoever possesses it will suffer great misfortune. Crowle must decide whether to put his company's prosperity above his own intuition.

relationship.Alexia Mallory: Crowle admires Alexia's sophisticated and cultured nature, and he enjoys working with her at the Raelthorne Trading Company.
relationship.Bailey Pendrake: Bailey is a senior assistant at the Raelthorne Trading Company and Crowle sees her as assertive and responsible.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Crowle has known Boren for many years and sees him as a handsome and respected father figure. He admires his charismatic, honorable, and wise qualities.
relationship.Creedan Raelthorne: Creedan is Crowle's youngest son and ambitious apprentice at the Raelthorne Trading Company. Crowle hopes to pass on his knowledge and wisdom to Creedan.
relationship.Creena Mallory: Creena is an apprentice at the Raelthorne Trading Company, and Crowle sees her as a nurturing and empathetic individual.
relationship.Ecken Hardwick: Ecken is an ambitious apprentice at the Raelthorne Trading Company and Crowle sees potential in him. He admires Ecken's confidence and eagerness to prove himself.
relationship.Egan Helwick: Egan is a retired trader and Crowle doesn't know him well, but he recognizes his gruff and curmudgeonly personality.
relationship.Emma Raelthorne: As Crowle's curious and imaginative granddaughter, Emma enjoys exploring the Caravaneers' wagons with him and listening to his stories.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Crowle has a deep respect for Enda, who is his granddaughter's grandmother. He sees her as a wise old woman with vast life experience and admires her wise, patient, and caring nature.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Crowle has a great relationship with Erris, who is his eldest granddaughter's mother. He sees her as a caring and protective mother and respects her nurturing and empathic nature.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Crowle has always had a quiet respect for Garrett, who is his granddaughter's grandfather. He sees him as a patient, wise, and observant individual, with years of experience that have given him great insight into the world.
relationship.Heremon Kerrigan: Heremon is an apprentice at the Raelthorne Trading Company, and Crowle recognizes his creativity but finds him somewhat anti-social.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Crowle is proud of Kearey's ambition and curiosity, and he enjoys talking to her about her dreams of becoming a scholar. However, he worries about her headstrong nature and hopes she will remain safe in her pursuit of knowledge.
relationship.Muriel Raelthorne: Muriel is Crowle's eldest daughter and works alongside him at the Raelthorne Trading Company. They have a very close relationship, and Crowle admires her hard-working and serious nature.
relationship.Orla Alkott: Crowle has worked with Orla for many years and sees her as an aging but still sharp trader. He enjoys her gentle and nurturing personality.
relationship.Renny Raelthorne: Renny is Crowle's sister-in-law and a retired seamstress. She is strict and bitter, and Crowle tries to avoid her whenever possible.
relationship.Rosaleen Raelthorne: Rosaleen is Crowle's niece and a retired apothecary. She is forgiving and generous, and Crowle enjoys spending time with her.

Crowle Raelthorne.short_description: Wise and gentle grandfather. Retired trader.

anecdotes: When Dardan was a child, he and his siblings would often sneak out of their home at night to explore the ancient forest surrounding their village.
During a guard patrol, Dardan once saved a young child from drowning in the river.
Dardan has a secret fascination with the Old One, a mysterious figure from Luminia's history that many locals believe still watches over the village.
Dardan Brasher.description: Dardan Brasher is a 25-year-old skilled guard with a quick wit who works at The Guardian's Pact, a team dedicated to security and protection in Luminia. He wears leather armor in Luminia's colors and stands at an average height. With short black hair and brown eyes, he has an average appearance. Dardan is observant and resourceful, with a quick wit and athleticism that make him an effective guard. He's also known to have a crush on the mayor's daughter, a secret which he tries to keep from the other members of The Guardian's Pact. Despite this, he remains loyal to his family and will do anything to protect them from danger.

family.relationship: Loyal to his family

Dardan Brasher.habits: Dardan is known for his diligence and dedication to his job. He spends much of his free time training and improving his fighting skills. He's also an avid reader and can often be found reading books from the local scholars, trying to learn more about the mysterious history of Luminia.
Dardan Brasher.history: Dardan comes from a family of natives in Luminia. His mother, Erris, is a caring and protective woman, while his father, Boren, is a handsome and respected leader within the community. Dardan's grandmother, Enda, is a wise old woman with vast life experience, and his grandfather, Garrett, is a quiet and reserved man with years of wisdom. Dardan's oldest brother, Bixler, is an ambitious young man with a love for adventure, while his younger sister, Kearey, is a rebellious young woman who dreams of being a scholar. Dardan himself has always been dedicated to protecting his family and community, leading him to join The Guardian's Pact. However, his crush on the mayor's daughter and his thirst for adventure often lead him into dangerous situations.

job.quote: "Stay sharp and alert."
job.relations: Protects Malek like a younger brother

Dardan Brasher.name: Dardan

As a member of The Guardian's Pact, Dardan is often on the front lines of protecting the village from external threats. He may need to use his quick wit and resourcefulness to outsmart any attackers.

Dardan's curiosity about the Old One could lead him to discover something ancient and mysterious about Luminia's past. However, this quest for knowledge may also put him in harm's way if he uncovers dark secrets.

anecdotes: Once, while exploring the mountains, Delaney stumbled upon a hidden cave that was believed to be cursed. She entered the cave and emerged unscathed, leading many to believe that she had the protection of the Old One.
Delaney once helped a group of scholars decipher an ancient text that had been lost for centuries. Her ability to communicate with the Old One proved to be a valuable asset in the endeavor.
Delaney Blackwood.description: Delaney Blackwood is a 22-year-old inhabitant of Luminia. Her parents died when she was young and she was taken in by Rothrock. She works at Blackwood's Underground Syndicate, a group that specializes in Thievery. Delaney is believed to be the chosen one who can communicate with the Old One. She is pretty and slender, with long blonde hair and blue eyes. She often wears a flowy white dress with a flower crown. Delaney is an idealistic and curious person who is always seeking to understand the mysteries of Luminia.
Delaney Blackwood.eyes: flowy white dress with flower crown

family.relationship: I feel the forest is trying to tell me something

goals: Discover the secrets of the Old One
Unravel the mysteries of the ancient forest
Delaney Blackwood.habits: Delaney has a habit of spending time in the ancient forest where she feels a strong connection with nature. She is also known to be empathetic towards others and is always willing to help those in need. Delaney has a habit of talking to herself, which some find peculiar, but she claims that she is communicating with the Old One.
Delaney Blackwood.history: Delaney was taken in by Rothrock after her parents died when she was young. She grew up in Luminia and became fascinated with the unique continent and its local beliefs. Delaney believes in a non-gendered God and is always seeking to understand the forgotten event that shaped the history of Luminia. She works at Blackwood's Underground Syndicate which is run by her family, the Blackwoods. Delaney is believed to be the chosen one who can communicate with the Old One, a mysterious entity that many in Luminia worship.

job.description: the chosen one, believed to be able to communicate with the Old One
job.quote: "The Old One spoke to me - You have been warned"
job.relations: Highly respected by the others in the group, seen as someone who can bring the favor of their God to the group.
job.working_clothes: black cloak and hood, with silver embroidery

Delaney Blackwood.name: Delaney
Delaney Blackwood.nickname: birthmark on left wrist shaped like a crescent moon
plot: Delaney's ability to communicate with the Old One makes her an important figure in the eyes of many in Luminia. As a result, she has attracted the attention of a group of fanatics who believe that she is the key to unlocking the secrets of the Old One. Delaney must navigate the dangerous waters of fanaticism and protect herself from those who seek to exploit her abilities.

The Blackwood family has always been at the forefront of Thievery in Luminia. However, their latest heist has attracted unwanted attention from the local authorities. Delaney must help her family evade the law while keeping their criminal enterprise afloat.

Delaney discovers a hidden chamber in the ancient forest that contains clues to the forgotten event that shaped the history of Luminia. She must unravel the mystery before it's too late and history repeats itself.
Delaney Blackwood.quote: her parents died when she was young and Rothrock took her in

relationship.Ashlan Alkott and Nuila Azadul: Ashlan and Nuila are Delaney's apprentices at Blackwood's Underground Syndicate. Ashlan is a curious and talkative girl who loves to explore, while Nuila is disfigured by a curse but friendly and loyal. Delaney takes them under her wing and mentors them to become skilled thieves.
relationship.Bartan and Brona Voyle: Delaney is like a daughter to Bartan and Brona, who treat her with the same care and affection as they do their own children. They are proud of her abilities and support her in all her endeavors.
relationship.Jurg Blackitt: Jurg is the boss of Blackwood's Underground Syndicate and a fence by profession. He is intimidating but gentle-hearted, and has a soft spot for Delaney. Jurg recognizes her abilities and often puts her in charge of delicate tasks.
relationship.Katerine Voyle: Katerine is Delaney's romantic interest. They met while working together at Blackwood's Underground Syndicate, and have since developed a close bond. Katerine is aware of Delaney's abilities and is supportive of her quest to uncover the mysteries of Luminia.
relationship.Mara Vain: Mara is Delaney's senior at Blackwood's Underground Syndicate. She is independent and ambitious, often taking charge of the group's heists. Delaney looks up to Mara and often seeks her advice on matters related to the criminal enterprise.

anecdotes: Despite his serious demeanor, Delp has been known to let loose and enjoy a pint of ale or two with his fellow guards after a long day of work.

One time, Delp caught a group of young troublemakers attempting to steal from a local merchant. Instead of punishing them harshly, he took them under his wing and taught them the value of hard work and honesty.
Delp has a soft spot for animals and can often be found feeding stray cats and dogs on the streets of Luminia.
Delp Kerrigan.description: Delp Kerrigan is a well-respected figure in the Luminia community, known for his wisdom and strength in equal parts. As the family head, Delp is fiercely loyal and protective of his loved ones, often going to great lengths to ensure their safety. He works as a senior guard at The Guardian's Pact, where he uses his experience and knowledge to maintain law and order in the village. Despite his serious demeanor, Delp has a softer side and is beloved by many in the community.

family.relationship: loves his family and wants to protect them

Delp Kerrigan.habits: Delp is a man of routine, starting his day early with a cup of strong coffee before heading out to work. He takes great care in his appearance, always donning his leather armor and black cloak before leaving his home. In his free time, Delp enjoys spending time with his family and exploring the ancient forest that surrounds the village.
Delp Kerrigan.history: Delp comes from a long line of natives who have lived in Luminia for generations. His grandfather, Barden Kerrigan, was a prominent figure in the community and instilled in Delp a sense of pride for his heritage. After serving as a young guard in his youth, Delp eventually took over as family head following the death of his father. Since then, he has worked tirelessly to provide for his loved ones and protect them from harm. Despite facing numerous challenges and setbacks over the years, Delp remains resolute in his commitment to his family and his community.

job.description: wise and respected within the community
job.quote: "Let's defend our home with honor."
job.relations: Takes Dardan's advice seriously

Delp Kerrigan.name: Delp
plot: Delp's secret debt to the innkeeper comes back to haunt him when the inn is threatened by a gang of bandits.
When a strange illness plagues the village, Delp must work alongside his colleagues at The Guardian's Pact to find the source of the outbreak and prevent it from spreading.

Delp's family is targeted by a group of thieves who are after a valuable artifact that has been passed down through generations. It's up to Delp to protect his loved ones and keep the artifact out of the wrong hands.

Delp becomes embroiled in a conflict with a rival guard faction that seeks to take control of the village. Despite the odds against him, Delp uses his experience and cunning to outsmart his opponents and emerge victorious.

relationship.Alvy Kerrigan: Delp's other cousin and fellow apprentice guard, Alvy is a quiet and reserved individual who values hard work and discipline. Despite their differences, Delp sees a lot of potential in Alvy and hopes to help him reach his full potential.
relationship.Barden Kerrigan: Delp's grandfather and former family head, Barden is a source of wisdom and guidance for Delp. Despite his gruff exterior, Barden loves his grandson deeply and would do anything to protect him.
relationship.Bayden Kerrigan: Delp's eldest son has always been a bit of a wild card, and their relationship has been strained at times. Despite their differences, however, Delp is fiercely protective of Bayden and will do whatever it takes to keep him safe.
relationship.Beck Kerrigan: Delp's young grandson is a constant source of joy and inspiration for him. He loves spending time with Beck and teaching him about the world around them.
relationship.Darsey Kerrigan: Delp's cousin and fellow guard, Darsey often serves as Delp's sounding board and confidant. The two share a deep trust and respect for one another.
relationship.Garrett Kerrigan: Delp shares a close bond with his young nephew, often taking him out on adventures in the ancient forest. Garrett looks up to his uncle as a role model and hopes to one day follow in his footsteps as a guard.
relationship.Heremon Kerrigan: Delp's son is a gifted artist, but often struggles to fit in with his peers. Despite this, Delp remains supportive of his son's passions and encourages him to pursue his dreams.
relationship.Malek Brasher: As an apprentice guard at The Guardian's Pact, Malek looks up to Delp as a mentor. While the two have very different personalities, they share a strong sense of duty and honor.

anecdotes: Derry once saved a young girl who had fallen into the river and had been swept downstream. She used her extensive knowledge of herbs to treat the girl's injuries and nurse her back to health.

During a particularly harsh winter, Derry spent days on end in the forest, searching for rare herbs to help alleviate the symptoms of a deadly flu that had struck the village. Through her efforts, the spread of the disease was contained and many lives were saved.
Derry is known for her love of baking and often makes delicious treats for her colleagues at The Devout.
Derry Talbot.clothes: long green dress with a white apron
Derry Talbot.description: Derry Talbot is a wise and practical healer with a passion for herbs. She is an old woman who has spent most of her life in Luminia. Derry works at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God where she uses her knowledge of herbs to help heal the sick. She is a respected member of her community, known for her nurturing and caring nature. Derry is often sought out for advice and guidance by younger members of her community. She has a calm and patient demeanor and is highly respected by those who know her.

family.relationship: motherly figure and healer of the group

Derry Talbot.habits: Derry is known for her love of nature and spends much of her free time in the ancient forest surrounding Luminia, foraging for rare herbs and flowers. She is also an avid reader and spends many hours in the local library, studying ancient texts on healing and botany. Derry is a devout follower of the Non-Gendered God and attends daily services at The Devout.
Derry Talbot.history: Derry has lived in Luminia her entire life and comes from a long line of healers. Her grandmother was also a healer and taught Derry everything she knows about medicinal plants and their uses. Derry's family is part of a larger group of natives who have lived in the area for generations. She has always been interested in the local beliefs and traditions and has spent many years studying them. Derry is proud of her heritage and often shares stories about her family's history with others.

job.quote: \"Nature has a remedy for everything\"
job.relations: mentor to apprentices

Derry Talbot.name: Derry

Derry uncovers a plot by a rival religious group to steal the sacred artifacts of the Non-Gendered God from The Devout. She must find a way to prevent the theft without putting her colleagues or herself in danger.

Derry's knowledge of herbs attracts the attention of a powerful noble who offers her a position as his personal healer. She must decide whether to accept the offer or remain in Luminia with her community.
Derry discovers a secret about the origins of her family group that threatens to tear it apart. She must find a way to reconcile the conflicting beliefs and restore peace among her people.

During a village festival, Devlin organized a successful fundraiser for the guild by selling handcrafted leather goods.
Devlin Fenwick.clothes: a mix of practical yet stylish clothing, often with intricate embroidery or fine leather details
Devlin Fenwick.description: Devlin Fenwick is a fiercely intelligent and driven woman who supports her husband's leadership in the Hides and Tans Fellowship. She is very pretty with green eyes and long, straight, dyed red hair. Devlin is of average height and weight and has a small scar above her right eyebrow. She wears a mix of practical yet stylish clothing, often with intricate embroidery or fine leather details. Devlin is deeply devoted to her family and friends but has a tendency to take on too much at once.

family.relationship: deeply devoted to her family and friends, but has a tendency to take on too much at once

Devlin Fenwick.habits: Devlin has a habit of constantly brainstorming new ideas to improve the guild's leatherworking techniques and methods. She also enjoys spending time with her family, reading scholarly books, and taking long walks in the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia village.
Devlin Fenwick.hair: long and straight, dyed a unique shade of red
Devlin Fenwick.history: Devlin was born and raised in Luminia village. She joined the Hides and Tans Fellowship as a young tanner and quickly rose through the ranks due to her intelligence and ambition. Devlin met her husband, the guild boss, while working at the fellowship and they fell in love. Together they have a daughter, and Devlin juggles her responsibilities as a mother with her duties at the guild. Devlin's family, the Voyle family, has been in Luminia for generations and is well-respected in the community. Devlin is proud of her native heritage and often incorporates local beliefs and traditions into her work at the guild.

job.description: A fiercely intelligent and driven woman who supports her husband's leadership
job.quote: "We must strive for excellence in all our work"
job.relations: Looks out for the others in the guild, especially her husband, and pushes them to improve and work hard. Highly respected among the guild members.

Devlin Fenwick.name: Devlin

The Hides and Tans Fellowship is struggling financially, and Devlin must come up with a new marketing strategy to attract more customers and keep the guild afloat.
Devlin's daughter falls ill with a mysterious illness, and Devlin must use her knowledge of local beliefs and remedies to try and cure her.

relationship.Jenett Darkmantle: A fellow tanner and creative artisan at the guild. Devlin respects Jenett's skill and creativity and often collaborates with her on new projects.

anecdotes: Dextrel once saved a lost adventurer who had wandered into the forest without proper preparation. Dextrel guided the adventurer back to safety and taught him valuable lessons about respecting the ancient forest.
Dextrel is known for his love of storytelling and often entertains his family and friends with tales of the village's history and legends.
Dextrel Skarholt.clothes: Worn and comfortable clothes suitable for working outdoors
Dextrel Skarholt.description: Dextrel Skarholt is an old wise man who is often sought out for advice and guidance in Luminia. He works as a night watchman at Defenders of Luminia, where he leads the security team. Dextrel is known for his patience and calmness, which makes him a respected figure in the village. He lives with his family, including his caring wife Elatha, his wise grandmother Renny, and his adventurous daughters Nally and Keavey. Despite his old age, Dextrel remains active and continues to play an essential role in keeping the village secure and prosperous.

family.relationship: Beloved patriarch of the family

Dextrel Skarholt.habits: Dextrel wakes up early every morning to meditate and reflect before starting his day. He spends most of his time patrolling the village, checking on the guards, and making sure that the residents are safe. He also enjoys spending time with his family, teaching them about the history and culture of Luminia.
Dextrel Skarholt.history: Dextrel Skarholt was born and raised in Luminia. He comes from a long line of native residents who have lived in the village for generations. As a young man, Dextrel was known for his curiosity and eagerness to explore the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia. He spent many years studying the local beliefs and traditions, which helped him become the wise and perceptive man he is today. Dextrel married his wife Elatha when he was 25, and together they raised two daughters who have now grown up and started their own families. Over the years, Dextrel has witnessed many events that have shaped the village's history and legacy, including the arrival of the empire, the rise of the Defenders of Luminia, and the mysterious disappearance of a group of adventurers.

job.description: Wise and patient older male, sought out for guidance.
job.quote: One must always be aware of their surroundings to protect what they hold dear.
job.relations: Regards Katerine as his protege.

Dextrel Skarholt.name: Dextrel
plot: Dextrel discovers a hidden entrance to a forgotten part of the ancient forest that leads to an abandoned temple.
Dextrel receives a cryptic message from an old acquaintance that could unlock the mystery of a forgotten event in Luminia's history.
Dextrel's granddaughter Keavey stumbles upon a dangerous secret that could threaten the village's safety, and it is up to Dextrel to investigate and find a solution.

relationship.Elatha Skarholt: Dextrel and Elatha have been married for 50 years and share a deep and loving relationship. Elatha is very supportive of Dextrel's work at the Defenders of Luminia and helps him manage their household and raise their grandchildren.
relationship.Keavey Skarholt: Dextrel has a special bond with his youngest granddaughter Keavey, who is full of energy and curiosity. Although Keavey's rebellious nature often leads her into trouble, Dextrel admires her adventurous spirit and encourages her to pursue her dreams.
relationship.Nally Skarholt: Dextrel has a close relationship with his eldest daughter Nally, who shares his passion for exploring spirituality and the mysteries of the world. Despite their age difference, Dextrel and Nally often engage in deep philosophical discussions and debates.
relationship.Renny Skarholt: Dextrel has a close relationship with his wise grandmother Renny, who he often turns to for advice and guidance. Renny has taught Dextrel many valuable life lessons, and he deeply respects her wisdom and knowledge.

Dextrel Skarholt.short_description: Older male often sought out for advice and guidance

anecdotes: Dowd once caught a giant salmon in the river which he proudly displayed at The Harvest Guild for everyone to see.
Dowd once lost his entire harvest in a freak storm and had to start from scratch. He worked twice as hard to ensure that the next harvest was even better than the last.
Dowd Darkmantle.description: Dowd Darkmantle is a responsible and hardworking man who takes care of his family and farm at Luminia. He works at The Harvest Guild with a group of farmers who take pride in their land. He is the head farmer and is responsible for managing the crops and ensuring they thrive. Dowd is a serious man who believes that hard work is the key to success. He is proud of his family and will do everything in his power to provide for them. Although he is dedicated to his work, he has a secret addiction to gambling which he keeps hidden from his family and colleagues.

family.relationship: is closest to his mother Elatha

Dowd Darkmantle.habits: Dowd wakes up early every morning to tend to his crops and ensure that everything is in order. He spends most of his day working on the fields and checking on the other farmers to make sure they are doing their job well. In his free time, Dowd likes to relax by the river and fish. He enjoys the peace and quiet of the outdoors and finds it a good way to clear his mind.
Dowd Darkmantle.history: Dowd comes from a long line of farmers who have lived in Luminia for generations. His family has always been respected in the community for their hard work and dedication. Dowd grew up learning the trade from his father and has passed on his knowledge to his own children. He is very close to his mother Elatha and often seeks her advice. Despite his dedication to farming, Dowd has always had a thirst for adventure and often dreams of exploring the world beyond Luminia. However, his responsibilities to his family and his farm have kept him grounded in the village.

job.description: a responsible and hardworking man who takes care of his family and farm
job.quote: “I’ll do anything to protect my family and my land.”
job.relations: father of Brenna
job.working_clothes: heavy cotton overalls, boots, leather work gloves

Dowd Darkmantle.name: Dowd

Dowd Ironside.name: Dowd
Dowd Ironside.quote: "Back in my day, we had to hunt with our bare hands."

anecdotes: Dowd once rescued a fellow lumberjack who was injured while cutting down a tree. He climbed up the trunk of the tree and carefully lowered the man to the ground, all while using just one hand to hold onto the trunk.
When Dowd was younger, he accidentally cut down a tree that his father had marked for protection. He felt terrible about it and spent days replanting new trees in the area.

Dowd once found a rare type of wood that no one in Luminia had ever seen before. He brought it back to The Timbermen Guild, where it was used to make beautiful furniture for the village's wealthiest residents.
Dowd Langworth.description: Dowd Langworth is a young man of great ambition and determination. He has always been hardworking, staying up late into the night to finish tasks that others might have given up on. Dowd is a lumberjack at The Timbermen Guild, where he has quickly risen through the ranks due to his dedication and skill with an axe. He is the eldest son of Brone Langworth, the quiet but determined head of the family. Dowd looks up to his father and hopes to one day take over as head of the family himself. He is respected and loved by all members of the Langworth family and takes his responsibilities as the heir very seriously.

family.relationship: respected and loved by all family members

Dowd Langworth.habits: Dowd is an early riser, often waking before the sun to start his day. He spends most of his time working at The Timbermen Guild, cutting down trees and processing the wood. In his free time, Dowd enjoys going for long walks in the nearby forest, exploring new areas and searching for rare trees with unique characteristics. He is also an avid reader, spending many evenings poring over books on history and politics.
Dowd Langworth.history: Dowd was born and raised in Luminia, a small village surrounded by an ancient forest, a winding river, and majestic mountains. His family has lived in the area for generations and is deeply connected to the land. Dowd's upbringing was focused on hard work, dedication, and a strong sense of responsibility to his family and community. As the eldest son, he was expected to take on the role of the family head and lead his siblings and cousins into the future. Dowd's father, Brone, taught him the ways of the lumberjack trade from a young age, and he quickly became skilled with an axe. Over the years, Dowd has proven himself to be a hard worker, reliable and loyal to his colleagues at The Timbermen Guild. He hopes to continue working there and one day take over as boss.

job.quote: "We need to keep pushing ourselves"
job.relations: son of Brone and father to Malek

Dowd Langworth.name: Dowd
plot: Dowd is approached by a group of scholars who are studying the ancient forest surrounding Luminia. They offer him a job as their guide, promising to pay him handsomely for his assistance. But what secrets will Dowd uncover as he delves deeper into the forest?

The Timbermen Guild is struggling to make ends meet, and Dowd is forced to come up with a plan to save the business from going bankrupt. Can he convince his colleagues to work even harder and find new sources of income?

Dowd's younger brother, Malek, is jealous of his success and constantly tries to undermine him at work. Can Dowd find a way to mend their relationship and get Malek to see him as a mentor, rather than a rival?

A wealthy trader comes to Luminia with an offer to buy The Timbermen Guild for a large sum of money. Dowd must decide whether to sell the business and secure his family's financial future, or continue working there and striving for success on his own terms.
Dowd Langworth.quote: I will make you proud, father

relationship.Brone Langworth: Dowd looks up to his father and hopes to one day take over as head of the family himself. He values his father's advice and guidance, and tries to make him proud in everything he does.
relationship.Malek Langworth: Malek is Dowd's younger brother and colleague at The Timbermen Guild. They have a competitive relationship, but Dowd tries to be a good mentor to Malek and teach him valuable skills.
relationship.Orla Langworth: Orla is Dowd's young niece, and he loves playing with her whenever he has free time. He hopes to inspire her adventurous spirit and encourage her to explore the world around her.
relationship.Shay Langworth: Shay is Dowd's auntie and a constant source of love and support for him. She often gives him advice on personal matters and encourages him to pursue his dreams.
relationship.Wyatt Langworth: Wyatt is Dowd's younger cousin and page. Dowd sometimes feels responsible for looking after Wyatt, as he is still young and inexperienced. However, he also enjoys spending time with him and teaching him new things about the lumberjack trade.

anecdotes: Dunarl once saved his nephew Golrick from drowning in the river when he was just a child. The incident cemented their bond and Golrick has looked up to Dunarl ever since.
Dunarl has a reputation for being stubborn and opinionated, but his family knows that it is just a front to protect his vulnerable side.
Dunarl Hardwick.clothes: roughspun tunic and trousers in earth tones
Dunarl Hardwick.description: Dunarl Hardwick is a 60-year-old male dwarf who works as a senior priest in The Cult of the Old One. He is wise and stoic, with a gruff exterior hiding a heart of gold. Dunarl loves his family above all else and will do anything to protect them. He lives in Luminia, a prosperous village known for its ancient forest, river, and mountains. The village is protected and is a popular destination for scholars, adventurers, and traders. Dunarl's family is a tight-knit group of natives living in their own section of the village.

family.relationship: loves his family above all else and will do anything to protect them

Dunarl Hardwick.habits: Dunarl is a practical and responsible person who follows a strict routine. He wakes up early every day and spends the morning meditating and praying to the Old One. He then heads to work at The Cult of the Old One, where he spends the majority of his day performing his priestly duties. In the evenings, Dunarl returns home to spend time with his family and help out with any chores that need to be done. He values hard work and does not like to waste time on frivolous activities.
Dunarl Hardwick.history: Dunarl was born and raised in Luminia. He comes from a long line of natives who have lived in the village for generations. His family is well-respected and plays an important role in the community. Dunarl's father, Havelock, was the previous family chief before Dunarl took over the role. Havelock taught Dunarl the importance of family and tradition from a young age, and Dunarl has worked hard to uphold these values throughout his life. Dunarl became a priest of the Old One in his mid-twenties and has dedicated his life to spreading the teachings of the deity. He is highly respected within The Cult of the Old One and is considered one of its most senior members.

job.description: Wise and stoic, with a gruff exterior hiding a heart of gold.
job.quote: "In the end, it's not about what we sacrifice. It's about what we gain."
job.relations: Respected by all members of the group, particularly close to Heleth, sometimes frustrates Icabod with his devotion
job.workplace: The Cult of the Old One

Dunarl Hardwick.name: Dunarl
plot: Dunarl's family has a long-standing feud with a neighboring family, the Ironsides. The feud has escalated in recent years and Dunarl fears that violence may break out soon. He must figure out a way to calm tensions before a full-blown conflict erupts.

The Cult of the Old One has been growing increasingly radical in its beliefs, and Dunarl is starting to have doubts about its teachings. He must decide whether to remain loyal to the cult or to speak out against its dangerous practices.
Dunarl Hardwick.quote: "We'll make it work. We always do."

relationship.Decklin Hardwick: Dunarl's cousin. They have a playful relationship and often engage in friendly banter. Dunarl enjoys Decklin's sense of humor and carefree attitude.
relationship.Ecken Hardwick: Dunarl's eldest son. They have a somewhat strained relationship due to Ecken's competitive nature. Dunarl worries that Ecken is too focused on success and not enough on family.
relationship.Galtar Hardwick: Dunarl's uncle. They have a complicated relationship due to Galtar's grouchy and judgemental nature. Dunarl tries to remain loyal to his family but is often frustrated by Galtar's behavior.
relationship.Garline Hardwick: Dunarl's mother. She is tough and no-nonsense, and often clashes with Dunarl over his devotion to The Cult of the Old One. Despite their differences, Dunarl loves his mother deeply and respects her opinions.
relationship.Golrick Hardwick: Dunarl's grandson. He adores his grandfather and looks up to him as a role model. Dunarl sees a lot of himself in Golrick and hopes to pass on his wisdom to the next generation.
relationship.Gruhn Hardwick: Dunarl's youngest son. He is ambitious and determined, much like his father. Dunarl worries that Gruhn may become too focused on success and forget the importance of family.
relationship.Havelock Hardwick: Dunarl's beloved grandfather. He was the previous family chief and taught Dunarl the importance of tradition and family. Although Havelock has passed away, Dunarl still looks to him for guidance in times of need.
relationship.Heleth Hardwick: Dunarl's eldest daughter. She is strong-willed and fiercely independent, much like Dunarl himself. They have a close relationship but occasionally clash over their differing opinions.
relationship.Holdur Hardwick: Dunarl's son. They have a warm and friendly relationship, and Holdur often turns to his father for advice and support.
relationship.Marba Hardwick: Dunarl's beloved grandmother. He has a close relationship with her and turns to her for advice in times of need.
relationship.Sartine Hardwick: Dunarl's youngest daughter. She is shy and reserved, much like Dunarl's own nature. They share a quiet bond and often spend time together in silence.

Dunarl Hardwick.short_description: wise and stoic, with a gruff exterior hiding a heart of gold

anecdotes: Durwin once saved the life of a fellow member of the Wandering Wayfarers by using his blacksmith skills to create a makeshift brace for a broken leg.
Durwin is known for his love of puzzles and often spends hours trying to solve them in his free time.
Despite his tough exterior, Durwin has a soft spot for children and is known to go out of his way to help them whenever he can.
Durwin Hitch.description: Durwin Hitch is an imposing figure in the village of Luminia, with his tall frame and stern demeanor. He wears heavy leather armor and has a scar above his left eyebrow, which he earned during his younger days when he was still involved in criminal activities. Durwin has since turned his life around and is now a respected member of the Wandering Wayfarers, a group of outsiders who are known for their survival skills. As the blacksmith of the group, Durwin is responsible for maintaining their weapons and equipment. Despite his gruff exterior, Durwin has a softer side which is only revealed to those who have earned his trust.

family.relationship: respected by most, feared by some

Durwin Hitch.habits: Durwin is a disciplined individual who is dedicated to his work as a blacksmith. He wakes up early every morning to start the fire in his forge and spends most of his day working on weapons and equipment. In his free time, Durwin likes to go on walks in the nearby ancient forest, where he can be alone with his thoughts. He avoids alcohol and other vices, preferring to lead a clean and healthy lifestyle.
Durwin Hitch.history: Durwin was once a criminal who was known for his ruthlessness and his ability to get things done. He was involved in a number of illegal activities, including theft and extortion. One day, he crossed the wrong person and found himself on the receiving end of a beating that left him with a permanent scar above his left eyebrow. This incident caused Durwin to reevaluate his life and he decided to turn over a new leaf. He sought out the Wandering Wayfarers, a group of skilled outsiders who travel from place to place, and offered his services as a blacksmith. Over time, he earned their trust and became their leader.

job.description: grizzled veteran with a stern, no-nonsense demeanor
job.quote: "Heat, hammer, shape. Repeat"
job.relations: sees Fargas as a promising apprentice

Durwin Hitch.name: Durwin
plot: Durwin's criminal past comes back to haunt him when an old acquaintance comes to Luminia looking for revenge. The group must work together to protect Durwin and ensure that his past doesn't catch up with him.

The Wandering Wayfarers are hired to escort a group of scholars who are exploring a nearby ancient ruin. Durwin is tasked with creating weapons and equipment for the group, but soon discovers that there is more to the scholars' mission than meets the eye.

Durwin's leadership of the Wandering Wayfarers is called into question when a new member joins the group and challenges his authority. Durwin must prove his worth and demonstrate that he is the right person to lead the group.

Durwin becomes obsessed with uncovering the mystery surrounding the Old One, a local deity worshipped by the villagers of Luminia. He convinces the rest of the group to help him in his quest, but soon learns that the truth is more dangerous than he ever could have imagined.
Durwin Hitch.quote: "We can do it the easy way or the hard way."

relationship.Cacey Mallory: Durwin is wary of Cacey Mallory, the senior thief of the Wandering Wayfarers. He knows that she has a criminal past and worries that she may be a liability to the group.
relationship.Cammy Grayden: Durwin and Cammy have a close relationship, despite their vastly different personalities. Durwin sees Cammy as a source of light in an often dark world and appreciates her optimism and love for adventure.
relationship.Fargas Mallory: Durwin took Fargas under his wing when he joined the Wandering Wayfarers as an apprentice blacksmith. Durwin sees potential in Fargas and wants to help him grow into a skilled blacksmith like himself.
relationship.Morna Halstead: As the boss of the Wandering Wayfarers, Morna Halstead and Durwin have a professional relationship. Durwin respects Morna's exceptional hunting skills and sees her as a valuable member of the group.
relationship.Vora Murdoch: Durwin has a deep respect for Vora Murdoch, the family head of the group. He sees her as a natural leader and often seeks her advice when making important decisions for the Wandering Wayfarers.

Ennis Alkott.description: Ennis Alkott is a 40-year-old family elder who works at The Wayfinders, a team of adventurers based in Luminia. He is described as a strict but fair person with a deep attachment to tradition. Ennis is responsible for his family's prosperity and has a disciplined, cautious, wise, and responsible personality. His workplace is full of adventurous and reckless people, which sometimes frustrates him. Ennis is proud of his village and its prosperous trade, protected by the ancient forest, the river, and the mountains. He has a particular interest in local beliefs and the mystery that surrounds the non-gendered God worshipped by the people of Luminia. Ennis is not interested in adventures outside his comfort zone; he prefers to stay and protect his family and maintain his village's legacy and traditions.

family.relationship: Responsible for the family's prosperity.

Ennis Alkott.habits: Ennis wakes up early every morning to oversee The Wayfinders' activity and to check on his family's prosperity. He does his exercise routine every day to keep himself fit and disciplined. During his free time, he enjoys reading ancient scripts and local beliefs, looking for any information that could help his family and village. He has built a reputation in the village for his strict and punctual nature.
Ennis Alkott.history: Ennis was born and raised in Luminia, where his family has been living for generations. He grew up under the influence of his grandparents, who taught him the importance of tradition and legacy. Ennis's father was a successful merchant, and his mother was a healer. Ennis inherited his father's business sense and his mother's caring nature. He married young and had children but lost his wife to illness several years ago. Ennis's family is part of a group of natives called the Voyle, which is known for its wise and caring elders and adventurous young members. Ennis has always been proud of his group's heritage and has worked hard to maintain its legacy and reputation.

job.description: Strict but fair, with a deep attachment to tradition.
job.quote: Leadership is not an entitlement, it's a privilege
job.relations: Family members with Artis
job.working_clothes: fine clothing with insignia of leadership

Ennis Alkott.name: Ennis
plot: Ennis's family business is being threatened by a rival merchant who wants to dominate the trade in Luminia. Ennis has to navigate through the complex world of trade agreements and political alliances to protect his family's prosperity.

The Wayfinders have stumbled upon an ancient manuscript that could reveal Luminia's forgotten event, but it's guarded by dangerous monsters. Ennis has to gather a team of adventurers and lead them to retrieve the manuscript.

Ennis's rebellious niece Kearey has left the village to study in a far-away town. Ennis worries about her safety and the influence of the big city on her beliefs and traditions. He decides to go after her and convince her to come back home.

Ennis has discovered a secret society of scholars who investigate the ancient scripts and beliefs of Luminia. He is torn between his loyalty to his group and his fascination with the society's work. He has to choose whether to join the society and risk his group's reputation or keep the secret to himself.

relationship.Artis Alkott: Ennis's relationship with his nephew Artis is complicated. He admires his nephew's charm and handsome looks but despises his reckless behavior. Ennis often has to clean up after Artis's messes at The Wayfinders.
relationship.Bixler Voyle: Bixler looks up to his uncle Ennis and often seeks his approval or advice. Ennis sees potential in Bixler's adventurous spirit but worries about his recklessness.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Ennis's relationship with his brother-in-law is cordial but distant. They share a common goal of maintaining the family's prosperity but have different ways of achieving it.
relationship.Burnev Blackitt: Ennis respects Burnev's expertise as a blacksmith and appreciates his blunt but caring nature. They often work together to improve the village's defenses.
relationship.Crowle Denby: Ennis doesn't know Crowle well, but he respects his bravery and eagerness to prove himself as a ranger. He often assigns him scouting missions for The Wayfinders.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Ennis loves and respects his grandmother, who is the matriarch of the Voyle group. He often seeks her wisdom and guidance on important matters.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Ennis respects his older sister and often seeks her advice on family matters or personal issues. He has helped her raise her children after her husband's death.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Ennis has a deep respect for his grandfather, who has seen many changes in Luminia over the years. He values his experience and listens closely to his advice.
relationship.Hedwig Blackitt: Ennis respects Hedwig's skills as a scout and values her seniority. He finds her charming but sometimes worries about her recklessness.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Ennis is worried about Kearey's safety and future. He admires her ambition and curiosity but wishes she would stay close to home and respect the Voyle traditions.
relationship.Kerr Denby: Ennis has a cordial relationship with Kerr, but he doesn't trust his smooth talking and ambitious spirit. He keeps a close eye on Kerr's dealings and advises him on how to avoid trouble.

Ennis Alkott.short_description: Strict but fair, with a deep attachment to tradition.

family.relationship: Close to his cousin Arias

job.quote: "Let me do the talking" is his motto
job.relations: respectful towards Morna, learning from Conor

Ennis Atwood.name: Ennis
Ennis Atwood.quote: Life is short, enjoy it while you can
Ennis Atwood.secret: He stole some items from the local blacksmith

anecdotes: Ennis once saved a child from drowning in the river near Luminia. He was passing by when he heard the child's cries and jumped into the water without hesitation.

Ennis once lost his voice before a big performance. His colleagues were worried that they would have to cancel the show, but Ennis managed to pull through and deliver a stunning performance despite his hoarse throat.
Ennis Gilroy.clothes: colorful shirt and trousers with a red cap
Ennis Gilroy.description: Ennis Gilroy is a 65 years old human singer who always wears a smile and loves to charm the audience. He is known as 'The Charmer' by his colleagues and the people of Luminia. Ennis is a senior member of The Luminia Entertainers, a group of musicians who have been performing together for several decades. He lives in Luminia with his colleagues in a team_type that is composed of outsiders. Although Ennis has lived in Luminia for a while now, he still remains an outsider in the eyes of some of the locals. His pleasant personality, however, has won over the hearts of many.

family.relationship: admired by younger members of the group

Ennis Gilroy.habits: Ennis is a friendly and outgoing person who enjoys spending time with people. He often entertains his colleagues during their downtime with his singing and storytelling. Ennis is also a snappy dresser and is most often seen wearing colorful shirts and trousers with a red cap on his head. He enjoys taking long walks in the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia and can often be found humming a tune while he strolls.
Ennis Gilroy.history: Ennis came to Luminia as an outsider and joined The Luminia Entertainers soon after. He quickly became a valuable member of the group and helped them gain a reputation as one of the best musical acts in the region. Ennis has always been passionate about music and his goal is to leave a lasting legacy through his performances. He wants to be remembered as a great musician who brought joy to people's lives. Ennis has also been vocal about his desire to travel to other parts of the continent and perform for new audiences. However, due to his commitment to the group and his love for Luminia, he has not been able to pursue this dream.

job.description: Human singer who always wears a smile and loves to charm the audience.
job.quote: There is no greater joy than seeing the audience dance.
job.relations: Takes on a mentorship role towards the younger members of the guild.
job.working_clothes: Red silk shirt, black pants, and a green vest

Ennis Gilroy.name: Ennis
plot: Ennis has been approached by a talent scout who wants him to perform in the capital city. However, this would require him to leave Luminia and his beloved group behind. Will Ennis choose fame and fortune over his loyalty to his colleagues?

Ennis has been experiencing frequent bouts of forgetfulness lately. While he brushes it off as normal aging, his colleagues are starting to get worried. Could there be something more serious going on?

Ennis's former lover, who left him to pursue a career in the capital city, has returned to Luminia after many years. Although Ennis has moved on, his former lover's return stirs up old emotions and memories. Will Ennis be able to confront his past and move on?
Ennis Gilroy.quote: "We are not just musicians, we are storytellers"

relationship.Afnaerad: Ennis has a great deal of respect for Afnaerad and sees him as a wise and compassionate member of the group. He values his friendship greatly and looks up to him as a role model.
relationship.Derry Kerswell: Ennis enjoys spending time with Derry and sees her as a talented young musician. He is often impressed by her enthusiasm and determination and hopes to be able to help her grow as a performer.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Ennis has a great deal of respect for Enda and sees her as a wise and experienced member of the group. He often seeks her advice on matters related to the music business and values her input greatly.
relationship.Jarok Ainsworth: Ennis has known Jarok for many years and sees him as a mentor and friend. He often turns to him for advice and is grateful for the guidance he has received over the years.
relationship.Rhyshe: Ennis is slowly getting to know Rhyshe and is impressed by her musical talent. He enjoys spending time with her and hopes to be able to get her to open up more.
relationship.Ruibrarii Coralaeth: Ennis gets along well with Ruibrarii and often accompanies him on his forest explorations. He enjoys hearing about the elf's adventures and finds him to be a curious and interesting character.

Ennis Gilroy.short_description: a human singer who always wears a smile and loves to charm the audience

anecdotes: Erris once accidentally spilled a barrel of wine on herself during a particularly busy day at the guild, and spent the rest of the day smelling like grapes.
Erris once rescued a stray cat that had wandered into the guild's wine cellar, and took it home to live with her family.
When asked about her favorite type of wine, Erris always answers 'The one that brings people together.'
Erris Voyle.description: Erris Voyle is a middle-aged woman who works at Vintner's Guild. She takes pride in her winemaking skills, and often spends long hours in the wine cellar to ensure the quality of her wine. Despite her dedication to her work, Erris is first and foremost a caring and protective mother. She has two children, Kearey and Bixler, and is fiercely protective of them. Erris spends most of her free time with her family, and often prepares delicious meals for them. She is well-liked by her colleagues at the guild, and is known for her warm personality and empathy towards others.

family.relationship: Protective of her children

Erris Voyle.habits: Erris has a few habits that she sticks to every day. She starts her day with a cup of hot tea, and spends some time tending to her small herb garden before heading to work. After work, she likes to take a short walk along the river and admire the beautiful scenery of Luminia. She enjoys reading books about winemaking and history, and always carries a small notebook with her to jot down notes and ideas.
Erris Voyle.history: Erris was born and raised in Luminia, and comes from a long line of winemakers. Her family has been living in the village for generations, and has always been highly respected in the community. Growing up, Erris was always fascinated by the process of winemaking, and spent much of her childhood helping her parents in their vineyard. She married her childhood sweetheart, Boren Voyle, and together they raised a family. Erris has always had a deep love for her hometown, but secretly dreams of traveling to other lands and learning more about winemaking.

job.quote: "The vines are an extension of me."
job.relations: Treats Ansel like her own son
job.working_clothes: simple dress, always carrying a grapevine wand

Erris Voyle.name: Erris
plot: Erris is approached by a wealthy adventurer who offers to buy a large quantity of wine from the guild. However, the adventurer has a shady reputation, and Erris must decide whether to risk the guild's reputation by doing business with him.

Bixler, Erris' eldest son, announces that he wants to leave Luminia to explore new lands. Erris must confront her fear of losing her child and decide whether to let him go or try to convince him to stay.

A new group of winemakers arrives in Luminia and starts selling their wine at lower prices than the guild. Erris must find a way to compete and protect the guild's interests without resorting to unethical tactics.

An ancient vineyard located in a dangerous part of the forest is discovered, and Erris is tasked with leading a team to retrieve the rare grapes. However, the vineyard is rumored to be cursed, and the expedition may be more dangerous than anyone realizes.

relationship.Ansel Rolfe: Ansel is an apprentice winemaker at the guild, and looks up to Erris as a mentor. He admires her dedication to her work and often seeks her advice on winemaking techniques.
relationship.Bixler Voyle: Bixler is Erris' eldest son, and shares her love for adventure and exploration. The two are very close, but Erris worries about Bixler's safety when he leaves Luminia to explore new lands. She hopes that he will eventually return home and continue the family tradition of winemaking.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Erris has been married to Boren for many years, and the two share a deep love and respect for each other. Boren is highly respected in the community and serves as the chief of their family group. Erris relies on him for guidance and support, and often seeks his advice when faced with difficult decisions.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Kearey is Erris' youngest daughter, and the two have a somewhat strained relationship. Kearey dreams of becoming a scholar, which is not a traditional path for women in Luminia. Erris worries about her daughter's safety and well-being, but also wants to support her in pursuing her dreams.
relationship.Keavey Rolfe: Keavey is a senior winemaker at the guild and has been working with Erris for many years. The two are good friends and often share tips and tricks for making the best wine.
relationship.Rosaleen Rolfe: Rosaleen is an apprentice winemaker at the guild and looks up to Erris as a role model. She admires Erris' commitment to her family and her work, and hopes to one day be as skilled a winemaker as she is.

anecdotes: Garrett once saved the life of a young adventurer who was lost in the ancient forest. He led the adventurer back to safety and gave them guidance on how to avoid dangers in the forest.
Garrett's sword fighting skills are legendary in his family. He once challenged his granddaughter, Haley, to a duel and surprised her with his agility and strength.
Garrett has a fondness for local baked goods and is often seen sneaking extra treats from Brona Gilroy's bakery.
Garrett is known for his sharp memory. He can recite entire passages from ancient texts that he studied decades ago.
Garrett Versh.description: Garrett Versh is an elder member of the Versh family, a small and close-knit community in Luminia. Despite his age, Garrett is still active and continues to work as an elder at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. He is known for his kind and forgiving nature, and is highly respected by both his family and colleagues. Garrett is often seen wearing long robes of red velvet and carrying a walking stick. He enjoys spending time with his family and discussing local beliefs and forgotten events with his fellow scholars and adventurers.

family.relationship: The elder statesman of the family, respected by all.

Garrett Versh.habits: Garrett wakes up early every morning and takes a walk around the village, greeting his neighbors and admiring the natural beauty that surrounds Luminia. He then spends most of his day working at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God, attending religious ceremonies and counseling fellow believers. In his free time, Garrett enjoys reading ancient texts and researching local myths and legends. He also practices his sword fighting skills in secret, a trait that only a few members of his family know about.
Garrett Versh.history: Garrett was born and raised in Luminia, and has lived there his entire life. He comes from a long line of proud and honorable farmers and blacksmiths, but decided to pursue a career in religion instead. Garrett joined The Devout of the Non-Gendered God at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks, becoming an elder before his 30th birthday. He married, had children and watched them grow up into adults with families of their own. Alongside his family responsibilities, Garrett continued to work as a scholar, spending his time studying the unique continent, the empire and the non-gendered God. Throughout the years, he witnessed Luminia's prosperity grow and watched as the village became a hub for trade, scholars, and adventurers.

job.quote: \"We all make mistakes. It's how we learn from them that counts\"
job.relations: father figure to other members
job.workplace: The Devout of the Non-Gendered God

Garrett Versh.name: Garrett
plot: Garrett's secret skill with the sword may come in handy if Luminia is threatened by bandits or other dangers. A plot could be developed around Garrett having to reveal his skills to protect the village.
Garrett is still mourning the death of his wife, who passed away several years ago. A plot could explore how Garrett copes with this loss and finds comfort in his family and faith.

Garrett is curious about the mystery surrounding the forgotten event that is often spoken about in Luminia. A plot could center around Garrett's quest to uncover the truth behind the event and its significance to the village's history.
Garrett's adventurous granddaughter, Haley, may inspire him to embark on a new adventure. A plot could focus on their journey together and the obstacles they face along the way.
Garrett Versh.quote: "I'm not as old as I look."

relationship.Anson Versh: Garrett's cousin and a curious young man. Garrett enjoys teaching Anson about local beliefs and forgotten events.
relationship.Cammy Talbot: A senior nurse at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God, and a close friend of Garrett. Garrett often seeks Cammy's advice on medical matters and trusts her implicitly.
relationship.Dardan Versh: Garrett's son and the chief of the Versh family. Although they have their differences, Garrett is proud of Dardan's achievements and his dedication to their family.
relationship.Derry Talbot: The wise and experienced herbalist at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God. Garrett respects Derry's knowledge and often consults with him regarding religious rituals.
relationship.Haley Versh: Garrett's granddaughter and a spirited adventurer. Garrett loves spending time with Haley and is always impressed by her bravery and independence.
relationship.Nash Barrington: The respected village leader of Luminia. Garrett has a good relationship with Nash and often attends meetings with him to discuss matters concerning the village.
relationship.Phineas Versh: Garrett's uncle and a jolly man who loves to tell stories. Garrett and Phineas often share a drink together and reminisce about old times.
relationship.Shay Versh: Garrett's daughter and a respected elder in the Versh family. Garrett has a close relationship with Shay and often relies on her for advice.

Garrett Versh.secret: He can still wield a sword with deadly accuracy.
Garrett Versh.short_description: A humble man who is known for his kindness.

anecdotes: Garrett once helped a group of adventurers navigate through the Old One's Forest and find a hidden treasure trove.
During a particularly harsh winter, Garrett risked his own safety to bring food and supplies to a neighboring village that was suffering from a famine.
Garrett is known for his love of riddles and often challenges his family and colleagues to solve them.
Garrett once spent an entire day lost in the woods but managed to find his way back to Luminia by following the stars.
Garrett Voyle.description: Garrett Voyle is a quiet and reserved elderly man who is highly respected in the Luminia community. He has lived in the village for many years and has gained a reputation as a wise man with years of experience. Garrett spends most of his time working at The Navigators' Alliance, where he serves as the boss of the guild's cartographers. Despite his age, Garrett is still quite active and enjoys spending time with his family, particularly his grandson Arias. Garrett's past as a former thief is a closely guarded secret that he rarely speaks about.

family.relationship: Respected and loved by his family, highly regarded by the Woodsman Brotherhood for his experience and knowledge

Garrett Voyle.habits: Garrett is a creature of habit and keeps to a strict routine. He wakes up early every morning and spends the first few hours of the day reading or studying maps. Garrett is a tea drinker and takes his tea with honey and lemon. He enjoys spending time in nature and takes frequent walks in the woods surrounding Luminia. In the evenings, Garrett can often be found relaxing at home with his family.
Garrett Voyle.history: Garrett comes from a long line of natives who have lived in Luminia for generations. His ancestors were fishermen and traders who made their living on the river. Throughout his life, Garrett has witnessed many changes in the village. He remembers when the scholars first arrived in Luminia and the prosperity that came with them. Garrett was a young man when the Woodsman Brotherhood was formed, and he played a key role in helping the group establish itself in the village. Despite his past as a thief, Garrett has always been dedicated to helping others, and he has spent much of his life mentoring young adventurers and guiding them on their quests.

job.description: Quiet and reserved, but wise with years of experience
job.quote: "Every map tells a story"
job.relations: highly respected by younger sailors, often sought for advice and guidance
job.working_clothes: a long cloak with a hood

Garrett Voyle.name: Garrett
plot: Garrett's past as a thief could come back to haunt him if someone were to discover his secret.
A group of scholars has come to Luminia in search of a rare map that Garrett may possess.
Garrett's grandson Arias has joined a group of adventurers and gone missing. Garrett may need to intervene to help locate him.
A rival guild is trying to sabotage The Navigators' Alliance. Garrett must work to protect the guild's interests and reputation.

relationship.Arias Voyle: Garrett is very close to his grandson Arias and enjoys spending time with him whenever possible. He is deeply concerned about Arias's recent disappearance and is doing everything in his power to help find him.
relationship.Bixler Voyle: Garrett and Bixler share a love of adventure and often swap stories about their respective travels.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Garrett and his son Boren have a deep mutual respect for each other. Boren looks up to his father and often seeks his advice on business matters.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Garrett's relationship with his wife Enda is very strong. They have been married for many years and have weathered many storms together.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Garrett has a close relationship with his daughter Erris. She is very protective of him and often checks on him to make sure he is taking care of himself.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Garrett has a somewhat strained relationship with his granddaughter Kearey. She often feels that he does not take her dreams of becoming a scholar seriously.

Garrett Voyle.short_description: Quiet and reserved, but wise with years of experience

job.quote: “I ask too many questions and I’m not sorry about it.”

Girta Netweaver.name: Girta

anecdotes: When Godwin was a young man, he and his friends ventured deep into the ancient forest, where they encountered a group of scholars from a distant land. The scholars shared stories about their travels, introducing Godwin to new cultures and ideas. This encounter inspired Godwin to become a scholar himself, studying the history of Luminia and its unique continent.

Godwin once helped a lost traveler find their way back to Luminia, sharing stories and mead with them along the way. The traveler turned out to be a powerful merchant who was so impressed by Godwin's hospitality that he decided to establish a trade route with Luminia, further boosting the village's prosperity.

During a harsh winter, when food supplies were scarce, Godwin organized a community effort to share the remaining harvest among the villagers. His generosity and leadership inspired the people of Luminia to work together and overcome adversity.
Godwin Kerswell.clothes: Long brown robe with fur around his neck
Godwin Kerswell.description: Godwin Kerswell is an 80-year-old elder who retired from farming and now spends his days sharing stories and wisdom with the people of Luminia. He is a kind and gentle man who is highly respected by his family members and the people of the village. Godwin has spent his entire life in Luminia, witnessing the village prosper and grow, while preserving its unique legacy and protecting it against external threats. He is a devout follower of the non-gendered God of the village and takes great pride in being part of a community that values knowledge, scholarship, adventure, and trade.

family.relationship: Highly respected by family members

Godwin Kerswell.habits: Godwin enjoys spending his days reading ancient texts, sipping mead, and tending to his small garden. He loves to tell stories about the history of Luminia and the Old One, inspiring younger generations to learn more about their legacy. He is also known for his generosity, often sharing his harvest and wisdom with those in need.
Godwin Kerswell.history: Godwin was born in Luminia to a family of farmers and scholars. His father, Odger Kerswell, was the head of the family and taught Godwin and his siblings about the unique continent and the forgotten event that had shaped it. Godwin married young and had two sons, Baen and Amery, both of whom followed in their father's footsteps and became farmers. Godwin spent most of his life working the land and preserving the village's prosperity, but as he grew older, he decided to retire from farming and focus on building an orphanage for the children of the village. He saved up enough money to purchase a plot of land and is currently seeking support from the Harvest Guild to build the orphanage. Godwin is highly regarded by the people of Luminia, who see him as a wise and experienced leader who can advise the village leaders on matters of trade, diplomacy, and security.

job.description: A kind and gentle old man who is always ready to help
job.quote: “I may be old, but I remember stories that will captivate your imagination.”
job.relations: father of Baen and Amery, grandfather of Eckert
job.working_clothes: old woolen trousers, simple shirt, walking stick

Godwin Kerswell.name: Godwin
plot: Godwin's dream of building an orphanage is threatened by a group of bandits who demand a ransom in exchange for safe passage through Luminia. Godwin will have to use all his wisdom and negotiating skills to prevent violence and protect the village.

A group of adventurers arrives in Luminia, seeking guidance and information about the Old One and the unique continent. Godwin sees this as an opportunity to record the history of Luminia and share it with the world, but he also fears that the adventurers may disturb the delicate balance of the village.

One of Godwin's grandchildren, Dara, discovers an ancient text that reveals a dark secret about the non-gendered God of Luminia. Godwin must decide whether to share this knowledge with the village leaders and risk shaking their faith, or to keep it a secret and risk losing his credibility.

Godwin learns that the Harvest Guild may have to increase their crop production to meet the demands of a neighboring village. Godwin sees this as an opportunity to trade with new partners and expand the influence of Luminia, but he also fears that the increased production may deplete the natural resources of the village and harm its ecosystem.
Godwin Kerswell.quote: Let's share some stories over a glass of mead

relationship.Amery Kerswell: Godwin's youngest son is carefree and friendly, and he often stops by Godwin's house to share a glass of mead and catch up on the latest news. Godwin worries about Amery's lack of ambition and responsibility, but he still loves him as a son.
relationship.Baen Kerswell: Godwin's eldest son is hardworking and dedicated, much like his father. They often share stories over a glass of mead and discuss the future of the village.
relationship.Dara Kerswell: Godwin's granddaughter is curious and adventurous, and she often accompanies Godwin on his walks in the ancient forest. She is fascinated by the Old One and the unique continent, and Godwin enjoys sharing his knowledge with her.
relationship.Dexer Kerswell: Godwin's uncle is a grumpy old man who often complains, but Godwin still regards him with respect and affection. Dexer taught Godwin how to farm and hunt, and they share a deep bond that transcends their generational and personality differences.
relationship.Eckert Kerswell: Godwin's grandson is confident and hardworking, much like his father Baen. He looks up to Godwin as a role model and often seeks his guidance in matters of business and leadership.
relationship.Odger Kerswell: Godwin's father is wise and patient, and he loves to tell stories about the history of Luminia. Godwin respects his father's wisdom and often seeks his advice on matters of leadership.
relationship.Sorley Kerswell: Godwin's cousin is an optimistic and adventurous young man who Godwin sees as the future of Luminia. They share a love for exploration and learning, and Godwin often takes Sorley on walks in the ancient forest to share stories and wisdom.

Godwin Kerswell.secret: He has saved up some money to build an orphanage for the children of the village
Godwin Kerswell.short_description: A kind and gentle old man who is always ready to help
