Gum Rhinehart.name: Gum
Gum Rhinehart.short_description: Confident and energetic, always eager to help his family

Gunner Mosley.clothes: Simple shirt and pants - navy blue
Gunner Mosley.description: Gunner Mosley is a respected member of the Luminia village who always puts the well-being of the community before himself. As the family head, he takes his responsibility seriously to ensure the legacy of their ancestors is preserved. He has been working as a senior guard at The Devout of the Non-Gendered God, where he is admired for his vigilance and dedication. Gunner is a tall man with short brown and greying hair, olive skin, and brown eyes. He usually dresses in a simple navy blue shirt and pants. Despite his serious nature, he is respected and loved by all the villagers.

family.relationship: respected by all

Gunner Mosley.habits: Gunner is an early riser since he believes that early birds do catch the worm. He starts his day with a cup of coffee and some light exercise. He loves reading, especially books about the history of Luminia. He usually spends his weekends exploring the ancient forest or fishing in the river. He also frequently visits the local scholars to learn more about the unique continent they reside in and broaden his knowledge.
Gunner Mosley.history: Gunner was born and raised in Luminia and has always taken pride in his village's prosperous and protected state. His family has been living in the village for generations, and he has inherited his ancestors' respect for the Old One and the local beliefs. Gunner was trained as a guard by his father, who passed away when he was fifteen. Since then, he took over his father's responsibilities and became the family head at a young age. He worked tirelessly to improve the life of his family and the entire village. Gunner values education highly and made sure that all his children have access to it. His eldest daughter, Wren, is studying at the local scholars to become an expert on non-gendered God and inherited the family's love of knowledge. Gunner hopes to pass on the legacy of his ancestors to his children and see Luminia prosper for generations to come.

job.quote: \"I'll protect this village with my life\"
job.relations: friendly with other guards
job.workplace: The Devout of the Non-Gendered God

Gunner Mosley.name: Gunner
plot: Gunner discovers that an ancient artifact has been stolen from the local temple, and the thief is someone close to him. He must find out who the culprit is before the village is cursed by the Gods.
Gunner learns that there is a group of bandits planning to attack the village to steal their trade goods. He must convince the local authorities to take action before it's too late.
Gunner's youngest daughter, Creena, goes missing in the ancient forest. He must lead a search party and find her before she is lost forever.
The local authorities suspect Gunner's cousin, Artis, of being involved in a forbidden religious practice. Gunner must navigate his loyalty to his family and his duty to protect the village's values.
Gunner Mosley.quote: Our ancestors built this village from nothing. We must protect it.

relationship.Alley Mosley: Gunner deeply respects his aunt and values her knowledge of the village's history. He often seeks her advice when dealing with family or village matters. Gunner hopes that one day, he will be as wise as Alley.
relationship.Artis Mosley: Gunner has a complicated relationship with his cousin. He loves him as a family member but often disagrees with his sarcastic and lazy nature. However, Gunner admires Artis's extensive knowledge of religious lore and thinks he could be a valuable asset if he would apply himself more.
relationship.Creena Mosley: Gunner sees his youngest daughter as his little angel and enjoys seeing her grow up to be a good-natured and helpful person. He hopes to teach her to be more confident and adventurous but also protect her from the dangers of the outside world.
relationship.Dalmer Mosley: Gunner sees his grandson as the future of the family and the village. He tries to guide him to become a responsible and caring individual, but he also worries about his impulsive nature. Gunner believes that Dalmer has great potential but needs to mature before he can take over his responsibilities.
relationship.Wren Mosley: Gunner loves his daughter deeply and is proud of her academic achievements. He hopes to pass on his family's love for knowledge to her and foster her curiosity to discover more about the unique continent.

Gunner Mosley.short_description: Respected and responsible, always puts the village first

family.relationship: respected by all, especially the children

job.quote: "It's not just fabric. It's a message."
job.relations: Admires Heleth's wisdom, frustrated by Icabod's skepticism, trusts Dunarl's steady hand

anecdotes: One time, Hedwig stumbled upon an unexplored cave system while on a scouting mission. He convinced his team to explore it even though they were hesitant. They ended up finding a treasure trove of ancient artifacts that shed light on the forgotten event that occurred in Luminia's history.

Hedwig once got into a heated argument with Ennis Alkott, the leader of The Wayfinders. Hedwig believed that they should take more risks while Ennis thought they should be more cautious. In the end, they compromised and decided to take calculated risks that ultimately led to success.
During a fight club match, Hedwig faced off against a formidable opponent. Despite being outmatched, Hedwig managed to win by using his quick thinking and improvisation skills.
Hedwig Blackitt.clothes: fashionable woolen clothes and a fur pelt
Hedwig Blackitt.description: Hedwig Blackitt is a charming and charismatic dwarf who works as a scout for The Wayfinders. He is the eldest son in his family and is very close to his grandfather Jurg. Even though he has a reputation for being reckless, he is always eager to go on adventures and explore the mysteries of Luminia. In his free time, Hedwig is involved in an underground fight club. He is known for his courage and impulsive nature which has helped him win many fights. Hedwig also has a birthmark shaped like a star on his left shoulder which is considered to be a sign of good luck among the natives of Luminia.

family.relationship: very close to his grandfather Jurg

Hedwig Blackitt.habits: Hedwig has a habit of taking risks and jumping into situations without thinking things through. He is always looking for the next adventure and can often be found exploring the ancient forest or mapping out new areas of interest. Hedwig is also known for his love of fashion and can often be seen wearing trendy woolen clothes and fur pelts.
Hedwig Blackitt.history: Hedwig comes from a family of natives who have lived in Luminia for generations. His family is well respected in the community and is known for their resilience and curiosity. Hedwig grew up listening to his grandfather's stories of the Old One and the unique continent they live on. He was fascinated by the empire that once ruled Luminia and the local beliefs surrounding the non-gendered God. Hedwig's natural curiosity and love of adventure led him to join The Wayfinders where he quickly rose through the ranks to become a senior scout.

job.quote: There's always something new to discover
job.relations: Close friends with Artis

Hedwig Blackitt.name: Hedwig
Hedwig Blackitt.physical detail: birthmark shaped like a star on his left shoulder
plot: Hedwig discovers an ancient map that leads to a long lost tomb of a famous adventurer. In order to claim the treasure, he must work with a rival team who are also after the same treasure.
Hedwig's involvement in the fight club gets him into trouble when he is caught by the authorities. He must clear his name and find a way to continue fighting without getting caught.
While exploring a dangerous area, Hedwig and his team stumble upon evidence of a cult that is trying to summon a powerful demon. They must stop the cult before it's too late.
Hedwig discovers a new species of monster that has been terrorizing nearby villages. He must track down the monster and figure out how to defeat it before it can cause any more harm.

relationship.Artis Alkott: Hedwig works with Artis at The Wayfinders. Despite Artis' reputation for being reckless, the two get along well and often work together on scouting missions.
relationship.Bullin Blackitt: Bullin is Hedwig's cousin and although he can be grumpy at times, he is loyal to the family and supports Hedwig in his endeavors.
relationship.Ennis Alkott: Ennis is the leader of The Wayfinders and is often at odds with Hedwig due to their different approaches to exploration. However, Ennis recognizes Hedwig's talent and values his contributions to the team.
relationship.Girta Blackitt: Hedwig's mother Girta is overprotective of him and worries about his safety on his expeditions. Despite this, Hedwig and his mother have a close relationship and he values her advice and support.
relationship.Jurg Blackitt: Hedwig is very close to his grandfather Jurg. Jurg taught Hedwig everything he knows about exploration and the mysteries of Luminia.

Hedwig Blackitt.secret: he's involved in an underground fight club

anecdotes: Heleth once accidentally mistook a visitor to the village for a messenger from The Cult of the Old One and started lecturing them about the importance of proper sacrifices. The visitor was quite puzzled at first but then quickly realized what was happening and laughed it off.
When Heleth was a young girl, she snuck into a library belonging to a famous scholar without permission. Though she was caught, she was able to convince the scholar to teach her everything they knew.
As a teenager, Heleth fell in love with a local blacksmith, who wrote a love letter for her. She still keeps it after all these years, hidden in a secret drawer.
Heleth Blackitt.description: Heleth Blackitt is a 76 years old dwarf woman, short and chubby. Her wrinkled and ruddy skin covers her short grey hair and brown eyes. She wears a warm wool shawl in colorful tones. Heleth is best known for her sharp tongue and sassy attitude. She works as an oracle at The Cult of the Old One and leads her team with authority, although she can be quite demanding at times. Despite this, she is respected by her colleagues for her knowledge and wisdom. Heleth is a curious and resilient person who enjoys the company of others. She reads lips, which sometimes makes it difficult for her to communicate, but never stops her from wanting to know more about the world around her.

family.relationship: very close to Girta, mother of Dragar

Heleth Blackitt.habits: Heleth has a habit of questioning everything and everyone. She is never satisfied with the answer until she has explored all the possible angles. She also tends to take naps whenever she has a moment of free time, even if it's just a few minutes.
Heleth Blackitt.history: Heleth was born and raised in Luminia, part of the Voyle family that has lived in the village for generations. She married young but lost her husband during an accident in a nearby mountain when she was 35. Although she never remarried, she had a close relationship with Girta, mother of Dragar, and they have been companions ever since. Heleth joined The Cult of the Old One as soon as she could, fascinated by the mysteries surrounding their deity. Over time, she became one of the most influential members of the cult thanks to her knowledge and experience. Heleth's love for adventure and discovery has led her to explore the ancient forest and nearby mountains, discovering forgotten places and artifacts. She has also been involved in local politics, using her wit and sharp tongue to sway people's opinions.

job.quote: The Old One says, 'Never hurt a dwarf who knows where you sleep.' Or, wait...
job.relations: Revered by all members of the group, particularly close to Gwen, sometimes irritated by Icabod's lack of faith
job.workplace: The Cult of the Old One

Heleth Blackitt.name: Heleth
plot: Heleth suspects that there is something strange going on in the ancient forest surrounding Luminia. Her curiosity drives her to investigate, but as she gets closer to the truth, she realizes that whatever is happening might not be meant to be discovered by mortals.

A crisis hits The Cult of the Old One when one of their offerings is stolen. Heleth is called upon to help investigate the matter and recover the stolen goods. As she probes deeper, she uncovers a conspiracy within the cult.

Heleth discovers a long-forgotten passage in an old manuscript that might hold the key to a mystery surrounding Luminia's founding. She recruits a team of adventurers to help her explore the mountains and find the lost secrets.

relationship.Dunarl Hardwick: Although they work together, Heleth and Dunarl don't communicate much. She respects his stoic personality, but sometimes wishes he would show more emotion.
relationship.Girta: Heleth and Girta have been close companions ever since Heleth lost her husband. They often spend time together, discussing local beliefs and sharing stories. Heleth has also helped Girta raise her son Dragar and have a very close relationship.
relationship.Gwen Ironside: Heleth works with Gwen, the senior seamstress. She admires Gwen's warrior skills and is often fascinated by her expertise in sewing. Heleth considers her a valuable member of the team.
relationship.Icabod Denisson: Heleth works with Icabod, the apprentice smith. While she acknowledges his hardworking nature, she finds him quite gruff and is not particularly fond of him.

Heleth Blackitt.secret: she has an old love letter from a past beau

anecdotes: When Heleth was just a child, she heard a rumour that there was a hidden treasure in the ancient forest near Luminia. Determined to find it, she spent weeks exploring the woods, searching for clues. Eventually, she stumbled upon an old map that led her to the treasure - a stash of ancient dwarven coins buried deep in the earth. Heleth was thrilled by her discovery, and has kept the coins as a reminder of her adventure ever since.

One day, while out hiking in the mountains near Luminia, Heleth came across a wounded bear cub. Without hesitating, she scooped the cub up in her arms and carried it back to the village, where she nursed it back to health. The bear cub became her constant companion, following her wherever she went and even sleeping at the foot of her bed at night. Though eventually the bear grew too big to live with her in her home, Heleth still visits him in the forest every chance she gets.
Heleth Hardwick.clothes: leatherwork vest and boots with intricate patterns
Heleth Hardwick.description: Heleth is a strong-willed and fiercely independent woman who takes pride in protecting her loved ones. She works as an apprentice miller at Hardwick Milling Co., where she is learning fast and proving herself to be a valuable asset to the family business. Heleth clashes with her father over leadership decisions, but remains committed to cooperating with him to keep the family and their business prosperous. In her free time, Heleth enjoys exploring the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia, seeking out adventure and mystery. Though she values her privacy and independence, Heleth is well-respected by her colleagues and neighbours for her resourcefulness and bravery.

family.relationship: loves her family but clashes with her father over leadership decisions

Heleth Hardwick.habits: Heleth has a habit of speaking her mind, even when it is not always welcome. She is also known for her love of baked goods, which she often shares with coworkers and neighbours. Heleth enjoys spending her free time exploring the wilderness around Luminia, and can often be found hiking, fishing, or camping.
Heleth Hardwick.hair: shoulder-length and curly in deep brown
Heleth Hardwick.history: Heleth was born and raised in Luminia, and has always taken pride in her heritage as a native dwarf. She grew up in the family home with her parents, siblings, and grandparents, all of whom worked together to build and maintain the family's milling business. Heleth was always drawn to the business, and began working as an apprentice miller at a young age. Over time, she proved herself to be a valuable member of the team, and eventually earned the respect of her colleagues and family members alike. Today, Heleth is a key member of Hardwick Milling Co., and is committed to using her skills and knowledge to help the family business thrive for generations to come.

job.quote: "I’ve found my calling in the mill"
job.relations: Daughter of Havelock and Garline, sister of Galtar, wants to prove herself to her family

Heleth Hardwick.name: Heleth
plot: Heleth's father is growing increasingly ill, and struggling to maintain his leadership of the family business. As tensions rise between Heleth and her father, it becomes clear that someone will have to take over soon. Will Heleth step up to the challenge and become the new leader of Hardwick Milling Co.?

Rumours are swirling that there is a long-forgotten dwarven city hidden somewhere in the mountains near Luminia. Heleth is determined to find it, but she'll need the help of her friends in the Hardwick family if she's going to succeed. Will they be able to navigate the treacherous wilderness and uncover the city's secrets?

A wealthy merchant from a nearby town has expressed interest in purchasing Hardwick Milling Co. from the family. Though Heleth is initially hesitant to sell, she realizes that the family could use the money to expand their business and improve their prospects. Will she be able to convince her father and the rest of the family to sell, or will they decide to hold onto the business at all costs?
Heleth Hardwick.quote: "I'll do whatever it takes to keep my family safe"

relationship.Dunarl Hardwick: Heleth loves her father deeply, but the two clash frequently over leadership decisions. Despite their disagreements, Heleth respects Dunarl's wisdom and experience, and hopes to one day take over the reins of the family business from him.
relationship.Garline Hardwick: Heleth has a complicated relationship with her mother, whom she sees as tough and no-nonsense. Though they sometimes clash over Heleth's independence and ambition, Garline loves her daughter deeply and is fiercely protective of her.
relationship.Gruhn Hardwick: Heleth gets along well with her younger brother, and often turns to him for help when she needs it. Though they have their differences, Gruhn looks up to Heleth and admires her determination and bravery.
relationship.Havelock Hardwick: Heleth has always been close with her grandfather, whom she sees as a mentor and role model. Havelock has taught Heleth a great deal about the art of milling and business management, and is proud of the woman she has become.
relationship.Stephan Blackwood: Heleth enjoys working with Stephan at the mill, and appreciates his curious and helpful nature. The two often exchange tips and tricks for improving their millwork, and share a passion for exploring the wilderness around Luminia.

Heleth Hardwick.short_description: strong-willed and fiercely independent, always protecting her loved ones

Henna Ironside.clothes: colorful skirt and a simple shirt

family.relationship: business-minded, a bit distant from her family

Henna Ironside.name: Henna
Henna Ironside.physical detail: a big scar on her ankle
Henna Ironside.quote: "Let me handle this, I know exactly what to say."
Henna Ironside.secret: She has a plan to become rich

anecdotes: Henna once saved a fellow hunter from a deadly bison attack using her quick thinking and tracking skills.
Henna once stood up to the village elder when he refused to hear the concerns of her family about a new trade deal.
Henna has a collection of rare herbs and plants that she keeps hidden in her room, which she uses in her magic practice.
Henna Mallory.clothes: light woolen dress with a leather waistcoat
Henna Mallory.description: Henna is a smart, independent woman who works at The Bison Runners - a hunting company in Luminia. She is the eldest child of Birk Skarholt, a strict but loving father. Henna is protective of her family and ambitious, and secretly learning magic from a local wizard. She is observant, persuasive, assertive, and empathetic, with a birthmark on her neck. Henna wears a light woolen dress with a leather waistcoat and has long, curly auburn hair and blue eyes.

family.relationship: Protective of her family and ambitious

Henna Mallory.habits: Henna wakes up early every day to do some light exercises and practice her magic skills before heading to work.
Henna Mallory.history: Henna grew up in Luminia with her father and siblings. Being an outsider, she always felt a bit different from the other villagers. Despite this, Henna was always ambitious and determined to make something of herself. She started working at The Bison Runners as soon as she could, and it was there that she discovered her interest in magic. However, she keeps this a secret from her father, who disapproves of magic. Henna is driven by a desire to empower herself and her family, and hopes to one day be able to use her magic for good.

job.quote: "I know this land like the back of my hand"
job.relations: competitive with Regan, friendly with Garrett

Henna Mallory.name: Henna
plot: Henna's secret magic practice is discovered by her father, causing a rift in their relationship.
A group of adventurers come to Luminia seeking Henna's help with a magical quest.
The Bison Runners face financial troubles, and Henna must use her magic to save the company and her colleagues.
Henna's past as an outsider comes back to haunt her when a group of bandits arrive in Luminia with a grudge against outsiders.
Henna Mallory.quote: "If we don't speak up, no one will"

anecdotes: Once, during a performance, Jarok accidentally set his robe on fire from a nearby candle. He kept playing and singing without missing a beat until someone from the audience threw a bucket of water on him to put out the flames.
Jarok once convinced a group of scholars to come to Luminia to study the village's unique beliefs and customs. He personally gave them a tour and even performed some of his music for them.

When The Luminia Entertainers were struggling financially, Jarok sold his prized lute to keep the group afloat. It was a difficult decision, but he felt that preserving the group's legacy was more important.
Jarok has a reputation for being a bit of a flirt, and many women in the village have fallen for his charming personality and smooth singing voice.
Jarok Ainsworth.description: Jarok Ainsworth, also known as The Old Fox, is a charismatic leader of The Luminia Entertainers. He has been leading the group for over 30 years, and his experience and wisdom are respected by all members of the group. Jarok is a tall human with short and gray hair, brown eyes, and light skin. He wears a colorful robe with a cap, and his physical detail is that he is missing his left ear. Jarok is a wise and adventurous bard who believes that music can guide one's soul. He is a key figure in the village of Luminia, and his contributions have made the village prosperous and well-known for its lively entertainment culture.

family.relationship: respected by all members of the group

Jarok Ainsworth.habits: Jarok is a true performer at heart, and he spends most of his time rehearsing with The Luminia Entertainers or scouting for new talent to join his group. In his free time, Jarok enjoys exploring the ancient forest surrounding the village, where he finds inspiration for new songs and stories. He is also a frequent visitor to the local tavern, where he entertains the guests with his music and storytelling.
Jarok Ainsworth.history: Jarok is originally an outsider who stumbled upon Luminia while wandering through the forest. He was immediately captivated by the village's unique culture and decided to settle there. He started The Luminia Entertainers with a group of like-minded individuals, and the group quickly gained a reputation for their innovative performances and collaborations with other artists. Jarok has always been driven by his desire for fame and legacy. He wants to leave a lasting impression on the entertainment world and inspire future generations of musicians and performers. Despite his age, Jarok shows no signs of slowing down and is always pushing himself and his group to new heights.

job.description: charismatic leader of The Luminia Entertainers
job.quote: "Music is the universal language that brings people together."
job.relations: Respected by all members of the group, especially Orla whom he sees as a protégé
job.working_clothes: colorful robes with a lute embroidered

Jarok Ainsworth.name: Jarok
plot: A new bard arrives in Luminia and challenges Jarok's status as the village's most renowned musician.
The Luminia Entertainers are invited to perform for the emperor in the capital city. Jarok sees this as an opportunity to cement the group's legacy and takes charge of the preparations.
Jarok discovers a mysterious artifact in the ancient forest surrounding Luminia. He becomes obsessed with unlocking its secrets and neglects his duties as the leader of The Luminia Entertainers.
A wealthy merchant offers to fund The Luminia Entertainers in exchange for exclusive performances. Jarok must decide whether to take the offer and risk compromising the group's artistic integrity.

relationship.Afnaerad: Jarok has known Afnaerad for decades and considers him to be like a grandfather figure. He often seeks Afnaerad's advice on personal matters, and they share a bond over their love of music.
relationship.Derry Kerswell: Jarok sees potential in Derry and enjoys teaching her new songs and techniques. He hopes that she will one day become a valued member of The Luminia Entertainers and continue the group's legacy.
relationship.Ennis Gilroy: Jarok and Ennis have been friends for many years, and their playful banter is a common sight at the local tavern. Jarok considers Ennis to be a valuable member of The Luminia Entertainers and appreciates his positive attitude.
relationship.Herne Urdro: Jarok has a deep respect for Herne's craftsmanship and often commissions him to make new instruments for The Luminia Entertainers. They share a love of music and often discuss new ideas for performances.
relationship.Orla Atwood: Jarok sees Orla as a talented singer and songwriter, and he often seeks her opinion on new songs. He is proud of her progress and hopes to one day pass on the leadership of The Luminia Entertainers to her.

Jarok Ainsworth.short_description: a human bard who has been leading The Luminia Entertainers for over 30 years

anecdotes: Once, Julian discovered a swarm of bees had settled in a nearby tree. He spent hours coaxing the bees into a new hive, displaying his patience and expertise.
Julian once wrote a book on the benefits of honey and nature, which became a bestseller in Luminia and beyond.
Julian Rhinehart.description: Julian Rhinehart is a wise and patient elderly man with a vast amount of knowledge that he is always willing to share. As a member of the Honey Keepers, he has spent most of his life tending to bees and producing honey and beeswax. He wears a grey long robe and a monocle on his left eye, which he needs for close-up work. Julian is a respected member of the community in Luminia, known for his wisdom and helpfulness. He lives with the Voyle family, a native group living in a family-type group.

family.relationship: Respected by the group

Julian Rhinehart.habits: Julian wakes up early every morning to tend to his bees before heading to work at the Honey Keepers. He spends most of his day there, except for when he takes breaks to share his knowledge with his colleagues or anyone who asks for advice. In his free time, Julian enjoys reading and writing about his experiences with bees and nature.
Julian Rhinehart.history: Julian was born and raised in Luminia, where he quickly developed a love for nature and a fascination with bees. He joined the Honey Keepers at a young age, learning the intricacies of beekeeping from his fellow colleagues and mentors. As he grew older, Julian's passion for bees and nature only deepened, leading him down a path of scholarship and research. He became an expert in beekeeping and a master of nature magic. Julian's relationship with the Voyle family began when he was seeking shelter from a powerful storm. The family took him in and welcomed him as one of their own. Julian has been living with them ever since, sharing his wisdom and knowledge with the younger members and becoming a respected elder.

job.description: Wise and patient, always shares his knowledge with the group
job.quote: "Bees are the keystone species of our ecosystem."
job.relations: Respected by all members of the group, looks after both his children Gum Rhinehart and Sadie Muldoon, seen as a fatherly figure by the group.
job.working_clothes: traditional beekeeping suit made of light colours

Julian Rhinehart.name: Julian
Julian Rhinehart.physical detail: wears a monocle on his left eye
plot: Julian discovers that the bees in Luminia are slowly dying off due to pollution and climate change. He teams up with other experts in beekeeping and nature magic to try and save the bees.

A group of adventurers comes to Luminia seeking Julian's help in navigating the ancient forest surrounding the village. They discover that Julian knows more about the forest than anyone else and they form a close bond.
The Honey Keepers come under threat from a rival company seeking to take over the honey production in Luminia. Julian becomes a leader in the fight to protect the Honey Keepers and their way of life.

relationship.Arias Voyle: Julian sees a lot of potential in Arias and encourages his curiosity and love of adventure.

relationship.Kearey Voyle: Julian admires Kearey's ambition and curious nature, and often shares his knowledge with her.

anecdotes: Katerine once saved a rare book from a fire at The Luminarian Society of Ideologies, which proved to be a valuable addition to their library.
Katerine is known for being very strict about the organization and cleanliness of the library. She once scolded an apprentice for not putting away a book in its proper place.
Katerine Mallory.clothes: Long woolen dress with a white apron
Katerine Mallory.description: Katerine Mallory is a 45-year-old woman who is strict and traditional. She works as the librarian at The Luminarian Society of Ideologies, a cooperative organization that focuses on scholarship and research. Katerine is chubby and has a fair complexion with short grey hair and brown eyes. She wears a long woolen dress with a white apron, and a silver brooch shaped like a bird on her collar. Katerine believes that tradition is the backbone of society and tries to teach her children to be responsible adults.

family.relationship: Tries to teach her children to be responsible adults

Katerine Mallory.habits: Katerine is a disciplined, organized, practical, and cautious woman. She likes to keep herself and her surroundings clean and tidy. She wakes up early in the morning, reads books and newspapers, prepares breakfast, and goes to work. After work, she returns home, cooks dinner, and spends time with her family. Katerine does not like to waste time or money and tries to be economical in everything she does.
Katerine Mallory.history: Katerine was born in Luminia as Coralaeth, but later changed her name to Katerine Mallory after getting married. She has been living in Luminia for her entire life and is very attached to her community. Katerine's family is part of a group of natives called the Voyle family, which has been living in Luminia for generations. The Voyle family is known for being loyal, nurturing, empathic, charismatic, honorable, wise, adventurous, energetic, daring, wise, patient, caring, curious, observant, and ambitious. They are very respected in Luminia due to their vast life experience and contributions to the community.

job.quote: "Knowledge is power"
job.relations: Keeps a watchful eye on the group's activities, appreciates Muriel's creativity, but often clashes with Bullin's pessimistic mindset

Katerine Mallory.name: Katerine
Katerine Mallory.physical detail: A silver brooch shaped like a bird on her collar
plot: Katerine discovers a mysterious book at The Luminarian Society of Ideologies that contains ancient knowledge about Luminia and puts her in danger.
Katerine's son Bixler Voyle goes missing while on an adventure, and Katerine sets out to find him and bring him back.
Katerine is accused of stealing a rare book from The Luminarian Society of Ideologies, and she must prove her innocence to save her reputation and job.
Katerine Mallory.quote: Tradition is the backbone of society

relationship.Bullin Blackitt: Katerine's colleague at The Luminarian Society of Ideologies. They often have discussions about different philosophies and ideologies.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Katerine's grandmother. They share a deep respect for tradition and often reminisce about old times.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Katerine's sister-in-law. They are close friends and often exchange recipes and parenting tips.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Katerine's grandfather. They have a quiet and reserved relationship, but Garrett is always there to offer wise advice when Katerine needs it.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Katerine's youngest daughter. They have a difficult relationship due to Kearey's rebelliousness and Katerine's strictness.
relationship.Muriel Ironside: Katerine's colleague at The Luminarian Society of Ideologies. Katerine often helps Muriel with her shyness and encourages her to express herself through art.
relationship.Phineas Darkmantle: Katerine's apprentice at The Luminarian Society of Ideologies. Katerine is strict with Phineas but recognizes his talent for art and encourages him to pursue it.

anecdotes: Kealey once shared a secret with her nephew Dardan about a forgotten event in Luminia's history, which he later used in one of his adventures.
Kealey once helped a lost traveler find their way back to town by retracing their steps and pointing out landmarks along the way.
Kealey Brasher.clothes: Silk blouse with an embroidered skirt
Kealey Brasher.description: Kealey Brasher is a friendly and knowledgeable woman who works as a horse breeder at The Stablemasters' Association in Luminia. She has an average beauty and stands at an average height with fair skin, grey-blue eyes, and medium-length brown hair. Kealey is often seen wearing a silk blouse with an embroidered skirt. Her love for history and the town has deepened with age. Aside from her work, Kealey also plans to open an antique shop. She is close to her nephew Dardan, who often visits her for stories of Luminia. Kealey is a patient and diplomatic individual who inspires those around her.

family.relationship: close to her nephew Dardan

Kealey Brasher.habits: Kealey spends much of her free time reading up on Luminia's history and local beliefs, hoping to one day write a book about them. She also likes to take long walks along the river or in the ancient forest surrounding the town. Kealey is well-respected in Luminia for her knowledge and love of the town. She is friendly and approachable, and takes great pride in helping visitors find their way around Luminia.
Kealey Brasher.history: Kealey is a native of Luminia and is a part of the Voyle family, which is one of the oldest families in the town. Her parents Boren and Erris Voyle are well-respected members of the community, and her grandparents Garrett and Enda Voyle are held in high-esteem for their wisdom and counsel. Kealey's rebellious nature led her to pursue a career in horse breeding, a field outside of the traditional scholarly pursuits of her family. Despite this, she has remained close to her family and holds their guidance and support in high regard. Kealey is deeply invested in the history and legacy of Luminia, which has led to her becoming a knowledgeable source of information for visitors and residents alike.

job.description: A friendly woman who knows everything about Luminia's history
job.quote: "A well-trained horse is a work of art"
job.relations: Has a close relationship with Egan Halstead, whom she sees as a second son, and appreciates Bixler's energy and drive to learn
job.working_clothes: Long skirts and blouses in earthy tones

Kealey Brasher.name: Kealey
plot: Kealey's plans to open an antique shop have been met with resistance from some members of the community who fear that it will take business away from the existing shops in town. Kealey must navigate these conflicts while pursuing her dream.
Kealey's intimate knowledge of Luminia's history could lead to her uncovering a long-forgotten mystery, putting her in danger.
Kealey Brasher.quote: Learning from history can prevent us from making mistakes

relationship.Boren and Erris Voyle: Kealey's parents are proud of her accomplishments and support her in her endeavors. They often ask her for advice on matters relating to the town's history or their family history.
relationship.Dardan: Kealey is very close to her nephew Dardan, who often visits her for stories about Luminia. She dotes on him and is always happy to see him.
relationship.Garrett and Enda Voyle: Kealey's grandparents are a source of wisdom and guidance for her, and she turns to them often for counsel on matters both great and small.

Kealey Brasher.secret: She is planning to open an antique shop
Kealey Brasher.short_description: A friendly woman who knows everything about Luminia's history

anecdotes: Kealey once saved Vetta Darrow from a pack of wolves while they were exploring the mountains outside Luminia. Since then, Vetta has been an unwavering supporter of Kealey and the Great Bison Company.
Kealey lost her left pinky finger while hunting a particularly aggressive boar. She never talks about the incident, but it has become a legendary story in Luminia.

Rumors abound that Kealey once went toe-to-toe with the Old One, the mysterious entity that many locals believe is responsible for the village's prosperity. No one knows what really happened, but according to some accounts, Kealey emerged victorious from the encounter.
Kealey Gant.description: Kealey Gant is a tough but fair leader, in charge of the Great Bison Company for decades. She has a weathered skin and short white hair, and is missing her left pinky finger. Throughout her life in Luminia, Kealey has earned the respect of everyone with her resilience, no-nonsense attitude, and determination. She is known as 'The Boss' among her peers and subordinates. Kealey can often be seen wearing a heavy wool coat and sturdy boots, ready to take on any challenge that comes her way. As a member of the Council of Wisdom, Kealey plays an important role in the community, working towards justice and promoting leadership. She is well-versed in the local beliefs and traditions of Luminia, and has a deep understanding of the community's needs.

family.relationship: commands respect from everyone

Kealey Gant.habits: Kealey is a workaholic who takes her responsibilities seriously. She always ensures that the job is done right, no matter how difficult or challenging it may be. She is also fiercely independent and does not like to rely on others for help. In her free time, Kealey loves to explore the ancient forest surrounding Luminia, seeking adventure and new experiences. She enjoys hunting, fishing, and camping, and always comes back with amazing stories to share with her colleagues.
Kealey Gant.history: Kealey came to Luminia as an outsider, but quickly established herself as a formidable force to be reckoned with. She became the leader of the Great Bison Company, which had been struggling before she took over. With her strong leadership skills and determination, Kealey turned the company around, making it one of the most successful businesses in the area. Over the years, she has built up a vast network of contacts in the trade industry, and is well-respected across the region. Kealey's reputation as a fair and honest businesswoman has earned her many admirers, and she is looked up to as a role model by many youngsters in Luminia. As a member of the Council of Wisdom, Kealey has played a vital role in shaping the community's future, using her wisdom and experience to guide Luminia towards prosperity.

job.description: tough but fair, in charge of the Great Bison Company
job.quote: "Don't mess with the herd"
job.relations: respected by all members as a leader, but can be stern and unforgiving

Kealey Gant.name: Kealey
plot: A rival business has set up shop in Luminia, and is threatening to undercut the Great Bison Company's prices. Kealey must find a way to beat the competition, or risk losing everything she has worked so hard for.

Kealey discovers a forgotten event from Luminia's past that could shed light on the origins of the Old One. But in order to learn more, she must venture into the dangerous mountains beyond the village, where many dangers lurk.

One of Kealey's former lovers comes back into her life, stirring up old emotions and threatening to destabilize her relationship with the Great Bison Company. Kealey must decide whether to pursue a new romance or stick to the path she has chosen.
Kealey Gant.quote: "Do the job right, or don't do it at all."

relationship.Arias Voyle: Kealey has a good relationship with Arias Voyle, Erris and Boren's grandson. Arias is an energetic and curious young man who shares Kealey's love of adventure and exploration.
relationship.Bixler Voyle: Kealey has a good relationship with Bixler Voyle, Erris and Boren's eldest son. Bixler is an adventurous young man who shares Kealey's love for exploration and discovery.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Kealey has a cordial relationship with Boren Voyle, Erris's husband, who is also a respected member of the community. Boren is a loyal customer of the Great Bison Company, and often recommends Kealey's services to others.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Kealey has a deep respect for Enda Voyle, Erris's mother and the oldest member of their living group. Enda's vast life experience has made her a wise and patient mentor to Kealey and others in the community.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Erris Voyle is the head of Kealey's living group, and an important figure in Luminia. Kealey respects Erris's wisdom and experience, and often seeks her counsel on matters related to the community.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Kealey respects Garrett Voyle, Erris's father and a quiet, reserved elder. Garrett's years of experience have made him a wise observer, and Kealey often seeks his advice on important matters.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Kealey has a somewhat rocky relationship with Kearey Voyle, Erris and Boren's youngest daughter. Kearey has aspirations of becoming a scholar, which conflicts with Kealey's own no-nonsense approach towards life.

Kelsey Atwood.secret: She lost all her savings in a bet

anecdotes: Kelsey once healed a wounded bear that wandered into the village and became a guardian spirit for her.
A young adventurer once came to Kelsey for guidance and ended up staying in Luminia for a year, learning from the wisdom keeper every day.

Once, Kelsey forgot where she kept her book of herbs and approached a local child for help. The child found the book after only a few minutes of searching and Kelsey gifted them with a beautiful necklace.
Kelsey Darkmantle.description: Kelsey Darkmantle is an elderly woman who has lived in Luminia her entire life. She is well-respected by the community for her knowledge and kindness. Kelsey works at The Council of Wisdom, an administration council that values wisdom, experience, tradition, justice, and leadership. She is a senior member of the council, and as such, plays a vital role in ensuring that the village remains prosperous and protected. Kelsey is known to have a mysterious connection to the forest spirits, teachings which she shares with the people of Luminia. Her dedication to knowledge makes her a beloved figure in the community.

family.relationship: is loved and respected by all family members

Kelsey Darkmantle.habits: Kelsey has a habit of spending time meditating in the forest. She believes that this practice helps her to connect with the spirits of the forest and gain insights into the mysteries of the world. She also tends to forget things due to her old age but is always willing to listen to others' perspectives to learn something new. In addition to her spiritual practices, Kelsey enjoys spending time with her family, especially her grandchildren.
Kelsey Darkmantle.history: Kelsey was born into a native family in Luminia and has lived there her entire life. Her family is well-respected in the village, and Kelsey has continued that legacy through her work at The Council of Wisdom. She has always had a connection to the forest and its spirits and has spent much of her life studying and learning from them. Kelsey has been instrumental in guiding the people of Luminia towards prosperity, protection, and trade. Her belief in the non-gendered God, unique continent, and forgotten events make her stand out from other villagers.

job.quote: Be the change you want to see in the world
job.relations: mentored by Ashlan Pendrake
job.working_clothes: brown cloak with a silver clasp

Kelsey Darkmantle.name: Kelsey

Kelsey's close relationship with her family members opens up possibilities for character arcs involving them, such as conflicts or secrets that could impact the entire group.
Kelsey Darkmantle.quote: "The spirits of the forest teach us that all things are connected"

relationship.Blayde Darkmantle: Kelsey's nephew, Blayde, has always looked up to his aunt for guidance, especially when it comes to agriculture. Kelsey taught Blayde how to plant and harvest crops and has instilled in him a sense of pride for his land and hard work.
relationship.Tressa Darkmantle: Kelsey holds a deep admiration for her granddaughter Tressa, who is an independent and intelligent woman passionate about education. Kelsey often shares stories from her own life to inspire Tressa to pursue her goals and dreams.
relationship.Vespera Nightshade: Kelsey has a mutual respect and friendship with Vespera Nightshade, the herbalist boss at The Council of Wisdom. They often share knowledge about the forest and its plants, which makes them both more effective at their jobs.

anecdotes: Despite his gruff demeanor, Kerr once saved the life of a young boy who had fallen into the river while playing. The boy's mother was so grateful that she invited Kerr over for dinner every week for a year.
Kerr once got into a heated argument with the local blacksmith over the best way to forge a sword. The argument lasted for hours and attracted a large crowd, but in the end, Kerr's opinion prevailed.
Kerr is known to have a soft spot for animals, particularly dogs. He can often be found feeding scraps to the strays that wander through the village.
Kerr Bancroft.clothes: heavy plate armor over a chainmail shirt
Kerr Bancroft.description: Kerr Bancroft is an old grizzled veteran who spent most of his life in Luminia. He served in the royal guard until he was dishonorably discharged for criticizing the king. After leaving the guard, Kerr found a new purpose at The Living Trees Guild as a woodcarver. He takes great pride in his work and is fiercely protective of his fellow guild members. Despite his rough exterior, Kerr has a sharp wit and a deep sense of loyalty to those he considers his friends.

family.relationship: like a grandfather figure to everyone in the group

Kerr Bancroft.habits: Kerr wakes up early every morning to begin work at The Living Trees Guild. He spends most of his day carving intricate designs into wood, often taking breaks to chat with his fellow guild members. When he's not working, Kerr can usually be found at the local tavern, swapping war stories with other veterans and adventurers.
Kerr Bancroft.history: Kerr Bancroft moved to Luminia many years ago, seeking a quiet place to retire after being dishonorably discharged from the royal guard. He quickly found a new purpose at The Living Trees Guild, where he has worked ever since. Despite his age, Kerr remains an active member of the guild and is highly respected by his colleagues for his skill and dedication. Recently, Kerr joined a team of adventurers based in Luminia in order to further protect the village from outside threats.

job.description: Old veteran with sharp wit and rough exterior
job.quote: "A good chisel is worth its weight in gold"
job.relations: Respects others' skills and experience, enjoys teaching and sharing stories
job.working_clothes: leather apron, green shirt, brown pants

Kerr Bancroft.name: Kerr
Kerr Bancroft.physical detail: a large burn scar on his right arm
plot: Kerr's past catches up with him when a former member of the royal guard arrives in Luminia, seeking revenge for Kerr's criticism of the king.
The Living Trees Guild is threatened by a rival guild that seeks to monopolize the woodcarving industry in Luminia. Kerr and his colleagues must find a way to protect their livelihoods.

Kerr discovers the existence of a mysterious artifact hidden deep in the ancient forest surrounding Luminia. He sets out on a dangerous quest to recover it, but must contend with greedy treasure hunters and dangerous monsters along the way.
Kerr Bancroft.quote: I've seen too much in my life to believe in fairy tales

relationship.Gade Rhinehart: Kerr has taken Gade under his wing, teaching him the nuances of woodcarving and helping him navigate the intricacies of life in Luminia.
relationship.Jordan Grimes: Kerr is wary of Jordan's mischievous streak, but can't help feeling a grudging respect for her sharp mind and quick wit.
relationship.Katerine Brasher: Kerr sees a younger version of himself in Katerine and takes it upon himself to mentor her in the ways of adventuring. He is fiercely protective of her and considers her one of his closest friends.
relationship.Rudd Halstead: Kerr respects Rudd's intellect and curiosity, though he sometimes finds the young scholar's questions tiresome.

anecdotes: Kerr once saved his entire team from a group of dangerous monsters by using his persuasive skills to negotiate a truce.
Kerr and his team once discovered an ancient artifact that was later sold to a wealthy collector for a large sum of money.
Kerr once got into a fistfight with a member of a rival exploration team over a woman they both fancied. The woman later revealed that she was not interested in either of them.
Kerr Denby.description: Kerr Denby is a handsome and well-spoken middle-aged man who is always eager to go on adventures. He works as a mercenary at The Wayfinders, an exploration team in Luminia. Kerr is the eldest son of the Denby family, a native family living in Luminia. He respects his father but often disagrees with his ideas. Kerr is in love with a woman from a rival guild, which he keeps as a secret. He has adventurous, persuasive, and charming traits, which make him a valuable asset to the exploration team.

family.relationship: Respects his father but disagrees with his ideas.

Kerr Denby.habits: Kerr is a very active person who enjoys physical activities such as hiking, climbing, and sword fighting. He also likes to read books about history, geography, and mythology. Kerr has a habit of taking risks, which can sometimes get him into trouble. However, his persuasive skills usually help him get out of difficult situations.
Kerr Denby.history: Kerr was born and raised in Luminia, where he learned the values and traditions of his native family. At a young age, he discovered his passion for adventure and exploration, which led him to join The Wayfinders. Kerr quickly became one of the most valuable members of the team, thanks to his skills and charisma. However, he is constantly torn between his loyalty to his family and his desire for new experiences. Kerr's relationship with his father is complicated, as they have different views on their family's future. Despite this, Kerr deeply loves and respects his mother and grandfather.

job.description: Handsome and well-spoken, always eager to go on adventures.
job.quote: Better to die with honor than live in shame
job.relations: Older brother of Crowle
job.working_clothes: chain mail and a red cape

Kerr and his team may stumble upon a dangerous discovery during one of their expeditions, which could have significant consequences for Luminia.

relationship.Baen Denby: Kerr has a complicated but loving relationship with his grandfather Baen. They often disagree on matters related to the family's future, but Kerr deeply respects Baen's wisdom and experience.
relationship.Cobb Denby: Kerr has a tense relationship with his father Cobb due to their differing views on the family's future. However, Kerr deeply loves and respects his father and would do anything to protect his family.
relationship.Crowle Denby: Kerr has a close and competitive relationship with his younger brother Crowle, who is also a member of The Wayfinders. They often compete to see who can complete a mission faster or better.
relationship.Dardan Denby: Kerr loves his young apprentice Dardan and enjoys teaching him about exploration and adventure.
relationship.Morna Denby: Kerr is very fond of his playful and imaginative granddaughter Morna. He enjoys spending time with her and telling her stories about his adventures.
relationship.Stianna Denby: Kerr has a close and affectionate relationship with his mother Stianna. He often seeks her advice and guidance when faced with difficult decisions.

anecdotes: Once, Kirwin spent an entire night tending to a rare flower that he had discovered in the forest. When he brought it back to the garden, it quickly became the talk of the town and brought in many visitors to Luminia.
Kirwin is known for his excellent memory and often surprises his colleagues by remembering details about plants that they had long forgotten.
Kirwin Vain.clothes: leather armor with brown and gold accents
Kirwin Vain.description: Kirwin Vain is a loyal and protective halfling who works as a senior groundskeeper at Luminia's Gardeners Guild. He takes great pride in his work and often spends long hours tending to the beautiful gardens of the guild. Despite his busy schedule, he always makes time for his family, whom he is devoted to. Kirwin is secretly in love with one of the druids and often spends his free time admiring her from afar.

family.relationship: devoted to his family

Kirwin Vain.habits: Kirwin is a responsible and hard-working individual who values punctuality and dedication. He wakes up early every morning to tend to the gardens, and always goes above and beyond to ensure that they are in pristine condition. In his free time, he enjoys reading books about botany and exploring the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia.
Kirwin Vain.history: Kirwin was born into the Vain family, a group of natives who have lived in Luminia for generations. His father, Quinn, is a respected and wise family head, while his mother, Niall, is a caring and nurturing figure. Kirwin is the eldest son and takes on the responsibility of looking after his younger siblings. He has always been fascinated by the ancient forest and the unique plants that grow within it, which led him to pursue a career in gardening. After joining Luminia's Gardeners Guild, Kirwin quickly rose through the ranks and became a senior groundskeeper. He takes great pride in his work and often dreams of starting his own landscaping business one day.

job.quote: "A well-manicured lawn is a sign of a well-kept village"
job.relations: Highly respected by the group for his hard work and dedication to the job, but can be overprotective of the group and slow to trust outsiders. Has a particularly close relationship with Phineas, who often seeks his advice on the best way to tend to the village's flowers and plants.

Kirwin Vain.name: Kirwin
plot: Kirwin's secret love for one of the druids could potentially cause issues if it were to be revealed. This plot could explore the consequences of Kirwin's feelings being made public, and how it affects his relationships with his colleagues and family members.

Kirwin's dream of starting his own landscaping business could become a reality, but he must first overcome the challenges of securing funding and finding clients. This plot could involve Kirwin seeking advice from business owners in Luminia, and convincing his family members to support him.

relationship.Brona Darkmantle: Kirwin looks up to Brona as a skilled woodworker and often seeks her advice on how to improve his own craft.
relationship.Muriel Pendrake: Kirwin has taken Muriel under his wing and is currently mentoring her on how to become a successful groundskeeper.
relationship.Phineas Versh: Kirwin and Phineas have a friendly yet competitive relationship, as they both take pride in their work at the Gardeners Guild.

anecdotes: Malek once saved a lost child who had wandered into the forest. He found her cowering behind a tree and escorted her back to the village, earning the gratitude of her parents.
Malek once challenged a traveling bard to a duel of wits and won, impressing his friends but also earning the ire of the bard.
Malek once attempted to swim across the river as a dare from his friends, but got caught in the current and had to be rescued by his father.
Malek Brasher.clothes: Leather armor with a red sash
Malek Brasher.description: Malek is an 18-year-old charismatic youth with a thirst for adventure. With his green eyes and short black hair, he stands tall in his leather armor with a red sash. Malek works as an apprentice guard at The Guardian's Pact, a security team that protects the village of Luminia. He is impulsive and energetic and has a fear of drowning. Malek lives with his family in Luminia, where he looks up to his father, Dardan, who is a skilled guard with a quick wit.

family.relationship: looks up to his father

Malek Brasher.habits: Malek is a courageous and charismatic individual who tends to act impulsively. He enjoys exploring the local surroundings, and often spends his free time hiking through the ancient forest, where he feels most at home. Malek has a tendency to take risks without thinking things through, which can sometimes land him in trouble.
Malek Brasher.history: Malek was born and raised in Luminia, a prosperous and protected village located in the midst of an ancient forest, with a river and mountains nearby. Malek's family has lived in Luminia for generations, and his aunt, Kealey, is an expert on the village's history. Malek was always fascinated by the stories she told him about the unique continent they lived on and the forgotten event that shaped Luminia's legacy. As Malek grew older, he became more and more restless, eager to make a name for himself and write his own story. Malek decided to join The Guardian's Pact, hoping to prove his worth and protect his home.

job.description: charismatic and impulsive, with a thirst for adventure
job.quote: "Let's do it!"
job.relations: Looks up to Dardan's skill

Malek Brasher.name: Malek
plot: Malek discovers a hidden entrance to a long-forgotten tomb in the forest. He convinces his friends to accompany him inside, but they soon find themselves trapped and have to fight their way out.
Malek is accused of stealing a valuable artifact from a local scholar. Despite his protestations of innocence, Malek is forced to go on the run to clear his name and find the real thief.
Malek's father, Dardan, is kidnapped by bandits while on patrol. Malek and his colleagues at The Guardian's Pact set out to rescue him and bring the bandits to justice.
Malek Brasher.quote: I will write my own story, a story of courage and discovery

relationship.Dardan Brasher: Malek looks up to his father, Dardan, who is a skilled guard with a quick wit. Malek wants to prove himself to his father and follow in his footsteps.
relationship.Delp Kerrigan: Delp is a boss at The Guardian's Pact and Malek's colleague. He is wise and respected within the community, and often acts as a mentor figure for Malek.
relationship.Delp Scarrow: Delp is a senior guard at The Guardian's Pact and Malek's colleague. He is impulsive and brash, and often clashes with Malek over their different approaches to problem-solving.
relationship.Kealey Brasher: Kealey is Malek's aunt and a member of Malek's living group. She knows everything about Luminia's history and Malek often seeks her out for advice and guidance.
relationship.Lorna Brasher: Lorna is Malek's cousin and a member of his living group. She is a curious girl who loves nature walks. Malek enjoys spending time with her, and often goes on hikes with her into the forest.

Malek Brasher.secret: He has a fear of drowning
Malek Brasher.short_description: A charismatic youth with a thirst for adventure

anecdotes: Malek once lost a hefty sum of money in a game of cards and had to sell some of his family's prized possessions to pay off his debt.
When Malek was still an apprentice weaver, he accidentally spilled dye on the best fabric in the shop, earning him a stern lecture from his boss Stianna Mallory.
Malek Helwick.description: Malek Helwick is a stern and responsible weaver who works at Clothier's Collective in the prosperous village of Luminia. As the eldest son of the Helwick family, Malek tries to be a good leader, but is afraid of disappointing his father Egan. He has a gambling problem that he keeps hidden from his family and colleagues. Malek values family traditions and structure, and is authoritative, practical, and loyal. He has a faint scar on his chin and sports short salt-and-pepper hair. Malek stands tall and has fair skin with grey-green eyes. He typically wears a simple grey tunic.

family.relationship: Tries to be a good leader, but is afraid of disappointing his father Egan

Malek Helwick.habits: Malek has a no-nonsense attitude and can come across as blunt. He likes to keep a tight schedule for himself and for others, and is often seen organizing or delegating tasks. Malek enjoys a good drink after work and will often visit the local tavern to socialize with other villagers and to forget about his problems.
Malek Helwick.history: Malek was born and raised in Luminia, where his family has lived for generations. His mother, Erris Helwick, instilled in him a sense of compassion and generosity, while his father, Egan Helwick, taught him to be resourceful and stubborn. Growing up, Malek felt the weight of his family's legacy on his shoulders and thus took on the role of family head when his father became too old to do so. Malek's love for gambling started in his teenage years and has grown into a problem that he tries to keep hidden from his family. He hopes to redeem himself and overcome his addiction by making his family proud and leaving them a prosperous legacy.

job.quote: "Cutting corners always leads to disaster"
job.relations: Protective of the group, trusts and relies on Canice's guidance

Malek Helwick.name: Malek
plot: Malek's gambling problem gets out of hand and he starts stealing from Clothier's Collective to fund his addiction.

Malek discovers a rare type of fabric that could catapult Clothier's Collective to the top of the trade industry in Luminia, but he must navigate a tricky business deal with another guild to obtain it.

A group of adventurers come to Luminia looking for a guide through the ancient forest, and Malek is recruited due to his knowledge of the local area. However, he discovers that some of the adventurers have ulterior motives and must protect his village.
Malek's father Egan falls ill and Malek must take care of him while continuing to manage Clothier's Collective. The stress of these responsibilities causes Malek's addiction to resurface.

relationship.Canice Ironside: Malek greatly values Canice's wisdom and knowledge of family traditions, often seeking his advice.
relationship.Egan Helwick: Malek's relationship with his father is strained, as he feels the pressure of living up to his expectations. However, Malek still respects Egan's resourcefulness and wisdom.
relationship.Elspeth Helwick: Malek thinks of his cousin Elspeth as energetic and fun-loving, but often finds her lack of structure and responsibility frustrating.
relationship.Erris Helwick: As his mother, Erris holds a special place in Malek's heart. He turns to her for emotional support and guidance whenever he feels overwhelmed.
relationship.Evelyn Helwick: Malek takes pride in his daughter Evelyn's intelligence and curiosity, and tries to encourage her love for books whenever he can.
relationship.Stianna Mallory: Malek sees his boss as grumpy and judgmental, but respects her position and expertise.

anecdotes: Marba once saved a horse from a terrible case of hoof rot by using a traditional dwarven remedy. The horse's owner was so grateful that they gifted Marba a rare book on horse care.
Marba is famous in the village for her delicious cookies. Whenever there is a special event or celebration, people always ask Marba to bring her cookies.
Marba Hardwick.clothes: simple cotton dress in earth tones
Marba Hardwick.description: Marba Hardwick is a 75-year-old dwarf who has lived in Luminia all her life. Her family has been living in the village for generations and she is very proud of her heritage. Marba works as a farrier at the Iron Hoof Guild, where she has been the boss for many years. She is known for her kindness and caring nature, always baking something delicious for her colleagues. Despite her age, Marba is still very active and enjoys working with horses. Her eyesight is not as strong as it used to be, but she compensates with her other senses. Marba lives with her family in a small house near the river, where she spends most of her free time gardening and reading.

family.relationship: loves her family, especially her grandchildren

Marba Hardwick.habits: Marba wakes up every day at sunrise and starts her morning by preparing breakfast for her family. She then heads to the Iron Hoof Guild, where she spends most of her day working with horses. In the evenings, Marba cooks dinner for her family and spends some time tending to her garden or reading. She likes to keep busy and enjoys being productive.
Marba Hardwick.history: Marba's family has lived in Luminia for generations and has always been involved in trade and commerce. Her ancestors were successful merchants who traded goods with other villages and towns across the land. Marba grew up hearing stories about her family's history and the importance of maintaining their legacy. As a young girl, Marba was particularly interested in learning about the scholarly traditions of Luminia and spent many hours reading books on history and culture. After completing her education, Marba joined the Iron Hoof Guild, where she discovered her love for working with horses. She quickly rose through the ranks and became the boss of the guild, using her knowledge of trade and commerce to make it prosperous.

job.description: A wise and nurturing dwarf who loves baking
job.quote: "I have the perfect shoe for your horse."
job.relations: Has a motherly relationship with apprentices, respected by other guild members.

Marba Hardwick.name: Marba
plot: Marba's family has been having some financial troubles lately due to the increasing competition from other traders. Marba is trying to come up with new ways to expand their business and ensure that their legacy continues.

Marba is worried about the Iron Hoof Guild's future as fewer and fewer young people are interested in becoming farriers. She is considering starting an apprenticeship program to train the next generation of farriers.

Recently, Marba has been having some health issues which have made it difficult for her to work as much as she used to. She is worried about how this may affect her family's income and is trying to find alternative solutions.

Marba's family has just received news that a distant relative has passed away, leaving them a significant inheritance. However, there are rumors that the inheritance may not be as straightforward as it seems and Marba is worried about the potential consequences.
Marba Hardwick.quote: "Oh dear, come sit down and have some cookies"

relationship.Enda Voyle: Enda is Marba's mother and they have a very special bond. Enda has always been a source of wisdom and guidance for Marba, and she cherishes every moment they spend together.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Erris is Marba's daughter and they have a very close relationship. Marba is very proud of Erris and her accomplishments as a mother and a businesswoman.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Garrett is Marba's father-in-law and they have a mutual respect for each other. Garrett doesn't talk much, but Marba knows that he always has valuable advice to offer when he does.
relationship.Thershaele Coralaeth: Marba is very fond of Thershaele, her young apprentice at the Iron Hoof Guild. She sees a lot of potential in her and enjoys teaching her everything she knows about working with horses.

Marba Hardwick.short_description: kind and caring, always baking something delicious

anecdotes: One time, Morna healed a fellow hunter's broken leg using only some herbs and a few incantations. The hunter was amazed by her skill and dubbed her 'the miracle worker'
Morna once took her grandchildren on a camping trip in the forest, where she taught them how to forage for food and build a fire from scratch. They still talk about that trip to this day

During a particularly harsh winter, Morna spent weeks traveling through the snow-covered forests, bringing food and supplies to families who were struggling to survive. Many people credit her with saving their lives.
Morna Atwood.clothes: Plain blue dress and white apron
Morna Atwood.description: Morna Atwood is a caring and wise woman who has lived in Luminia her entire life. She works as a hunter and healer for The Bison Runners, a company that specializes in hunting bison for their pelts. Despite her age, Morna is still extremely active and enjoys spending her days out in the wilderness. She is deeply respected by her colleagues and is known for her kind and nurturing nature, which has earned her the nickname 'Mother' among her co-workers. Morna is also a devoted grandmother and loves nothing more than spending time with her grandchildren.

family.relationship: Loving and supportive towards her grandchildren

Morna Atwood.habits: Morna has a very structured routine and begins each day with a cup of tea and a few minutes of quiet meditation. She then spends several hours in the forest hunting and gathering herbs for her healing practice. In the afternoons, Morna returns to the village to tend to her family and spend time with her grandchildren. She ends her day with a warm meal and a good book before heading to bed.
Morna Atwood.history: Morna comes from a long line of hunters and healers who have lived in Luminia for generations. Her family is deeply connected to the land and its ancient forests, and they take great pride in preserving and protecting the natural beauty of their home. Morna's mother, Enda Voyle, is one of the oldest members of the family and has passed down many of her teachings and practices to Morna. Despite her family's long history in Luminia, Morna is always eager to learn more about the world around her and often spends her evenings reading books on history, magic, and healing practices.

job.quote: "Take care of your body and it will take care of you"
job.relations: motherly towards everyone, especially Ennis
job.working_clothes: simple hunting clothes with medicinal pouches

Morna Atwood.name: Morna
plot: Morna has been secretly practicing forbidden magic for years, using it to heal some of the more difficult cases. However, the local authorities have recently caught wind of her practices and are threatening to arrest her.

Morna has been approached by a group of scholars who are interested in her healing techniques. They offer to pay her for her knowledge and even suggest that they could help her protect her secret from the authorities. However, Morna is hesitant to share her practices with outsiders and fears the repercussions of being associated with the scholars.

One of Morna's grandchildren has fallen ill with a mysterious ailment that no one in the village seems to be able to cure. Morna is determined to help her grandchild and sets out on a quest to find a rare herb that she believes holds the key to the cure.
Morna Atwood.quote: A mother's love knows no bounds

relationship.Bixler Voyle: Bixler is Morna's eldest grandson and is known for his adventurous spirit. Morna admires Bixler's courage but worries about his safety. She often gives him lectures on the importance of caution and preparation before heading out into the wilderness.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Enda is Morna's mother and is one of the oldest members of the family. Morna has a deep respect for her mother and often turns to her for guidance and advice. Enda has also passed down many of her healing practices to Morna.
relationship.Ennis Atwood: Ennis is Morna's grandson and also works as a hunter for The Bison Runners. Morna has always been extremely close to Ennis and sees a lot of herself in him. She enjoys spending time with him and often shares stories of her adventures in the wilderness.
relationship.Henna Mallory: Henna is also a senior hunter at The Bison Runners and is one of Morna's closest friends. They often go on hunting trips together and share a deep love for the wilderness and its mysteries.
relationship.Regan Rhinehart: Regan is a senior hunter at The Bison Runners and has worked alongside Morna for many years. They have a deep respect for each other and often share stories and advice about hunting and healing practices.

Morna Denby.description: Cheerful and imaginative, always looking for new friends and stories.

family.relationship: Adores her grandfather and looks up to her father.

job.relations: Eager to learn from Gum Rhinehart, respectful of the elder Renny Skarholt, sees Julian Rhinehart as a kind grandfatherly figure

Morna Denby.name: Morna
Morna Denby.secret: She has a secret friend who is an imaginary dragon.
Morna Denby.short_description: Cheerful and imaginative, always looking for new friends and stories.

anecdotes: Morna once fought a giant bear in the ancient forest and emerged victorious, earning her the respect of her fellow huntresses.
Morna befriended an old scholar from Luminia who taught her about the history of the region and the legends of the Old One.
Morna is known to sing songs around the campfire during long nights on the road, lifting the spirits of her team members.
Morna Halstead.clothes: brown leather hunting boots and green tunic with a brown belt
Morna Halstead.description: Morna Halstead is a daring and adventurous huntress who lives in the prosperous village of Luminia. She is one of the ten members of the Wandering Wayfarers, a group of nomads who travel around the region. Morna is known for her exceptional hunting skills and is responsible for providing food to her group for weeks. She cares deeply about her family and is a cousin in the Voyle family that resides in Luminia. Morna is an independent and resourceful young woman with short and spiky hair, green eyes, and a tanned skin complexion.

family.relationship: cares deeply about her family

Morna Halstead.habits: Morna is a skilled hunter and spends most of her time in the forests or mountains surrounding Luminia. She has a disciplined work ethic and is always looking for ways to improve her hunting skills. Morna is also a fan of adventure and enjoys exploring unknown areas. Her bubbly and talkative personality makes her a natural leader and organizer, helping her team to survive on the road.
Morna Halstead.history: Morna's family, the Voyle family, has been living in Luminia for generations. They are a proud native family who have seen the village grow and prosper over time. As a young girl, Morna learned how to hunt from her grandfather, Garrett Voyle, who was the family member she admired the most. Morna quickly became skilled at hunting, thanks to her exceptional abilities, agility, and knowledge of the terrain. Morna always dreamed of traveling around the world, exploring new territories, and finding new prey. When she was old enough, Morna joined the Wandering Wayfarers, a team of travelers who share her passion for adventure and exploration.

job.quote: "I never miss my target"
job.relations: sees Cammy as a close friend

Morna Halstead.name: Morna
plot: Morna's family is being threatened by a group of bandits who are planning to raid their village. Morna must find a way to protect her family and drive out the bandits.
While on a hunting trip, Morna discovers an ancient artifact that unlocks a mystery related to the forgotten event in local beliefs. Morna must solve the mystery before it falls into the wrong hands.
The Wandering Wayfarers come across a mysterious cult that worships a non-gendered God and is planning to perform a dangerous ritual. Morna must stop the cult and save her team from danger.
Morna Halstead.quote: "I can bring us food for weeks"

relationship.Alvy Kerrigan: An apprentice farmer who respects Morna's skills as a hunter but is sometimes intimidated by her daring nature.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Morna's uncle and a respected father figure to her. Morna looks up to Boren and admires his charisma and wisdom.
relationship.Cacey Mallory: A senior thief who is envious of Morna's skills and often tries to one-up her. Morna dislikes Cacey's deceitful nature and tries to avoid her whenever possible.
relationship.Cammy Grayden: An apprentice cook who is bubbly and talkative, like Morna. The two share a love for adventure and often trade stories around the campfire.
relationship.Durwin Hitch: A veteran blacksmith who is stern and no-nonsense but has a deep respect for Morna's skills. He often provides her with weapons and tools for hunting.
relationship.Erris Voyle: Morna's aunt and a caring and protective mother figure to her. Morna often turns to Erris for advice and guidance.
relationship.Fargas Mallory: An optimistic apprentice blacksmith who looks up to Morna and hopes to join her on one of her adventures someday.
relationship.Kelsey Mallory: A senior guard and adventurer who shares Morna's love for exploration. Morna and Kelsey often go on hunting trips together and have become close friends.

family.relationship: Close to her parents and grandparents
