anecdotes: Vidor once led a successful expedition into the ancient forest surrounding Luminia, discovering a new trade route that greatly benefited the village.
Despite his busy schedule, Vidor always finds time to share a story or two with his youngest daughter Derry.
Vidor Fenwick.clothes: sturdy leather armor and a cloak, adorned with trophies and relics
Vidor Fenwick.description: Vidor Fenwick is a 48-year-old native of Luminia. He is a natural leader who is fiercely dedicated to the safety and success of his family. Vidor works as a banker and boss at The Prosperity League, where he uses his determination and resourcefulness to ensure financial safety. Despite his competence, Vidor secretly struggles with alcoholism. He is a tall and muscular man, with light brown eyes and short and wild hair, usually kept in a ponytail. He wears sturdy leather armor and a cloak adorned with trophies and relics. Vidor has a long scar across his left cheek. He is respected by all in Luminia but is especially relied upon by his wife and children.

family.relationship: respected by all, but especially relied upon by his wife and children

Vidor Fenwick.habits: Vidor is a disciplined leader who follows a routine every day. He wakes up early, exercises, and begins his work at The Prosperity League. He highly values order and planning, and he is constantly thinking of ways to improve the financial safety of his family. Despite his alcoholism, Vidor attempts to keep it under control by limiting his intake when necessary.
Vidor Fenwick.hair: short and wild, usually kept in a ponytail
Vidor Fenwick.history: Vidor's family, which includes his grandfather Arland, his grandmother Lorna, his mother Devlin, and his youngest daughter Derry, have lived in Luminia for generations. The group is well-respected within the village and holds a strong belief in their non-gendered God. Vidor has always been a natural leader, and throughout his life, he has matured into a fierce protector of his kin. His work at The Prosperity League has provided his family with financial prosperity, which they have used to invest in the future of Luminia.

job.description: A natural leader who is fiercely dedicated to financial safety
job.quote: "Gold is a cruel master."
job.relations: Respected and admired by all members of the guild, seen as the backbone of the organization

Vidor Fenwick.name: Vidor
Vidor Fenwick.physical detail: a long scar across his left cheek
plot: Given Vidor's struggles with alcoholism, it is possible that this could eventually become an issue for his leadership and family. It is up to the other members of the living group to help him overcome this personal struggle before it causes any serious problems.
As a respected and wealthy member of Luminia, Vidor may be targeted by individuals seeking to steal from him. It is up to Vidor to ensure that his security measures are top-notch.

Vidor may be called upon to lead an important diplomatic mission on behalf of The Prosperity League. It is up to him to navigate the political intricacies while protecting the interests of his family and colleagues.

relationship.Arland Fenwick: Vidor has a deep respect for his wise and experienced grandfather Arland, who he turns to for guidance in times of uncertainty.
relationship.Derry Fenwick: Vidor loves his curious and adventurous youngest daughter Derry dearly, and often takes time out of his busy schedule to share stories with her.
relationship.Devlin Fenwick: Vidor's fiercely intelligent and driven mother Devlin supports his leadership and helps him manage the finances of The Prosperity League.
relationship.Lorna Fenwick: Vidor's relationship with his compassionate and nurturing grandmother Lorna is one based on mutual affection and support.

Vidor Fenwick.short_description: a natural leader who is fiercely dedicated to the safety and success of the group

anecdotes: Vinter once helped a group of adventurers navigate the treacherous mountain pass outside of Luminia. His knowledge of the area and his ability to read the natural signs saved the group from disaster.

Vinter was once approached by a wealthy merchant who offered him a large sum of money to reveal the location of a rare and valuable herb that only grows in the forest surrounding Luminia. Vinter politely declined, preferring to keep the knowledge of the herb within his family and his community.
Vinter Helstrom.description: Vinter Helstrom is an elderly man of 80 years old with a kind face and a gentle smile. He is well-known in the village of Luminia for his wise words and caring attitude towards others. Vinter was born and raised in the village and has lived there his whole life. He has never been interested in leaving, preferring the comfort and familiarity of his home. Vinter's days are spent tending bar at Helstrom's Hearth, a popular inn and gathering place in the village. He knows all the regulars by name and enjoys listening to their stories and sharing his own. In his free time, Vinter can often be found sitting by the river, lost in thought or spending time with his family.

family.relationship: Loves spending time with his family

Vinter Helstrom.habits: Vinter has a daily routine that he rarely deviates from. He wakes up early each morning and goes for a walk in the forest to clear his mind and get some exercise. He then spends the rest of the day working at Helstrom's Hearth, where he takes great care in preparing drinks and engaging in friendly conversation with the patrons. In the evenings, Vinter enjoys spending time with his family, telling stories of the past and imparting his wisdom to his grandchildren.
Vinter Helstrom.hair: Long white beard and balding head
Vinter Helstrom.history: Vinter comes from a long line of natives who have lived in the Luminia area for generations. His ancestors were some of the first settlers in the village and helped establish it as a prosperous center of trade and commerce. Vinter has always been proud of his heritage and has made it his life's work to preserve the traditions and beliefs of his people. He is deeply connected to the land and the forest that surrounds the village, and often reflects on the role his ancestors played in shaping the community. Vinter has seen many changes in Luminia over the years, including the rise and fall of empires and the arrival of outsiders who have brought with them new beliefs and customs. Through it all, he has remained true to his roots and his commitment to his family and his village.

job.description: Wise and caring patriarch who knows all the regulars
job.quote: "A good drink and good company are all you need."
job.relations: Bailey's father; Muriel's grandfather; mentor to Alain; Derry's great-grandfather

Vinter Helstrom.name: Vinter
plot: Vinter discovers a forgotten artifact in the forest that sheds new light on the history of his people. He must decide whether to share this knowledge with the outside world or keep it a secret.
A group of outsiders arrive in Luminia and begin to challenge the beliefs and customs of the natives. Vinter must decide whether to stand up for his traditions or embrace the new ways.

One of Vinter's children becomes involved in a dangerous plot that threatens the safety of the village. Vinter must navigate the delicate balance between loyalty to his family and his duty to his community.
Vinter Helstrom.quote: You cannot buy respect, you must earn it

relationship.Alain Helstrom: Vinter appreciates Alain's creative approach to cooking and often asks him to prepare special dishes for his family.
relationship.Arias Voyle: Vinter sees a bit of himself in Arias and admires his energy and thirst for adventure.
relationship.Bailey Helstrom: Vinter has a close working relationship with Bailey, who manages Helstrom's Hearth. He trusts her implicitly and relies on her to keep the business running smoothly.
relationship.Bixler Voyle: Vinter admires Bixler's adventurous spirit and enjoys hearing about his travels and experiences.
relationship.Boren Voyle: Vinter considers Boren a close friend and confidant and values his advice on matters concerning the village.
relationship.Derry Helstrom: Vinter sees a bit of himself in Derry and enjoys talking to him about his own experiences growing up in Luminia.
relationship.Enda Voyle: Vinter has a deep love and respect for his grandmother and seeks her advice on matters of family and tradition.
relationship.Erris Voyle: As an elder himself, Vinter has a deep respect for Erris and enjoys listening to her stories and wisdom.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: Vinter enjoys spending time with his grandfather and learning from his years of experience and wisdom.
relationship.Jordan Raelthorne: Although Vinter doesn't interact with Jordan often, he respects her position as one of the leaders of the caravaneers and values the work they do for the village.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Although Vinter is sometimes frustrated by Kearey's rebellious streak, he recognizes her potential as a scholar and encourages her to pursue her dreams.
relationship.Muriel Helstrom: Vinter enjoys teaching Muriel about the art of bartending and takes pride in watching her develop her skills.

Vinter Helstrom.secret: He is secretly writing his memoirs

anecdotes: Vora once saved the life of a fellow guild member who was being attacked by a rival gang. She managed to take down three of them on her own before the rest of their group retreated.

Vora is known for her impeccable memory and attention to detail, and she once uncovered a significant security breach in the guild's operations by recalling a conversation she had overheard weeks prior.
Vora Murdoch.description: Vora Murdoch is a 40-year-old female human who lives in Luminia and works as a strategist for the Cloaks of Coercion, a guild of bandits. She is a natural leader and the head of her family group, which is made up of several other long-time members of the town. Vora is level-headed and practical, and she takes her role in the guild and her family seriously. She is respected by fellow members and typically makes decisions that prioritize the safety and success of the group. Despite their criminal activities, Vora and her group are quite invested in Luminia's wellbeing and protection.

family.relationship: motherly towards the other members, protective of her family members

Vora Murdoch.habits: Vora has developed a habit of carrying a small notebook with her at all times, where she documents everything she observes and hears, especially during meetings with other guild leaders or potential clients. She also makes a point to check on the rest of her family group regularly, both to ensure they are safe and to keep tabs on their morale and any personal issues they may be facing.
Vora Murdoch.history: Vora grew up as an outsider in Luminia, but she quickly found a place among those who accepted her into their fold. Over time, she became more invested in the town's prosperity and safety, and eventually joined the Cloaks of Coercion to help protect it from the inside out. Vora quickly worked her way up the ranks, impressing those around her with her strategic mind and levelheadedness. Today, she is one of the most respected members of the guild and one of the longest-standing members of her family group.

job.description: Level-headed and practical, a natural leader
job.quote: "We need to strike hard and fast if we want to succeed."
job.relations: As the boss, she keeps the others in line and always has a plan in case things go wrong. Kind but firm with her subordinates. Considers Ansel a little brother and appreciates Tahlumillean's knowledge of the river.

Vora Murdoch.name: Vora
plot: Vora finds out that a senior member of the Cloaks of Coercion is secretly plotting against her and her family group. She must decide whether to confront them head-on or try to find a more diplomatic solution.

Vora discovers information about a potentially lucrative heist that could greatly benefit the guild. However, the job poses a significant risk, and Vora must weigh the potential rewards against the chance of getting caught.

A new member joins Vora's family group, but they struggle to assimilate into the dynamic. Vora must act as a mediator and try to bring the new member up to speed while keeping the group's morale high.

Vora's past as an outsider comes back to haunt her when a group of local bullies target her and her family group. Vora must find a way to protect both her physical safety and her reputation within the guild.

relationship.Ansel Atwood: As an apprentice lookout, Ansel is one of the newer members of the Cloaks of Coercion. Vora has taken him under her wing, recognizing his potential as a talented and disciplined member of the group. Vora sees a lot of herself in Ansel and hopes to help him develop into a leader like herself.
relationship.Bryson Bannister: As one of the grumpier members of Vora's family group, Bryson often clashes with Vora over issues related to guild operations. Despite their disagreements, Vora respects Bryson's dedication to the group and his strong work ethic. She admires his honesty and integrity, and she sees him as a valuable voice of reason in many discussions and decisions related to the Cloaks of Coercion.
relationship.Cammy Grayden: Cammy and Vora have known each other for years, having grown up together in Luminia. While Cammy is not a member of the Cloaks of Coercion, she is deeply invested in the success and wellbeing of Vora's family group. Vora sees Cammy as a source of moral support and often confides in her about personal matters that affect the guild and her family group.
relationship.Delp Scarrow: Vora has mixed feelings about Delp, who is known for his rash impulsiveness and quick temper. While she recognizes his value as a fierce defender of the group, Vora often finds herself at odds with Delp over issues related to safety and strategy. Vora worries that Delp's hot-headedness could put the group in danger, but she also sees his loyalty as a valuable asset to the guild.
relationship.Dunla Baskin: Vora looks up to Dunla as a source of knowledge and expertise on a wide range of topics. Dunla's encyclopedic knowledge of Luminia's history and local beliefs has often proved invaluable to the Cloaks of Coercion, and Vora often consults with her when planning strategic moves for the guild.
relationship.Durwin Hitch: As the leader of Vora's family group, Durwin and Vora have a close working relationship. Vora often seeks Durwin's counsel and advice in strategic matters, and the two share a deep understanding of the inner workings of the Cloaks of Coercion. Vora greatly admires Durwin's experience and discipline, and she looks up to him as a father figure in many ways.
relationship.Gamack Domack: As the oldest member of the Cloaks of Coercion, Gamack is revered for his wisdom and his extensive knowledge of the town's history and local beliefs. Vora greatly respects Gamack and often seeks his advice on matters related to the guild's legacy and reputation. Gamack sees a lot of potential in Vora and has taken on a mentorship role in her life, encouraging her to continue developing her leadership skills.
relationship.Stephan Silverwood: Vora has a tense and often contentious relationship with Stephan, who is known for his ruthless and violent tendencies. While Vora recognizes the value of having an enforcer on the team, she often finds herself at odds with Stephan over issues related to the safety and wellbeing of their fellow members. Despite their disagreements, the two harbor a grudging respect for one another's skills and dedication to the guild.
relationship.Tahlumillean Coralaeth: Vora has worked with Tahlumillean on several river raids in the past, and the two have developed a mutually respectful working relationship. Vora appreciates his expertise and experience on the water and often seeks his advice on tactical matters related to river-based missions.

Vora Murdoch.secret: she is related to another member
Vora Murdoch.short_description: level-headed and practical, a natural leader

Waldron Ellsworth.description: Sullen and defensive, he struggles to fit in with the group

family.relationship: admires Conor's enthusiasm, resents Elspeth's kindness, envies Torey's confidence

job.description: Sullen and defensive, he struggles to fit in with the group
job.quote: "There's always a way to make it work."
job.relations: distant from other members
job.working_clothes: heavy apron with tool pockets - dark greys and browns

Waldron Ellsworth.name: Waldron
Waldron Ellsworth.secret: He is secretly in love with Torey
Waldron Ellsworth.short_description: Sullen and defensive, he struggles to fit in with the group

anecdotes: Once, a young apprentice at The Timbermen Guild challenged Wolfe to a wood-chopping contest. Needless to say, Wolfe won by a landslide.
Wolfe once caught his oldest son sneaking out of the house late at night. Instead of scolding him, Wolfe took him out to the forest and taught him survival skills.
Wolfe Atwood.description: Wolfe Atwood is a 51 year old lumberjack living in the village of Luminia. He is a native of the village and has worked for The Timbermen Guild for most of his life. Wolfe is protective and stern, particularly when it comes to his family. He has a thick beard and short, grey hair. Wolfe's scar on his right forearm is a constant reminder of a past event that he prefers not to talk about. Despite his gruff exterior, Wolfe is loved and respected by his children.

family.relationship: Loved and respected by his children

Wolfe Atwood.habits: Wolfe is a creature of habit. He wakes up early every day to chop wood and does not stop until the job is done. In the evenings, he spends time with his family and enjoys a glass of ale. On weekends, Wolfe likes to explore the nearby ancient forest and river. He is not one for frivolous activities and believes in hard work and responsibility.
Wolfe Atwood.hair: Short and grey hair with a thick beard
Wolfe Atwood.history: Wolfe comes from a long line of lumberjacks and it is a profession that runs in the family. His father and grandfather were both members of The Timbermen Guild. Wolfe married his childhood sweetheart and together they have four children. Wolfe's secret is that he killed a man in self-defense when he was younger, an event that continues to haunt him to this day. However, he uses his experiences to teach his children about responsibility and the importance of protecting their loved ones.

job.quote: "Stay focused or you'll lose a limb"
job.relations: close friend to Brone

Wolfe Atwood.name: Wolfe
plot: Wolfe's past may come back to haunt him when a stranger comes to Luminia looking for revenge.
Wolfe's eldest child goes missing in the ancient forest and he must rally the village to find them.
The Timbermen Guild is struggling and Wolfe must decide whether to stay loyal to the guild or join a new cooperative that offers better pay and benefits.
Wolfe discovers a family secret that shakes the foundation of his beliefs and must confront his own biases and prejudices.
Wolfe Atwood.quote: I'd lay down my life for my family

relationship.Ansel Atwood: Wolfe is proud of his son and respects his dutiful and strict nature. They have a good father-son relationship.
relationship.Bailey Atwood: Wolfe's great-grandmother is sharp-tongued and witty, and they share a love of storytelling.
relationship.Brone Langworth: Wolfe respects Brone's quiet determination and follows his lead at The Timbermen Guild.
relationship.Bryson Villius: Wolfe admires Bryson's wisdom and reliability, and looks up to him as a mentor.
relationship.Cecily Atwood: Wolfe's youngest daughter is kind-hearted and sensitive, and he is fiercely protective of her.
relationship.Dowd Langworth: Wolfe has a professional relationship with Dowd and respects his ambition and hard work.
relationship.Dunla Villius: Wolfe appreciates Dunla's gentle and wise nature and often seeks her advice.
relationship.Gale Atwood: Wolfe's sister is sassy and confident, and they have a playful sibling dynamic.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: Wolfe sees potential in Kearey's rebellious nature and encourages her to pursue her dreams of becoming a scholar.
relationship.Kelsey Atwood: Wolfe's cousin is resourceful and independent, and they have a respectful professional relationship at The Timbermen Guild.
relationship.Malek Langworth: Wolfe worries about Malek's impulsiveness but sees potential in the young boy.
relationship.Morna Atwood: Wolfe loves and respects his grandmother, who is wise and caring. She is a constant source of comfort for him.
relationship.Orla Atwood: Wolfe's daughter is artistic and dreamy, traits that he admires but sometimes struggles to understand.
relationship.Orla Langworth: Wolfe finds Orla's curiosity and playfulness refreshing, and enjoys teaching her new skills at The Timbermen Guild.
relationship.Shay Langworth: Wolfe respects Shay's hard work and nurturing nature, and they have a good working relationship.
relationship.Stianna Atwood: Wolfe's great-granddaughter is mischievous and energetic, and he enjoys spending time with her.
relationship.Wyatt Langworth: Wolfe finds Wyatt's bashfulness endearing and enjoys teaching him new skills at The Timbermen Guild.

Wolfe Atwood.secret: He killed a man in self-defense when he was younger

Wren Barrington.clothes: brown leather vest, green tunic, black trousers
Wren Barrington.description: Lively and courageous, always eager to prove herself

family.relationship: Close to her family, curious about the world.

job.quote: \"I'm going to make something legendary!\"
job.relations: curious and eager to work with other blacksmiths
job.workplace: The Devout of the Non-Gendered God

Wren Barrington.name: Wren
Wren Barrington.secret: She dreams of becoming an adventurer.

Wren Mosley.description: Young and curious, eager to learn

family.relationship: close with family

job.quote: \"I wonder what secrets the world holds\"
job.relations: eager to learn from any member

Wren Mosley.name: Wren
Wren Mosley.short_description: Young and curious, eager to learn

Wyatt Langworth.description: bashful but eager to please teenager

family.relationship: looks up to his elders in the family

job.description: bashful but eager to please teenager
job.quote: "I'm here to learn as much as I can!"
job.relations: brother to Malek and nephew to Dowd

Wyatt Langworth.name: Wyatt
Wyatt Langworth.short_description: bashful but eager to please teenager

family.relationship: Leader of the group

Wyatt Pendrake.hair: short and clean, salt and pepper hair

Wyatt Pendrake.secret: He lost an eye in combat

anecdotes: Wynnie once settled a dispute between two rival guilds with her diplomatic skills.
She once discovered an ancient artifact while exploring the forest and donated it to the local scholars.
Wyn'Talyththi is known for her exquisite taste in fashion and often designs her own dresses.
wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.description: wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth is a respected and admired member of the Shoemakers Guild in Luminia. She is a beautiful and intelligent elf woman with good taste who runs The Sole Savers, a small but prosperous shoemaking business in the village. Wynnie, as she is affectionately called by her friends and family, is known for her diplomatic skills and is often called upon to settle disputes within the village. She has a close relationship with her family, particularly her mother Erris Voyle who she looks up to as a role model. In her free time, wyn'Talyththi enjoys exploring the ancient forest that surrounds Luminia and studying the local beliefs and mythology.

family.relationship: Respected by her family, admired by the village.

wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.habits: Wyn'Talyththi is a disciplined individual who values punctuality and organization. She starts her day early by taking a walk in the forest to clear her mind before heading to work at The Sole Savers. She takes pride in her appearance and always dresses elegantly in flowy blue dresses and silver jewelry. Wynnie also enjoys cooking and often invites her colleagues and friends over for dinner parties.
wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.history: Wyn'Talyththi was born and raised in Luminia as the eldest daughter of the Voyle family. Growing up, she was always fascinated by the stories of the Old One and the unique continent they lived on. As a child, she spent hours listening to her grandmother Enda's tales of the Forgotten Event and dreaming of one day uncovering the mysteries that surrounded their village. When she turned 18, wyn'Talyththi joined The Sole Savers as an apprentice and quickly rose through the ranks to become the boss of the shoemaking business. She has since expanded the business and is constantly looking for new opportunities to learn and grow as a prominent member of Luminia's community.

job.description: A beautiful and intelligent woman with good taste.
job.quote: "Good shoes should be worn with pride."
job.relations: Mentors Durgan, appreciates his enthusiasm
job.working_clothes: elegant dress with an embroidered leather apron

wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.name: wyn'Talyththi
plot: Wyn'Talyththi's business has been flourishing, but she wants to expand it even further. She is considering opening up a second shop in a neighboring village, but she needs to convince her colleagues and family that it's a good idea.

While exploring the forest, wyn'Talyththi stumbles upon a hidden cave that contains a clue to the village's forgotten past. She sets out on a quest to uncover the truth behind the mysteries that surround their community.
One of her colleagues at The Sole Savers is secretly sabotaging the business. Wyn'Talyththi must figure out who it is before it's too late and their livelihood is destroyed.

relationship.Bixler Voyle: As the eldest son of the family, Bixler is protective of his sister wyn'Talyththi and often helps her out at The Sole Savers. They share a love for adventure and often go on hikes in the forest together.
relationship.Boren Voyle: wyn'Talyththi's father Boren is a respected figure in the village, and she values his opinion greatly. He is always there to offer advice and support when needed.
relationship.Durgan Vain: As an apprentice at The Sole Savers, Durgan looks up to wyn'Talyththi as a boss and mentor. She often goes out of her way to provide him with opportunities to learn and grow as a shoemaker.
relationship.Enda Voyle: wyn'Talyththi's grandmother Enda is a wise old woman with vast life experience. She has taught wyn'Talyththi much about the history and mythology of Luminia, and she continues to be a source of inspiration for her.
relationship.Erris Voyle: wyn'Talyththi has a close relationship with her mother Erris, who she looks up to as a role model. They often have long conversations about the history and mythology of Luminia.
relationship.Garrett Voyle: wyn'Talyththi's grandfather Garrett is a quiet and reserved man, but she has always respected his wisdom and observations. He provides a different perspective on the world that she finds valuable.
relationship.Kearey Voyle: wyn'Talyththi's younger sister Kearey is rebellious and headstrong, but they share a close bond. Despite their differences, wyn'Talyththi supports Kearey's dreams of becoming a scholar.

wyn'Talyththi Coralaeth.short_description: A beautiful and intelligent woman with good taste.

Ancestral Sanctuary.anecdotes: Legend has it that the founder of the Ancestral Sanctuary, a famous adventurer, brought back a strange plant from his travels. It turned out to be a powerful medicinal herb that has since become an important part of the group's healing practices.. During a particularly harsh winter, when food was scarce, the members of the Ancestral Sanctuary distributed their own supplies among the villagers and refused to accept any compensation for it. It is said that this act of generosity earned them the respect and gratitude of the entire village.. The Ancestral Sanctuary once hosted a visiting scholar who claimed to have discovered a lost scripture that could reveal the true nature of the non-gendered God. The group listened intently and engaged in spirited debates about its authenticity before ultimately deciding that it was a forgery.
Ancestral Sanctuary.customs: Members of the Ancestral Sanctuary practice several customs that are deeply rooted in their belief system. They have a special ritual to welcome the new moon each month, during which they prepare a feast for the spirits of the forest. They also honor their ancestors by making offerings of food and drink on special occasions such as the annual festival of lights. Additionally, they perform daily prayers at sunrise and sunset at the shrine to the non-gendered God.
Ancestral Sanctuary.desc: The Ancestral Sanctuary is a group of dedicated individuals who have devoted their lives to the study of spirituality and the divinity of the non-gendered God. They believe in the power of faith and ancestry, which they see as key components to maintaining balance with nature. Their main focus is the veneration of their ancestors through regular offerings and prayers at their shrine. The members of the group are highly respected by the people of Luminia, who often seek their guidance and blessings in times of need.
Ancestral Sanctuary.history: Founded centuries ago by a group of scholars and adventurers who were fascinated by the unique continent they had discovered, the Ancestral Sanctuary has become an integral part of Luminia's culture and history. Over time, the group has survived several natural disasters and repelled a bandit invasion three decades ago. They discovered a hidden chamber in the ruins containing ancient texts, which they have preserved to this day. The group grew in numbers and influence, establishing its own temple on the outskirts of the village.
Ancestral Sanctuary.name: Ancestral Sanctuary
Ancestral Sanctuary.plot: A mysterious illness has befallen the village, and the members of the Ancestral Sanctuary are the only ones who can find a cure. They must undertake a perilous journey into the mountains to collect rare herbs and interact with the spirits of the forest.. A neighboring kingdom has accused the Ancestral Sanctuary of harboring rebels and has sent a delegation to investigate. The group must prove their innocence and defend their right to practice their beliefs.. One of the members of the group has uncovered a shocking secret about the forgotten event that could change everything they know about their own history. They must navigate political intrigue and betrayal as they try to uncover the truth.. The annual festival of lights is coming up, but there is a sense of unease among the members of the Ancestral Sanctuary. They have received a vision that something terrible will happen during the celebrations, and they must try to prevent it using their spiritual powers.
Ancestral Sanctuary.relationship: The Ancestral Sanctuary is highly regarded by the people of Luminia. They provide spiritual guidance and comfort to those who seek it. The group maintains friendly relations with the nearby tribe of forest-dwelling elves and often exchanges knowledge about the natural world. They have occasional conflicts with a nearby kingdom over border disputes but have managed to resolve them peacefully so far. The Sanctuary also faces sporadic raids by goblin bands from the mountains but are aided by wandering druids who pass through Luminia from time to time.

architecture: surrounded by a garden of herbs and flowers
hut of the herbalist.details: a cozy hut filled with the fragrant aromas of herbs and teas

shrine.details: a modest shrine nestled in the forest

temple.details: a grand temple dedicated to the divinity of nature

the elder's house.details: a stone house with a thatched roof, overlooking a tranquil garden

the meadow.details: a clearing in the forest illuminated by the soft light of lanterns

the riverbank.details: a peaceful spot along the river with a soft sandy bank

Arrow's Defense.anecdotes: During a particularly intense defense operation, the archers of Arrow's Defense ran out of arrows. Thinking on her feet, Cara Mallory used her scouting skills to retrieve enough wood to make more arrows, saving the day.. Rowan Villius once took down a goblin horde with a single arrow, earning her the nickname 'One Shot' among her fellow rangers.. Colm Dromore is known for his clever traps and devices that have thwarted many an enemy attack. One of his most famous traps involves a bucket of honey and some strategically placed logs.
Arrow's Defense.customs: The members of Arrow's Defense hold great respect for nature and its inhabitants. They believe in living in harmony with the environment and always seek guidance from the spirits of the forest. As a custom, they celebrate each successful defense operation with a grand feast, where members share stories of their previous encounters and strategize on how to improve their teamwork.
Arrow's Defense.desc: Arrow's Defense are a group of brave and skilled individuals who have taken the responsibility of protecting Luminia from all sorts of dangers. Their primary weapon is the bow and arrow, and they are well known for their excellent marksmanship and their expertise in setting up traps to fend off their foes. The group consists of archers, guards, trappers, scouts and apprentices, working together to ensure the safety of the village.
Arrow's Defense.history: Arrow's Defense were originally a group of adventurers who came together to protect the village from the frequent goblin raids that plagued the region. Over time, they developed a close bond with the villagers and established themselves as the protectors of Luminia. Though they have faced many challenges over the years, they have never faltered in their duty and continue to serve the village to this day.
Arrow's Defense.name: Arrow's Defense
Arrow's Defense.plot: A group of rogue bandits have been plaguing the trade routes of Luminia, and the rangers must work together to bring them to justice.. An ancient evil has awoken in the forest, and the rangers are the only ones who can stop it.. A new member has joined the rangers, but there is something suspicious about their past. The rangers must uncover their secrets before it's too late.
Arrow's Defense.relationship: Arrow's Defense have a strong and amiable relationship with the villagers of Luminia. They are held in high regard by the people who trust them implicitly in matters of security. They collaborate with the village council to develop strategies to counter any threats that may arise, and they work closely with the marketplace traders to help expand the trade network of Luminia.

Arrow's Defense' outpost.details: A collection of wooden cabins surrounded by a training field and an archery range.

Defensive wall.details: A towering wall made of thick stone with turrets and guard posts. It has mirrored windows and a drawbridge

The Marketplace.details: A bustling marketplace with colorful stalls and canopies selling aromatic spices, handmade pottery and jewelry.

timeline: Assisting neighboring village during a wolf invasion

Blackwood's Underground Syndicate.anecdotes: Delaney once successfully stole a priceless artifact from a museum in a nearby city that had been thought to be impossible to steal. Mara is known for her cat-like agility, which has saved her from many close calls with authorities. Nuila, despite her disfigurement, is highly skilled at blending in with crowds and gathering information. Ashlan once distracted an entire group of guards with her chatter while the others made off with the loot.
Blackwood's Underground Syndicate.customs: The members of Blackwood's Underground Syndicate have a strict code of conduct that includes never stealing from anyone who can't afford it and always keeping the peace within the group. They celebrate their successful heists with a round of honey mead at the inn and pay homage to the Old One with a small offering before embarking on each mission.
Blackwood's Underground Syndicate.desc: The Blackwood family has been a part of Luminia for generations, but the latest heir, Delaney, has turned to a life of thievery. She believes she has a calling from the Old One to use her skills for a greater good. Along with her fellow thieves, Mara, Nuila, and Ashlan, she runs a highly organized underground syndicate that specializes in stealing from the rich to give to the poor. Their fence, Jurg Blackitt, helps them sell their stolen goods on the black market.
Blackwood's Underground Syndicate.history: The Blackwood family has a long history of scholarly pursuits and intellectual endeavors, but Delaney was always more interested in the practical application of knowledge. After several encounters with corrupt officials and greedy nobles, she decided to turn her talents to thievery as a way to right the wrongs of society. With the help of Mara, Nuila, Ashlan, and Jurg, she built up their underground syndicate into a formidable force.
Blackwood's Underground Syndicate.name: Blackwood's Underground Syndicate
Blackwood's Underground Syndicate.plot: The group discovers a plot by a wealthy noble to stage a coup and take over the village. They must decide whether to intervene or let things play out.. The authorities finally catch up to them and offer them a chance to turn informant in exchange for reduced sentences.. While on a heist, they stumble upon a clue to a larger mystery involving the Old One and must navigate treacherous political waters to uncover the truth.
Blackwood's Underground Syndicate.relationship: The members of Blackwood's Underground Syndicate operate mostly in secret, but their efforts to redistribute wealth have not gone unnoticed by the people of Luminia. While some villagers condemn their actions, others quietly support them and even provide them with information and supplies. The local authorities are aware of their activities, but have not been able to catch them in the act.

Blackwood's Underground Syndicate.details: an underground cavern with rough-hewn stone walls and a low ceiling, filled with stolen goods and weapons.

Jurg's Shop.details: a small, cluttered shop crammed with shelves of oddities and antiques, hidden behind a thatched roof and wooden walls.

timeline: The group's first encounter with Jurg
A failed mission that resulted in Ashlan being captured by the authorities
The discovery of a corrupt official's stash of stolen goods

Cloaks of Coercion.anecdotes: The time Tahlumillean saved Ansel's life by expertly navigating a treacherous river, cementing their trust and friendship. When Vora talked the group out of an ill-advised attack on a wealthy caravan, proving her strategic skill. The day the Cloaks of Coercion almost fell apart when Ansel was caught by the city guard and offered a deal to betray his companions
Cloaks of Coercion.customs: The Cloaks of Coercion follow a strict code of conduct that includes never stealing from locals, sharing their spoils equally, and always sticking together no matter what. They also have an annual ceremony where they burn any stolen goods they haven't sold, believing it will cleanse them of any ill-gotten gains.
Cloaks of Coercion.desc: The Cloaks of Coercion are a small group of bandits that operate in the shadows of Luminia's protective walls. With only three members, they rely on their individual strengths and a shared mission to survive in a world where they are despised and hunted by all.
Cloaks of Coercion.history: The Cloaks of Coercion were formed when Tahlumillean Coralaeth, Ansel Atwood, and Vora Murdoch found themselves jobless and homeless at the same time. Desperate, they turned to a life of crime and quickly became one of the most notorious groups in the region.
Cloaks of Coercion.name: Cloaks of Coercion
Cloaks of Coercion.plot: As the Cloaks of Coercion become more desperate for funds to survive, they start taking increasingly dangerous jobs that put them in direct opposition with powerful enemies.. The group discovers a map that leads to a legendary treasure hidden deep in the mountains. But getting there will require the assistance of Luminia's most powerful druid.. A wealthy merchant offers the Cloaks of Coercion a deal: rob his main competitor and he will provide them with steady employment and even help them legitimize their business.
Cloaks of Coercion.relationship: The Cloaks of Coercion have a tense relationship with the people of Luminia, who see them as a blight on their prosperous community.

Abandoned Mine.details: an abandoned mine with long forgotten treasures

Riverside Camp.details: a temporary camp hidden among the trees by the river

Warehouse Hideaway.details: a secret hideout under the city

Clothier's Collective.anecdotes: Malek Helwick once saved the life of a young weaver who had fallen into the river while attempting to retrieve some dropped thread. Canice Ironside is known for her ability to spin even the finest of threads, earning her the nickname 'The Spider'. Evelyn Helwick once donated a year's worth of profits from her weaving to help fund the construction of a new village well.
Clothier's Collective.customs: As a group, the Clothier's Collective places great value on tradition and family. Many of the members come from long lines of weavers and learned their craft from their parents or grandparents. They also believe in giving back to the community and regularly donate textiles and clothing to those in need. Finally, they hold an annual fashion show to showcase their latest designs and celebrate their achievements.
Clothier's Collective.desc: The Clothier's Collective is a group of master weavers who specialize in creating high-quality fabrics and clothing. They work together to share techniques, materials, and knowledge, striving to perfect their craft and reach new heights of creativity.
Clothier's Collective.history: The Clothier's Collective was founded by a group of weavers who were dissatisfied with the lack of support for their craft in the wider community. They pooled their resources and knowledge to create a space where they could work together and share ideas. Over time, the group grew in size and reputation, attracting talented weavers from all over the region.
Clothier's Collective.name: Clothier's Collective
Clothier's Collective.plot: A rival weaver's guild attempts to steal the secrets of the Clothier's Collective's signature fabric.. The Clothier's Collective discovers an ancient loom in the ruins of the forest and must determine how to use it to create a new type of textile.. Malek Helwick is accused of stealing a valuable bolt of fabric from a customer, and must clear his name before the reputation of the entire group is tarnished.
Clothier's Collective.relationship: The Clothier's Collective has deep roots in Luminia and is an integral part of the village's economy and culture. The group's members produce fine textiles and clothing for sale in the local marketplace, as well as for trade with other villages and towns in the region. They also provide apprenticeships and training to young weavers, passing on their skills and expertise to the next generation.

Evelyn's Studio.details: a cozy little room with thatched roofing and a bright window

the Cloth Market.details: a bustling market with colorful tents and stalls, set on cobblestone streets

the Weavers' Guildhall.details: a grand building with towering stone walls and ornately carved wooden balconies

timeline: discovery of a new dyeing technique
participation in a regional craft fair
successful completion of a large commission

Council of Wisdom.anecdotes: One year, the Council of Wisdom surprised the villagers by preparing a feast themselves, cooking up the finest cuisine in town. Another time, when the river flooded and swept away several villagers' homes, the council rallied the community together to rebuild and support those affected. Once, a heated debate broke out during a council meeting, causing one member to storm out, only to return later with a new perspective and a solution to the problem.
Council of Wisdom.customs: The Council of Wisdom convenes every new moon to review the village's affairs and plan for the future. They also hold an annual banquet where they honor and recognize outstanding citizens who have contributed to the betterment of the community.
Council of Wisdom.desc: The Council of Wisdom is a group of experienced and trusted individuals who provide counsel and administration for the village of Luminia. Their collective knowledge, insight, and leadership steer the village towards prosperity and ensure justice and order are maintained.
Council of Wisdom.history: The Council of Wisdom was established shortly after Luminia's founding by a group of elders who saw the need for a centralized authority to govern the village. Over time, their council grew in size and diversified in experience, becoming the community's primary decision-making body.
Council of Wisdom.name: Council of Wisdom
Council of Wisdom.plot: The Council of Wisdom discovers an illegal smuggling operation within the village and must navigate a web of deceit and corruption to bring the perpetrators to justice. Meanwhile, tensions mount as nearby kingdoms eye Luminia's resources with envy, and goblin raids increase in frequency and ferocity. Will the council be able to navigate these challenges and ensure the safety and prosperity of the villagers?
Council of Wisdom.relationship: The Council of Wisdom enjoys a strong bond with the people of Luminia, who trust and rely on them for guidance and support. However, their relationship with neighboring kingdoms and goblin bands is sometimes fraught with tension and conflict.

The Banquet Hall.details: a grand hall where the Elders' Council holds feasts and celebrations for the community

The Bison Runners's Office.details: a cramped office filled with stacks of paperwork and documents for the Great Bison Company, the largest trade partner of Luminia

The Council Room.details: a spacious and elegant chamber where the Elders' Council meets to discuss matters of importance

The Messenger's Hut.details: a cozy hut where the messenger of Luminia lives and works, sending and receiving messages from neighboring villages and towns

timeline: Establishment of the Council of Wisdom
Implementation of the new moon review process
Great Bison Company establishes itself in Luminia

Deepmine Guild.anecdotes: Legend has it that one of the founding members of the Deepmine Guild, a dwarf named Balin, once fought off an entire pack of wolves single-handedly to protect a shipment of ore. The guild still honors his memory to this day. Another member, a gregarious dwarf named Gimli, is known for his love of song and his ability to lift the spirits of his fellow miners during long days spent underground. Lastly, an eccentric dwarven inventor named Hrothgar once built a machine that could dig tunnels twice as fast as any pickaxe-wielding miner, but it ultimately proved to be too unstable and was abandoned.
Deepmine Guild.customs: The members of the Deepmine Guild are known for their strict adherence to safety protocols and their meticulous attention to detail when it comes to mining techniques. They hold a monthly meeting where they discuss new discoveries and plan their next excavation.
Deepmine Guild.desc: The Deepmine Guild is a group of skilled dwarven prospectors who have made it their life's work to mine and extract precious ores from the deep caverns and tunnels beneath Luminia.
Deepmine Guild.history: The Deepmine Guild was first formed over two centuries ago by a group of hardy dwarven miners who sought to make a living from the rich veins of ore that lay hidden beneath the earth's surface. Over time, the guild has grown in size and reputation and has become one of the most well-respected mining groups in the entire region.
Deepmine Guild.name: Deepmine Guild
Deepmine Guild.plot: The Deepmine Guild has discovered a valuable new vein of ore, but a rival mining group seeks to claim it for themselves. The players are hired to protect the guild's interests and ensure that the rival group is kept at bay.. One of the members of the guild has gone missing while on a scouting mission deep in the tunnels beneath Luminia. The players are hired to find them and bring them back safely.. A series of strange accidents have been occurring within the guild's mines. The players are hired to investigate and discover the cause before it's too late.
Deepmine Guild.relationship: The Deepmine Guild has a strong relationship with the people of Luminia who depend on them for the valuable resources they extract from the earth. The villagers often trade goods and services with the guild members and there is a deep respect between the two groups.

architecture: decorated with mining tools and ore samples
The Deepmine Guild Headquarters.details: a bustling workplace where dwarf prospectors gather to discuss their findings and plan their next expeditions.

architecture: hot, smoky room filled with furnaces
anvils ringing with the sound of metal being shaped and honed
walls covered in soot and ash
The Forge.details: a bustling blacksmith's forge where dwarven craftsmen shape the raw ore extracted from the mines into useful objects

architecture: surrounded by scaffolding and mining equipment
carved steps leading down into the pit
flanked by lanterns to provide light
a small hut nearby for workers to rest
The Great Pit.details: a deep mine where dwarven prospectors dig for valuable ore, surrounded by scaffolding and echoing with the sound of pickaxes striking rock

timeline: discovery of a new vein of ore
successful negotiation of a trade deal with a neighboring village
annual celebration of successful mining season
assistance provided to the village during a natural disaster
conflict with goblin band trying to steal their ore

Defenders of Luminia.anecdotes: One night, Katherine Brasher single-handedly fought off a group of bandits who were attempting to steal from a local merchant.. Dextrel Skarholt once calmed an enraged forest spirit that had been causing chaos in the village.. The Defenders of Luminia once spent an entire week searching for a lost child, eventually finding them safe and sound in a nearby cave.
Defenders of Luminia.customs: Every evening, the Defenders of Luminia gather at the watchtower on the edge of the village, preparing to begin their night shift. Before they set out on patrol, they take a moment to offer a prayer to the non-gendered God worshipped in Luminia, asking for protection and guidance during their mission.
Defenders of Luminia.desc: The Defenders of Luminia are a small group of highly-trained soldiers, tasked with ensuring the safety and security of the village and its inhabitants. Led by the wise and experienced Dextrel Skarholt, and aided by the brave and curious Katherine Brasher, this group works tirelessly to protect Luminia from all external threats, including bandits, goblin raids, and border disputes.
Defenders of Luminia.history: The Defenders of Luminia were founded shortly after the village was attacked by wolves. In response to this threat, the villagers banded together and built a defensive wall around their homes. Realizing that this was not enough to guarantee their safety, they formed a small group of soldiers to patrol the perimeter of the village and keep watch throughout the night. Over time, this group grew in size and reputation, becoming the skilled and dedicated defenders that they are today.
Defenders of Luminia.keywords: Security, Patrol, Night Shift, Defense, Watchtower
Defenders of Luminia.name: Defenders of Luminia
Defenders of Luminia.plot: The Defenders of Luminia receive a distress call from a neighboring village, and must rush to their aid to prevent an impending attack by a rival kingdom.. An ancient artifact is discovered in the ruins of the forest, and the Defenders of Luminia must protect it from those who would seek to use its power for evil.. Katherine Brasher goes missing during a reconnaissance mission, and the rest of the group must embark on a perilous rescue mission to bring her back home.
Defenders of Luminia.relationship: The Defenders of Luminia are highly respected and valued members of the community. They work closely with the village elders and leaders to ensure that all threats to the safety and security of Luminia are dealt with swiftly and effectively. They also maintain friendly relations with the nearby tribe of forest-dwelling elves, often working together to hunt and track any dangerous animals that may endanger the villagers.

defensive wall.details: a heavily fortified stone wall with arrow slits for defense and decorated with murals depicting the village's history.

marketplace.details: a colorful and busy marketplace, filled with lively street performers and tempting aromas.

watchtower.details: a formidable watchtower with a high flagpole at the top.

timeline: first successful defense against a goblin raid
promotion of Dextrel Skarholt to leader of the group
discovery of a hidden cave system near the village
annual festival of lights dedicated to the defenders
new training program implemented for all members of the group

Hardwick Milling Co..anecdotes:
1. During a particularly harsh winter, the Hardwick family had to work around the clock to keep up with the demand for flour. They survived on very little sleep and managed to produce enough flour to feed the entire village.
2. Galtar once got into an argument with a traveling merchant over the quality of the flour. The argument escalated until they were both screaming at each other, but eventually Galtar won the argument by producing a loaf of bread that was so delicious the merchant was speechless.
3. Garline once caught Havelock napping on the job. She snuck up on him and scared him so badly he fell out of his chair and landed in a pile of flour.
Hardwick Milling Co..customs: The Hardwick family takes great pride in their work and often hold celebrations when they produce a particularly fine batch of flour. They also make it a point to always pay respect to the millstone and sifters, which they believe have a spirit and must be treated with care.
Hardwick Milling Co..desc: The Hardwick family has been operating the mill for generations, passing down their skills and knowledge from one to another. They are known throughout Luminia for their high-quality flour and ability to produce large quantities of it quickly. Each member of the family plays an important role in the functioning of the mill, with their own unique set of skills and personalities.
Hardwick Milling Co..history: The Hardwick family has been operating the mill for generations, with each member learning from the one before them. They have survived several natural disasters, including a devastating flood that destroyed most of the mill. They rebuilt it stronger than ever, and it has been a source of pride for the family ever since.
Hardwick Milling Co..name: Hardwick Milling Co.
Hardwick Milling Co..plot: When the Hardwick family discovers a new, more efficient way of milling grain, they have to convince the rest of Luminia to adopt their methods.. A group of goblins begin raiding the mill, and threaten to burn it down if the family doesn't pay them tribute.. During a particularly dry summer, the river that powers the mill dries up. The Hardwick family has to find another source of power to keep the mill running.
Hardwick Milling Co..relationship: The Hardwick family has a close relationship with the people of Luminia, as their flour is an important staple in the village. They have also formed good relationships with nearby villages and tribes, who trade with them regularly. The family has had occasional conflicts with nearby kingdoms over border disputes, but they try to stay out of political matters as much as possible.

The Hardwick Residence.details: a small stone cottage with a flower garden outside. The smell of fresh bread permeates the air and flour-covered boots are often seen on the doorstep.

The Mill.details: a wooden mill powered by the river, with a large millstone and several sifters. The structure is designed for efficiency and functionality.

The Storage Barn.details: a spacious brick building used for storing large sacks of grain and stacks of flour bags. The interior is organized with measuring scales and other practical furnishings.

timeline: Annual Feast of the Harvest Moon
Rare Inspections by the King's Agents

Helstrom's Hearth.anecdotes: Legend has it that during the bandit invasion three decades ago, Bailey Helstrom single-handedly took down six attackers with nothing but a rolling pin. Although the story is probably embellished, it's a testament to the Helstroms' fierce determination and bravery. Another rumor that circulates around Luminia is that Vinter Helstrom's honey mead is actually enchanted, and that anyone who drinks it will have good luck for the rest of the year. Of course, this is just a tall tale - but it hasn't stopped people from lining up at the inn for a taste!
Helstrom's Hearth.customs: One of the customs at Helstrom's Hearth is the annual Honey Mead Festival, held during the harvest season. Locals and visitors come together to enjoy the inn's famous honey mead, made with honey from the local apiaries. Another tradition is the nightly offering of thanks to the Old One, which takes place at the temple on the outskirts of the village. The Helstrom family also believes strongly in hospitality and generosity towards guests, and will often offer free meals or lodging to those in need.
Helstrom's Hearth.desc: Helstrom's Hearth is a bustling inn located in the heart of Luminia. The warm, welcoming ambiance is palpable as soon as you step through the door. The walls are adorned with tapestries and relics from across the land, and the smell of delicious cooking fills the air. The Helstrom family has been running the inn for generations, providing a comfortable place for travelers and locals alike to rest, eat, and drink.
Helstrom's Hearth.history: The Helstrom family founded the inn centuries ago, and it has been passed down through the generations. Over the years, the business has survived a number of challenges, including natural disasters, bandit attacks, and even a wolf invasion. However, through hard work and determination, the Helstroms have managed to keep their business thriving.
Helstrom's Hearth.name: Helstrom's Hearth
Helstrom's Hearth.plot: A group of thieves plots to steal the Helstrom family's secret honey mead recipe. A wealthy traveler offers to buy the inn from the Helstroms, but their motives are unclear. During the annual Honey Mead Festival, a group of goblins from the mountains raids the village and takes hostages
Helstrom's Hearth.relationship: Helstrom's Hearth is an integral part of the Luminia community, and the Helstrom family is highly respected by the other villagers. The inn provides a hub for socializing and networking, and visitors often come away feeling like they've made new friends. The Helstroms have also built strong relationships with local suppliers, including apiarists, fishermen, and farmers, which helps to ensure that their menu is always fresh and locally sourced.

Helstrom's Hearth Inn.details: a cozy inn with a warm fireplace and comfortable chairs

The Marketplace.details: a bustling marketplace filled with colorful tents and stalls

The Old One Temple.details: an ancient temple with stained glass windows and peaceful garden

timeline: established the annual Honey Mead Festival

Hides and Tans Fellowship.anecdotes: Jenett Darkmantle once saved the guild from financial ruin by introducing a new technique for tanning hides that greatly improved the quality of their leather. Devlin Fenwick is known for her incredible memory and ability to recall the tanning process for any type of hide from memory alone. Despite their differences in personality, the two work together seamlessly to lead the guild.
Hides and Tans Fellowship.customs: Members of the Hides and Tans Fellowship pay homage to their craft and the animals whose hides they work with by performing a ritual before beginning each project. This involves offering a prayer to the non-gendered God for guidance and protection, as well as paying respects to the animal whose hide they are using through offerings and a moment of silence.
Hides and Tans Fellowship.desc: The Hides and Tans Fellowship is a group of skilled artisans dedicated to leatherworking. They specialize in tanning hides using natural tannins and the curing process, resulting in high-quality leather that is sought after by merchants and adventurers alike.
Hides and Tans Fellowship.history: The Hides and Tans Fellowship was founded over a century ago by a group of skilled tanners who wanted to share their knowledge and expertise with others. Over time, the guild has grown in size and reputation, becoming an important part of Luminia's economy and culture.
Hides and Tans Fellowship.name: Hides and Tans Fellowship
Hides and Tans Fellowship.plot: The Hides and Tans Fellowship is struggling to keep up with demand from merchants and needs to find a new source of tannins to stay afloat.. A rival tanner's guild from a neighboring village is undercutting the Hides and Tans Fellowship by selling low-quality leather goods at a lower price.. A mysterious illness is spreading among the animals in the forest, making it difficult for the guild to obtain high-quality hides for their tanning process.
Hides and Tans Fellowship.relationship: The Hides and Tans Fellowship enjoys a close relationship with the people of Luminia, providing them with high-quality leather goods and supporting the village's prosperity through trade. The guild also works closely with other artisans in the community, exchanging ideas and techniques to improve the quality of their products.

Devlin's Office.details: a grand office filled with luxurious decor

Jenett's House.details: a cozy house with a vibrant garden

The Guild Workshop.details: a spacious workshop nestled between the trees

timeline: guild member discovers rare tannin in nearby forest

Honey Keepers.anecdotes: Once, while gathering honey from a particularly aggressive hive, Morna Denby was stung on the hand and her entire hand swelled up to twice its size. The family had to perform an emergency ritual to help ease the pain and swelling. Another time, a group of travelers passing through Luminia stopped by the Honey Keepers' apiary and were so enamored with their products that they offered to trade a rare artifact for a single jar of honey. Lastly, during the annual honey festival, Renny Skarholt was approached by a young girl who was lost in the woods. Renny used her knowledge of the forest and her connection with the local spirits to safely guide the girl back to her family.
Honey Keepers.customs: The Honey Keepers have a deep respect for the bees and the natural world, and they perform regular rituals to thank the bees for their hard work. They also hold an annual honey festival in the town square, where they share their newest batches of honey and beeswax products with the village.
Honey Keepers.desc: The Honey Keepers are a family of beekeepers who have been producing honey in Luminia for generations. They are known throughout the village for their high-quality honey and beeswax products, which they sell at the local marketplace. The family is led by Gum Rhinehart, who inherited the business from his father and has since expanded the apiary to include over 100 hives.
goals_keywords: maintaining the health of the bees
training the next generation of beekeepers
Honey Keepers.history: The Honey Keepers were founded over a century ago by Gum's great-grandfather, who discovered a natural abundance of wildflowers in the area and saw an opportunity to start producing honey. Over the years, the family has faced numerous challenges, including a severe drought in the early 1900s and an outbreak of disease among the bees in the 1950s. However, they have persevered and remained a staple of the Luminia community.
Honey Keepers.name: Honey Keepers
Honey Keepers.plot: A neighboring village is experiencing a severe drought and seeks out the Honey Keepers for assistance in starting their own apiary. A new invasive species of beetle threatens to destroy the Honey Keepers' hives. One member of the Honey Keepers discovers a rare and valuable species of flower that could greatly increase honey production, but it only grows in an extremely dangerous part of the forest
Honey Keepers.relationship: The Honey Keepers maintain a close relationship with the rest of the village, often trading honey and beeswax for other resources they need. They are also active members of the annual festival of lights, where they showcase their latest products and offer samples to visitors. Additionally, they are on good terms with the nearby tribe of forest-dwelling elves, who often seek out their honey for its medicinal properties.

The Apiary.details: an open field with rows of wooden hives, a beekeeper's shed and flower gardens around. A stone path leads to the entrance.

The Marketplace Stand.details: a rustic stall decorated with colorful fabrics and a wooden sign. Glass jars filled with honey and beeswax products are displayed on top of wooden display cases. Hanging baskets with flowers add a touch of charm.

The Rhinehart House.details: a large wooden house with ornate carvings and decorative beehive sculptures. A flower garden surrounds the house and a balcony overlooks the apiary. Stained glass windows add a touch of elegance.

timeline: outbreak of disease among the bees
participation in the annual festival of lights
discovery of a new wildflower meadow

Iron Hoof Guild.anecdotes: It is said that Marba's secret ingredient in her honey oatmeal cookies is horse hoof shavings!. Thershaele once stayed up all night to finish a set of horseshoes for a client's racing horse, which won the competition by a nose.. There are rumors that The Iron Hoof Guild has been commissioned to create a special set of magical horseshoes for one of the scholars researching the ancient ruins nearby.
Iron Hoof Guild.customs: The Iron Hoof Guild has a centuries-old tradition of celebrating the new moon with a feast, where they invite all their clients to sample their famous honey mead and goat cheese. They also pay respects to the ancestors by offering up horseshoes to their spirits.
Iron Hoof Guild.desc: The Iron Hoof Guild is a sturdy business located in the heart of Luminia. It is run by Thershaele Coralaeth, a young and energetic elf who learned his trade from Marba Hardwick, a wise and nurturing dwarf with a love for baking. Together, they provide the village with the highest quality farriery services.
Iron Hoof Guild.history: Founded by dwarves and elves several centuries ago, The Iron Hoof Guild has a long-standing reputation for providing exceptional farriery services. They survived the natural disasters that affected the region and had to rebuild their workshop after a goblin raid destroyed it. They continue to maintain their status as the premier farriers in the region through hard work and dedication.
Iron Hoof Guild.name: Iron Hoof Guild
Iron Hoof Guild.plot: The Iron Hoof Guild is commissioned to make a set of horseshoes for a famous adventurer's horse. However, they discover that the adventurer is being trailed by goblins who are eager to steal the horseshoes for themselves.. The workshop has a serious accident with a forge explosion, which injures several guild members. They must find the cause of the problem and prevent it from happening again.. A nearby town is hosting a farriery competition, and The Iron Hoof Guild is determined to win the top prize. They must overcome some tough competitors while staying true to their values.. The Iron Hoof Guild discovers a strange and rare metal in the mountains, and they must figure out how to smelt it and use it in their horseshoes.
Iron Hoof Guild.relationship: The Iron Hoof Guild has an excellent relationship with the people of Luminia. They are renowned for their excellent customer service and have established themselves as a vital part of the community. They regularly participate in village events and contribute to the prosperity of the village.

forge.details: a dark forge with a hot furnace and multiple anvils

local fairgrounds.details: a festive fairground with pony rides for children

local marketplace.details: a lively marketplace overflowing with goods

workshop.details: a spacious workshop with a smoky interior

timeline: annual feast of the new moon

Iron Quill Inc..anecdotes:
Nolan once delivered a message to the wrong person, causing chaos and confusion throughout the village. However, he quickly rectified the mistake and earned the gratitude of the person who received the message in error. 
Elatha once stayed up for two nights straight to complete a rush order for a nearby town. Her diligence helped to solidify Iron Quill Inc.'s reputation for reliability. 
Iron Quill Inc. once intercepted a message that revealed a plot by a neighboring kingdom to invade Luminia. They were able to warn the local government in time, and the invasion was successfully repelled.
Iron Quill Inc..customs: As part of their duties, members of Iron Quill Inc. must attend daily meetings to discuss the latest news and developments. They also hold a weekly town hall meeting where residents can voice their concerns and suggestions.
Iron Quill Inc..desc: Iron Quill Inc. is a small group of skilled individuals who specialize in the art of notification. They are responsible for disseminating information to the residents of Luminia and beyond. They take great pride in their work and ensure that every message they deliver is accurate and timely.
Iron Quill Inc..history: Iron Quill Inc. was founded by Nolan Ironside and Elatha Raelthorne, two natives of Luminia who saw a need for reliable communication in the village. Since then, they have worked tirelessly to provide this service to their community.
Iron Quill Inc..name: Iron Quill Inc.
Iron Quill Inc..plot: Iron Quill Inc. is approached by a group of adventurers who need help disseminating information about a dangerous artifact they are searching for. However, the artifact's owners also hire Iron Quill Inc. to spread misinformation about the adventurers. Iron Quill Inc. must decide whether to betray their clients or risk their reputation by spreading false information.
Iron Quill Inc..relationship: Iron Quill Inc. has a close relationship with the residents of Luminia. They are respected for their professionalism and dedication to their craft. They also have good relationships with nearby villages and towns, which helps them to gather news and information from beyond Luminia.

Iron Quill Inc..details: a small office building with a thatched roof and cobblestone walls, featuring a simple interior with small windows and a sturdy door

timeline: annual celebration of the company's founding
delivery of news during a major natural disaster
completing a large order for a nearby town
discovering a plot to overthrow the local government through intercepted messages

Luminia's Gardeners Guild.anecdotes: Phineas Versh once created a bonsai tree that survived for more than 50 years and became a tourist attraction. Brona Darkmantle designed a secret garden for a wealthy merchant that was rumored to contain magical properties. Muriel Pendrake saved a rare species of flowers from extinction by creating a suitable habitat for them in her own backyard.
Luminia's Gardeners Guild.customs: The members of the Gardeners Guild are known for their love of nature and their dedication to their craft. They have annual ceremonies where they bless the seeds, celebrate the blooming season and offer gratitude to the earth. They also organize workshops and training sessions to share their skills with the community and encourage people to embrace gardening as a hobby or profession.
Luminia's Gardeners Guild.desc: The Luminia's Gardeners Guild or the Green Thumb Cooperative is a group of skilled and passionate individuals who specialize in landscape design, plants, fertilizing, watering and pruning. Their mission is to make Luminia a beautiful and prosperous place by designing and managing gardens, parks and public spaces.
Luminia's Gardeners Guild.history: The Gardeners Guild was formed when several residents of Luminia realized the potential of gardening as a means of improving the quality of life in their village. Phineas Versh, Brona Darkmantle, Muriel Pendrake and Kirwin Vain lead the formation of the guild and worked tirelessly to establish it as a reputable institution. Despite facing obstacles such as harsh weather conditions and limited resources, they managed to gain recognition and support from the village leaders and the wider community.
Luminia's Gardeners Guild.keywords: Landscape Design, Plants, Fertilizer, Watering, Pruning
Luminia's Gardeners Guild.name: Luminia's Gardeners Guild
Luminia's Gardeners Guild.plot: The Gardeners Guild is approached by a wealthy landowner who wants to create a botanical garden on his estate, but faces opposition from the local authorities.. The Guild discovers a rare plant with medicinal properties deep in the forest, but has to protect it from poachers and greedy traders who want to exploit it for profit.. A member of the Guild falls in love with a druid who has different views on the role of nature in human society, leading to a conflict within the group and their relationship.
Luminia's Gardeners Guild.relationship: The Gardeners Guild is an integral part of Luminia's social and economic fabric. They contribute to the development of the village through their green projects and initiatives, and are valued for their creativity, dedication and expertise. They have a good relationship with other groups such as the scholars, adventurers and traders, who appreciate the importance of green spaces and natural beauty in their respective pursuits. However, they sometimes have conflicts with the mining and logging industries, which prioritize profit over sustainability.

Nature's Serenity.anecdotes: One member of Nature's Serenity, Bryson Raelthorne, once saved a young girl from a deadly disease by using a rare herb he had discovered in the forest. Another member, Ryleigh Vain, is known for his ability to make a healing tea that can cure even the most stubborn cold. Derry Kerswell, the newest member, has quickly become a valuable asset to the group with her eagerness to learn and passion for healing.
Nature's Serenity.customs: The members of Nature's Serenity have a strong connection to the natural world and believe in living in harmony with nature. They have a daily ritual of offering thanks to the plants and the earth for providing them with the resources they need to heal others. They also hold monthly gatherings where they share stories and knowledge about the different plants and their healing properties.
Nature's Serenity.desc: Nature's Serenity is a gathering of skilled herb gatherers and healers who specialize in making natural medicine and concoctions for the people of Luminia. They are known for their deep understanding of nature and the healing properties it possesses.
Nature's Serenity.history: Nature's Serenity was founded by a group of herb gatherers and healers who came together to share their knowledge and resources. They started out small, but over time, they grew in size and reputation. Today, they are an integral part of the community and are respected for their expertise and dedication to their craft.
Nature's Serenity.keywords: Herb Gathering, Healing, Medicine, Nature, Concoctions
Nature's Serenity.name: Nature's Serenity
Nature's Serenity.plot: Nature's Serenity is faced with a challenge when a new disease sweeps through the village, and the cure is unknown. They must embark on a dangerous journey through the forest to find the rare herb that can cure the disease before it's too late. Along the way, they must navigate treacherous terrain and face dangerous creatures while also dealing with internal conflicts within the group.
Nature's Serenity.relationship: Nature's Serenity has a close relationship with the people of Luminia, as they provide essential medicine and healing services. They are also respected by the local scholars and adventurers for their deep understanding of the natural world. However, they have had some conflicts with the local authorities, who do not always recognize the value of their work.

Nature's Serenity.details: a small wooden cabin with herbs drying outside and a cozy fireplace

The Marketplace.details: a colorful marketplace with tents, stalls and a busy atmosphere

The Temple of the Old One.details: a temple with a quiet garden, large wooden doors, simple and humble architecture, a carved wooden altar, and stained glass windows

Norwick's Farmstead.anecdotes: 1. Nally Norwick, the wise woman of the family, is known throughout the village for her healing remedies made from local herbs. 2. Devlin Norwick once caught a giant fish in the river that feeds Luminia, and donated it to the annual festival of lights feast. 3. Kiltey Norwick's famous blueberry pie won first prize at the autumn fair.
Norwick's Farmstead.customs: The Norwick family follows a strict routine dictated by the seasons. They wake up early to tend to their crops, take a midday break to escape the heat, and work until dusk. They also observe a few local customs, such as offering prayers to the spirits of the forest and the Old One at dawn and dusk.
Norwick's Farmstead.desc: The Norwick family has been living and working in Luminia for generations. As one of the few families that farms the land around the village, they are respected for their hard work and dedication. The Blackstone Farmstead, where the family lives and works, is a modest but well-kept plot of land with a small farmhouse and several fields.
Norwick's Farmstead.history: The Norwick family has been farming the land around Luminia for generations. The Blackstone Farmstead has weathered many storms and natural disasters over the years, but the family has always managed to keep the farm running. They were hit hard by a severe drought a few years ago, but managed to bounce back with the help of their neighbors.
Norwick's Farmstead.name: Norwick's Farmstead
Norwick's Farmstead.plot: The Norwick family is struggling to keep their farm running after a particularly bad harvest. They are on the brink of bankruptcy and desperately need outside help. The players could be hired by a wealthy merchant or noble to help them, or they could try to rally the village to save the farmstead. Alternatively, the players could discover a new crop or farming technique that could revolutionize the way the family farms, and help them achieve sustainability and prosperity.
Norwick's Farmstead.relationship: The Norwick family is an integral part of the community in Luminia. They provide the village with much of its food, and are respected for their hard work and dedication. The family has friendly relations with most of their neighbors, and often lend a helping hand when needed. However, they have had occasional conflicts with nearby kingdoms over border disputes.

Fields.details: vast expanse of lush green crops, bordered by mountains and forests

Luminia Marketplace.details: a bustling marketplace filled with colorful stalls selling fresh produce

Norwick Farmhouse.details: a humble farmhouse with a red thatched roof and a well-kept garden
